[\[43a.7\]]par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_
[\[43b.2\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 
[\[43b.3\]]'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/_/
[\[43b.4\]]de ltar gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 'phel bar bya ba dang 
[\[43b.5\]]'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni/_gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/_/skye mched dang /_
[\[43b.6\]]khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su gzung ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/_/pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam 
[\[43b.7\]]gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/rnam pa 
[\[44a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po sum cu pa/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 
[\[44a.3\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs 
[\[44a.4\]]su gzung ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su gzung ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[44a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su gzung ba dang /_
[\[44a.6\]]med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//_//smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci'i phyir na gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/_ci'i phyir na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_
[\[44a.7\]]rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/_ci'i phyir na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su bzung ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]de ni 'di ltar gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par 
[\[44b.2\]]shes pa la rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar skye mched dang /_khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su 'dzin pa med de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/de ni 'di 
[\[44b.3\]]ltar pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_
[\[44b.4\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[44b.5\]]rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa med de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar 
[\[44b.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su 'dzin pa med de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[44b.7\]]chen po chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing /_
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing /_chos thams cad la 
[\[45a.2\]]yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir bslabs shing 
[\[45a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i pu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs kyi skye ba mi mthong /_'gag pa 
[\[45a.4\]]dang /_blang ba dang dor ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_sogs pa dang /_'bri ba dang /_'grib pa dang /_'phel ba mi mthong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis med cing mi dmigs 
[\[45a.5\]]so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi mthong 'gag pa dang /_blang ba dang /_dor ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_sogs pa dang /_'bri ba dang /_'grib pa dang /_'phel ba mi mthong 
[\[45a.6\]]ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis med cing mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[45a.7\]]phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[45b.2\]]nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mi mthong /_'gag pa dang /_blang ba dang /_dor ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_sogs pa dang /_'bri ba dang 'grib pa dang /_'phel ba mi mthong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad 
[\[45b.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_
[\[45b.4\]]rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_sogs pa med pa dang /_'bri ba med pa dang /_'grib pa med pa dang /_'phel ba med pa'i phyir mi slob/_mi 'byung ba'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[45b.5\]]gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang nas btsal bar bya/_sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_lha'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 
[\[45b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 
[\[45b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o zhes smras te/_de ni khyod kyi mthu'o/_/khyod kyi byin gyis brlabs so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di ni bdag gi mthu ma yin/_'di ni bdag gi byin gyis brlabs ma yin no/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]btsun pa rab 'byor 'o na de su'i mthu/_de su'i byin gyis brlabs/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs so/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams 
[\[46a.2\]]cad byin gyis brlabs med na/_ci'i phyir de skad du/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs so/_/zhes smra byin gyis brlabs med pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs la/_de bzhin nyid las 
[\[46a.3\]]gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byin gyis brlabs med pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi dmigs la/_de bzhin nyid las gud na yang de bzhin 
[\[46a.4\]]gshegs pa yod par mi dmigs so/_/byin gyis brlabs med pa'i chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs la/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yang byin gyis brlabs med pa'i chos mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/
[\[46a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/_/gzugs kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs 
[\[46a.6\]]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang gzugs kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi 
[\[46a.7\]]dmigs so/_/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang /_/khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[46b.2\]]dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[46b.3\]]pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin 
[\[46b.4\]]gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi chos nyid 
[\[46b.5\]]dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[46b.6\]]'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba 
[\[46b.7\]]yang ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no/_
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[47a.2\]]kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no/_/kau shi ka 'di ni gang chos 'di dag thams cad dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin pa de'i mthu ste/_byin gyis brlabs med pa'i tshul gyis de'i byin gyis brlabs so/_/kau shi ka 
[\[47a.3\]]gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang nas btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/_kau shi ka gzugs las kyang btsal bar mi bya/_gzugs las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang 
[\[47a.4\]]'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gang 
[\[47a.5\]]yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/gzugs med pa/_bltar med pa/_thogs pa med 
[\[47a.6\]]pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/_
[\[47a.7\]]pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[47b.2\]]rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las kyang btsal bar mi bya/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams 
[\[47b.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gzugs med pa/_bltar med pa/_
[\[47b.4\]]thogs pa med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 
[\[47b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/tshor 
[\[47b.6\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_rnam par shes 
[\[47b.7\]]pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_
[\[48a.2\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[48a.3\]]dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang shes rab kyi pha 
[\[48a.4\]]rol du phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las 
[\[48a.5\]]gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 
[\[48a.6\]]chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa ste/_de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas na gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab 
[\[48a.7\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/tshor ba dang 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na 
[\[48b.2\]]yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[48b.3\]]ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha 
[\[48b.4\]]rol du phyin pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_gnas brtan rab 
[\[48b.5\]]'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni che ba ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol 
[\[48b.6\]]du phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/de la bslabs shing rgyun du 
[\[48b.7\]]zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]rnams ni rang byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[49a.2\]]zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/
[\[49a.3\]]de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni che ba ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[49a.4\]]du phyin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/de la bslabs shing rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[49a.5\]]bu thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/_rang byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[49a.6\]]sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_bla 
[\[49a.7\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]pha rol du phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir 
[\[49b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang /_
[\[49b.3\]]khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms 
[\[49b.4\]]par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[49b.5\]]stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rgya che ba 
[\[49b.6\]]yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 
[\[49b.7\]]pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rgya che ba ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/kau shi ka gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]gzugs kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/_/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs tshad med do/_/
[\[50a.2\]]gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/_/kau shi ka tshor ba tshad med pa dang /_'du shes tshad med pa dang /_'du byed tshad med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 
[\[50a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i tshad 
[\[50a.4\]]ni dmigs su med do/_/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa tshad med do/_/rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/_/kau shi ka skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du 
[\[50a.5\]]phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis 
[\[50a.6\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs 
[\[50a.7\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/_/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad 
[\[50b.2\]]med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ni tshad med pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/
[\[50b.3\]]kau shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_
[\[50b.4\]]rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 
[\[50b.5\]]'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa 
[\[50b.6\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang 
[\[50b.7\]]dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gzugs mtha' yas pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang rnam par shes pa 
[\[51a.2\]]mtha' yas pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_mtha' yas pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas 
[\[51a.3\]]pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin 
[\[51a.4\]]zhes smra/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang chos 
[\[51a.5\]]dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/_chos dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[51a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin zhes bya/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[51a.7\]]'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dmigs pa med pas mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o//_
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin zhes bya/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 
[\[51b.2\]]de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir dmigs pa mtha' yas so/_/dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mtha' yas so/_/kau shi ka de bzhin nyid dang /_dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 
[\[51b.3\]]mtha' yas so/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/_sems can can mtha' yas 
[\[51b.4\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin zhes bya/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig bla 
[\[51b.5\]]dgas yin/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni chos kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]kyang ma yin/_chos ma yin pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]kyang ma yin te/_'di ltar sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni blo bur du ming du btags pa/_dngos po 
[\[51b.6\]]med par ming du btags pa/_dmigs pa med par ming du btags pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun 
[\[51b.7\]]pa rab 'byor de ni med do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka gang la sems can du bshad pa gang yang med pa de la/_sems can mtha' yas pa yod de/_kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/_sems can sems can 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]zhes gsung du brjod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_de la sems can gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag par 'gyur ba yod dam/_smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[52a.2\]]rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de ltar rnam grangs des na/_sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_skye 
[\[52a.3\]]dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_skyes pa dang bud med du bcas pa dag gis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/_gang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i don du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis 
[\[52a.4\]]brlabs pa dang /_mthus bshad cing brjod pa bstan pa'i chos 'di ni kye ma legs par bshad do/_/kye ma chos 'di ni legs par bshad do/_/kye ma chos kyi chos nyid 'di ni legs par bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[52a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/_/chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par 
[\[52a.6\]]shes pa'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ram/_chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis kyis kyang theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa mchis te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_
[\[52a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po dang bcas pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/_/ji skad du smras pa de de bzhin te/_chos gang yang dmigs su med de/_gzugs sam/_
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ram/_chos gang yang mi dmigs mod kyi theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa yang yod de/_gsum gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[52b.2\]]theg pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/_/lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung 
[\[52b.3\]]bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg 
[\[52b.4\]]pa bshad do/_/pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang 
[\[52b.5\]]bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 
[\[52b.6\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las 
[\[52b.7\]]gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos 'di dag thams cad la slob pa ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la slob bo/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob bo/_/nang stong pa nyid la slob bo/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob bo/_/dran pa nye bar 
[\[53a.2\]]gzhag pa la slob bo/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 
[\[53a.3\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[53a.4\]]stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob bo/_lha'i bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 
[\[53a.5\]]dang mi 'bral bar/_spyod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ste/_lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi zhabs 'bring byed cing /_rgyal po'i khab pad mo yod pa'i nang gi tshong 
[\[53a.6\]]'dus kyi dbus na 'dug pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[53a.7\]]rol du phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]yan lag rnams dang /_lam rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[53b.2\]]dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_
[\[53b.3\]]so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang yang bral bar ma gyur te/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur to/_/
[\[53b.4\]]lha'i bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis/_nga la khye'u khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa na/_bskal pa bzang po'i tshe/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du shAkya thub pa 
[\[53b.5\]]zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs 
[\[53b.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro/_/zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[53b.7\]]po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di de ltar gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis 
[\[54a.2\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_
[\[54a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thun par yongs su 'dzin pa ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/de nas 
[\[54a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag 'dus shing tshogs par 
[\[54a.5\]]mkhyen nas/_de dag thams cad dpang du bcugs te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma 'am/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[54a.6\]]kyi bu mo'am/_lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_sgom pa dang /_gzhan la rgya cher 'chad pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[54a.7\]]kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral ba de dag ni/_bdud sdig to can dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid shin du byin gyis brlabs par 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]'gyur/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/_mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/_smon 
[\[54b.2\]]pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/_/de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams 
[\[54b.3\]]dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[54b.4\]]med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid shin du 
[\[54b.5\]]byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/_mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/_smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang gis 
[\[54b.6\]]glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_gang la glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag gis ngo bo nyid med do/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni mi'am/_mi ma yin pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur 
[\[54b.7\]]ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms shin du bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]ni nyam nga ba mi spongs pas dus byed par yang mi 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gis/_sems can thams cad la yang dag pa'i rim gros bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[55a.2\]]kau shi ka gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /_mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_
[\[55a.3\]]'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_lha'i bu gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ma thos pa dang /_ma bzung ba dang /_ma bcangs pa dang /_kun chub par ma byas pa de dag gis 
[\[55a.4\]]kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya'o/_/gzung bar bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/klag par bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bar bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs 
[\[55a.5\]]kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang ma bral bar byed cing de dag ni khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung /_bla gab 
[\[55a.6\]]med pa na 'dug kyang rung /_lam gol pa na 'dug kyang rung ste/_'jigs pa'am sngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin du bsgoms so/_/phyi stong pa 
[\[55a.7\]]nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin du bsgoms so/_/de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu dang 
[\[55b.2\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mos shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /_gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yid la bgyid pa 
[\[55b.3\]]dang /_mi 'bral ba de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/_sems can dmyal ba rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/_
[\[55b.4\]]byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha las phongs pa dang /_mi las dbul ba dang /_nad dang gnod pa dang /_'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rgyun chad cing 'jig pa dang ma mchis par 'gyur/_mu ge'i mya ngam thams cad kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur 
[\[55b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[55b.6\]]bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[55b.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[56a.2\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin 
[\[56a.3\]]gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/_
[\[56a.4\]]rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams mchis par 'gyur/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha 
[\[56a.5\]]rnams mchis par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa mchis par 'gyur/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/_
[\[56a.6\]]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_dgra bcom pa mchis par 'gyur/_rang byang chub dang /_rang sangs rgyas mchis par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/_sems can 
[\[56a.7\]]yongs su smin pa mchis par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mchis par 'gyur/_'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/_chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mchis par 'gyur/_
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bsrung ba 
[\[56b.2\]]dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/_
[\[56b.3\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/lha las phongs pa dang /_mi las dbul ba dang /_nad dang gnod pa dang /_'go ba'i nad thams cad rgyun chad pa dang /_'jig pa dang med par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[56b.4\]]mu ge'i mya ngan thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[56b.5\]]'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis 
[\[56b.6\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang 
[\[56b.7\]]dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]po yod na/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min 
[\[57a.2\]]gyi bar gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa yod par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par 'gyur 
[\[57a.3\]]ro/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_dgra bcom pa yod par 'gyur ro/_/rang byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas yod par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/_sems can 
[\[57a.4\]]yongs su smin pa yod par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/sangs 
[\[57a.5\]]rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o/_/bkur sti dang bsti stang du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/rtag tu 
[\[57a.6\]]rgyun mi chad par de la bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar sems pa de ni nga la rim gror bya ba dang /_
[\[57a.7\]]bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar sems so/_/de bas na lha dang /_mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o/_/bkur stir bya'o/_/bsti stang du bya'o/_
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]mchod par bya'o/_/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de la bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par bya'o/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta ste dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/_smyig ma'i tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_'od ma'i tshal 
[\[57b.2\]]lam/_ci skyang gi byings sam/_'bras kyi zhing ngam/_til gyi zhing bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis gang bar gyur la de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_nam 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /_
[\[57b.3\]]bkur stir byas pa dang /_bsti stang du byas pa dang /_mchod par byas pa bas/_gang la las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ma bral ba zhig la/_rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_
[\[57b.4\]]mchod par byas na/_de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar kau shi ka nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas de dag yod na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/_de bzhin 
[\[57b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[57b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de bas na lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o/_/bkur 
[\[57b.7\]]stir bya'o/_/bsti stang du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de la bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas lha'i 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di/_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa 
[\[58a.2\]]dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gis/_tshe 'di la 'thob pa'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyur zhing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[58a.3\]]la bsnyen bkur ba'i slad du/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bgyi ba dang /_bkur stir bgyi ba dang /_bsti stang du bgyi ba dang /_mchod par bgyi bar 
[\[58a.4\]]'tshal ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de dag kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du 
[\[58a.5\]]dran pa mi nyams pa dang /_rigs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_skyid pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'od phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mig phun sum 
[\[58a.6\]]tshogs pa dang /_dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pas ba dag kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par sprul cing /_'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig 
[\[58a.7\]]rten gyi khams su mngon par mchi ba dang /_gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skye zhing 'byung bar ma gyur ba de dang de dag du mchis shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi yon tan rjod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi yon tan rjod 
[\[58b.2\]]pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[58b.3\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[58b.4\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang /_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_
[\[58b.5\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa gsum la 'dul ba ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yongs 
[\[58b.6\]]su bzung na/_pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_
[\[58b.7\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_
[\[59a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su gzung par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar che'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de 
[\[59a.3\]]de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su bzung bas/_pha rol du phyin pa thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam 
[\[59a.4\]]gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[59a.5\]]gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 
[\[59a.6\]]gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /_yongs su bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis tshe 'di la yon tan gang dang gang yongs su zin 
[\[59a.7\]]par 'gyur ba de dag bstan gyis/_shin du legs par nyon la yid la gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka mu 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]stegs can gzhan dang mu stegs spyod pa dang /_kun du rgyu ba dang bdud dam bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'am/_gang zag nga rgyal can la la zhig_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brgal bar 'dod pa dang /_'di dang dbral bar 'dod pa dang /_'di la brtsad par 
[\[59b.2\]]'dod pa dang /_dgal bar 'dod pa zhig byung na/_brgal bar 'dod pa dang /_dbral bar 'dod pa dang /_brtsad par 'dod pa dang /_dgal bar 'dod pa de dag gis brgal ba dang /_dbral bar 'dod pa dang /_brtsad par 'dod pa dang /_dgal bar 'dod pa de dag gi rgol ba dang dbral 
[\[59b.3\]]bar bya ba dang /_brtsad pa dang /_dgal bar byed pa gang dang gang byung ba kun kyang myur du nub cing med par gyur te/_brgal bar dga' ba dang /_dbral bar dga' ba dang /_brtsad par dga' ba dang /_dgal bar dga' ba de dag gi bsam pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[59b.4\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun ring por pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_gang gi don du sems can rnams yun ring por 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_shags su gyur 
[\[59b.5\]]pa'i phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/_sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gi don du sems can de dag yun ring por tshul khrims ngan par 'gyur ba'i phyi nang gi 
[\[59b.6\]]chos de dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/_sems can de dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gi don du sems can de dag yun ring por khro ba dang /_gnod sems dang /_'tshe bar gyur 
[\[59b.7\]]ba'i phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/_sems can de dag bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gi don du sems can de dag yun ring por le lo byed par gyur pa'i phyi nang gi chos de 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/_sems can de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gi don du sems can de dag yun ring por sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i 
[\[60a.2\]]phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/_sems can de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gi don du sems can de dag yun ring por shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i phyi nang 
[\[60a.3\]]gi chos de dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa dang /_yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gang gi don du sems can de dag 'di lta ste/_bag la 
[\[60a.4\]]nyal ba dang /_kun nas ldang bas 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur ba'i bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas ldang ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam par bcil te/_sems can de dag bsam gtan bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[60a.5\]]tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_dran pa nye par gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_
[\[60a.6\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 
[\[60a.7\]]shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[60b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_de la yon tan de dag 'byung ste/_tshe rabs gzhan la yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sems can rnams/_smon lam 
[\[60b.3\]]gyi tshul bzhin du rab tu bkod nas/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te/_kau shi ka de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshe rabs gzhan la 'byung ba'i yon tan dang /_legs pa dag 
[\[60b.4\]]go/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang sa'i phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa yod pa'i sa'i phyogs der bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris su gtogs 
[\[60b.5\]]pa'i lha 'am/_mu stegs can gzhan dang kun du rgyu ba'am/_gang zag nga rgyal can rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la sems g.yeng bar bya ba 'am/_rgal ba'am/_brtsad pa'am/_'gal ba'am/_med par bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar mi nus te de'i gong du de dag la 
[\[60b.6\]]yon tan dang legs par 'gyur ba ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa dang gzung ba dang bsgom pa dang /_theg pa gsum gyis byung nas/_sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba dug thams cad zhi bar 
[\[60b.7\]]byed pa yod de/_der sbrul lam srog chags bkres pas mnar cing /_zas tshol ba zhig gis srog chags kyi rigs la la mthong bar gyur te/_des srog chags kyi rigs de bza' ba'i phyir/_de'i rjes su 'brangs te bsnyags par gyur na/_de nas srog chags 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]kyi rigs de 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag ste/_rtsi mag+hi gang na yod pa der song na/_de nas sbrul de rtsi de'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ltar sbrul gyi gdug pa zil gyis gnon pa de ni rtsi ma g+hi'i rtsi'i yon tan 
[\[61a.2\]]te/_kau shi ka rtsi mag+hi de ni de lta bu'i mthu dang ldan no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la ni/_kau shi ka 
[\[61a.3\]]rgol ba dang rtsod pa dang /_'gal bar byed pa gang dang gang byung ba de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzi brjid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mthus de dag nye bar zhi ba dang med par 'gyur te/_gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid du med par 
[\[61a.4\]]'gyur zhing rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni sdig to mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa ste/_rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no/_/sdig to mi dge ba'i chos gang 
[\[61a.5\]]thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed cing rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin zhe na/_'di lta ste 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nye bar zhi bar byed de rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no/_/ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang 
[\[61a.6\]]gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi phung 
[\[61a.7\]]po chen po 'ba' shig gi bar du nye bar zhi bar byed de/_rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no/_/bar du gcod pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas ldang ba dang /_bdag tu lta ba dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba por lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba dang /_yod par lta ba dang /_med par lta ba dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang /_ser sna dang

[\[61b.3\]]gzugs su 'dzin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes par 'dzin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin par 'dzin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[61b.4\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par 'dzin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag par 'dzin pa dang /_yang dag par spong pa dang /_
[\[61b.5\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'dzin pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par

[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]nye bar zhi bar byed de/_rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sdig to mi dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin te/_rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[62a.2\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_'og min gyi lha'i bar de dag thams cad kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_
[\[62a.3\]]klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung pa dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bskyang par byed do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po sum cu gcig pa/_phyogs 
[\[62a.4\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[62a.5\]]byed pa de la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bskyang bar mdzad de de ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su spangs shing /_dge ba'i chos rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas rnam 
[\[62a.6\]]par 'phel bar 'gyur gyi yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[62a.7\]]pha rol du phyin pas rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur gyi yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/_/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/_yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/_/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/_yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/_/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/_yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/_/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par 
[\[62b.2\]]spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur gyi yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad 
[\[62b.3\]]med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[62b.4\]]'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/_yongs su 'grib 
[\[62b.5\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshig blang bar 'os pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tshig ran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tshig 'chal pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/khro bas zil gyis non pa med par 'gyur ro/_/nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa med par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[62b.6\]]ser sna can dang phrag dog can du mi 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyis srog gcod pa spangs na 
[\[62b.7\]]yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang phra ma dang zhe gcod pa dang /_tshig kyal pa dang chags sems dang /_gnod sems dang log par lta ba 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]spangs bar 'gyur/_gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan gyis log par lta ba spongs na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing brjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[63a.2\]]bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la 'jug par 'gyur/_gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la 'jug na yang de dag gi legs pa 
[\[63a.3\]]rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan 
[\[63a.4\]]yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 'jug na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang 
[\[63a.5\]]nang stong pa nyid sgom par 'gyur/_gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid sgom pa la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_nang stong pa nyid kyi legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan nang stong pa nyid sgom na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang dngos 
[\[63a.6\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom par 'gyur/_gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[63a.7\]]sgom na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur/_gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug par yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang gzungs rnams thob par 'gyur/_gzhan yang gzungs rnams thob par 
[\[63b.2\]]bya ba la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_gzungs rnams thob par byed pa'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan gyis gzungs rnams thob na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug 
[\[63b.3\]]par 'gyur/_gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_bsam gtan dang po'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[63b.4\]]bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur/_gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[63b.5\]]pa la snyoms par 'jug na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur/_gzhan yang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_byams pa la 
[\[63b.6\]]snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan byams pa la snyoms par 'jug na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur/_gzhan 
[\[63b.7\]]yang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro//
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur/_gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug par yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms 
[\[64a.2\]]par 'jug pa'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med pa'i skye mched dang 
[\[64a.3\]]'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur/_gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug par yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa'i 
[\[64a.4\]]legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom par 'gyur/_gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[64a.5\]]sgom pa la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[64a.6\]]gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bsgom par 'gyur/_gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[64a.7\]]lag brgyad pa sgom pa'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom na yang de dag gi legs brjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]sgom par 'gyur/_gzhan yang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan stong pa nyid dang mtshan 
[\[64b.2\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang 'thun pa dang /_lugs dang mi 'thun par snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur/_gzhan yang rnam par thar pa 
[\[64b.3\]]brgyad la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang mthun pa dang /_lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur
