[\[64b.4\]]ro/_/bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur/_gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug par yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[64b.5\]]pa dgu'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur/_
[\[64b.6\]]gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la snyoms par 'jug na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' 
[\[64b.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad sgrub par 'gyur/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]sgrub pa la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad sgrub pa'i legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad sgrub na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[65a.2\]]bdag kyang yongs su mi nyam pa'i chos dang /_rtag tu btang snyoms dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/_gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_rnam pa thams 
[\[65a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi legs pa rjod par 'gyur/_gzhan rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed na yang de dag gi legs pa rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang sems can thams 
[\[65a.4\]]cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims srung ba dang /_bzod pa sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan la snyoms par 
[\[65a.5\]]'jug pa dang /_shes rab sgom yang de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar pha rol du 
[\[65a.6\]]phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran pa skye bar 'gyur te/_gal te bdag gis sbyin pa ma btang na ngan song gi rgyud du skye bar 'gyur te/_bdag gis sems can yongs su smin par yang mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par yang mi 'gyur/_rnam pa thams 
[\[65a.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te bdag gis tshul khrims ma bsrungs na ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur te/_mi'i lus 'thob par yang mi 'gyur/_bdag gis sems can yongs su smin par yang mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]dag par yang mi 'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te bdag gis bzod pa ma bsgoms na/_bdag gis dbang po rnams kyang nyams par 'gyur/_bdag gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yang gzi med par 'gyur/_gzugs phun 
[\[65b.2\]]sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par mi 'gyur te/_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba de lta bu yang med par 
[\[65b.3\]]'gyur te/_gzugs phun sum tshogs pas sems can yongs su smin par yang mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te le lor gyur na bdag gis byang chub kyi lam thob 
[\[65b.4\]]par yang mi nus/_sems can yongs su smin par yang mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par yang mi 'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te sems 'khrugs par gyur na bdag gis ting nge 'dzin gang gis 
[\[65b.5\]]sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed par mi nus/_bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par yang mi 'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te shes rab 'chal par gyur na bdag 
[\[65b.6\]]gis shes rab dang thabs mkhas pas nyan thos kyis dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las bzlas te/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sbyangs te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya bar yang mi nus 
[\[65b.7\]]so zhes te/_'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_de ltar bdag gis ser sna'i dbang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba ni mi rigs mi cha'o/_/tshul khrims ngan pa'i dbang gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_gnod sems kyi 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]dbang gis bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_le lo'i dbang gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_'khrug pa'i dbang gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab 'chal ba'i dbang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[66a.2\]]par mi bya ba ni mi rigs mi cha ste/_pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dran pa skye bar 'gyur te/_kau shi ka de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[66a.3\]]pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba de dag gis/_tshe 'di dang tshe rabs gzhan la yon tan 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin 
[\[66a.4\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su 'dul ba dang /_nga rgyal ma mchis par 'gyur ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[66a.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su 'dul ba dang /_nga rgyal med pa'i don du nye bar gnas pa yin/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub 
[\[66a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba bgyid cing 'di snyam du/_'di ltar bdag ni 
[\[66a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang nyam thag pa dang 'gron po dang /_slong ba rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo snyam du sems na de thabs mi mkhas pa'i sbyin pa des nga rgyal du 'gyur ro/_/'jig 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do snyam na yang /_de des nga rgyal du 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i 
[\[66b.2\]]bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do snyam na yang de des nga rgyal du 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[66b.3\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do snyam na yang de des nga rgyal du 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[66b.4\]]tshe/_'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/snyam na yang de des nga rgyal du 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di 
[\[66b.5\]]snyam du 'di ltar bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom mo snyam na yang de thabs mi mkhas pa'i slad du 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de des nga rgyal du 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag 
[\[66b.6\]]par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[66b.7\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par bya'o snyam du sems na yang /_de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas 
[\[67a.2\]]nga rgyal du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag du bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur te/_de la ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su 'dul ba dang /_nga rgyal 
[\[67a.3\]]ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shin du bsgoms pa'i slad du sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/_gtong 
[\[67a.4\]]ba yang mi dmigs len pa yang mi dmigs te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /_nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/_/
[\[67a.5\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la shin du bsgoms pa'i slad du/_
[\[67a.6\]]shes rab du yang mi dmigs/_shes rab dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /_nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i 
[\[67a.7\]]slad du nye bar gnas so/_/de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[67b.2\]]dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shin du bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis te/_bcom 
[\[67b.3\]]ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /_nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga ba las/_/le'u bcu 
[\[67b.4\]]bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang 
[\[67b.5\]]kha ton du byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa zhig 'thab mo'i nang du 'dug cing g.yul ngor chas pa'i tshe/_der gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/_zab mo 'di kha ton du byas nas song ste 'dug na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de 
[\[67b.6\]]pham par mi nus te/_gdon mi za bar rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal nas ma smas mnyams par 'thab mo de las thar par 'gyur te/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di kha ton du byed cing g.yul ngor song song ba las 
[\[67b.7\]]srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba ni mi srid de/_gnas med skabs med de/_gal te de'i lus la/_la la zhig gis mdas 'phangs sam/_mtshon gyis btab na lus la phog cing 'dzug par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]yun ring por pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyad de/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la brten shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bsgoms te/_bdag gi 'dod chags kyi mtshon dang /_'dod chags kyi mda' yang bcom/_gzhan gyi 'dod chags 
[\[68a.2\]]kyi mtshon dang /_'dod chags kyi mda' yang bcom/_bdag gi zhe sdang gi mtshon dang /_zhe sdang gi mda' yang bcom/_gzhan gyi zhe sdang gi mtshon dang /_zhe sdang gi mda' yang bcom/_bdag gi gti mug gi mtshon dang /_gti mug gi mda' yang bcom/_
[\[68a.3\]]gzhan gyi gti mug gi mtshon dang /_gti mug gi mda' yang bcom/_bdag gi lta ba'i rnam pa'i mtshon dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa'i mda' yang bcom/_gzhan gyi lta ba'i rnam pa'i mtshon dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa'i mda' yang bcom/_bdag gi kun nas ldang ba'i mtshon dang /_
[\[68a.4\]]kun nas ldang ba'i mda' yang bcom/_gzhan gyi kun nas ldang ba'i mtshon dang /_kun nas ldang ba'i mda' yang bcom/_bdag gi bag la nyal ba'i mtshon dang /_bag la nyal ba'i mda' yang bcom/_gzhan gyi bag la nyal ba'i mtshon dang /_bag la nyal ba'i 
[\[68a.5\]]mda' yang bcom pa'i phyir te/_kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/_rigs kyi ba'am rigs kyi bu mo g.yul du phyin pa'i tshe/_lus la mtshon nam mdas phog cing zug par mi 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha 
[\[68a.6\]]rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral na/_de la la la zhig gis dug gis gtor tam/_byad byas sam/_me'i 'obs su brngod 
[\[68a.7\]]dam/_mtshon gyis btab bam/_dug blud dam/_chur bor yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad kyis de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o/_/kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags bla na med pa'o/_/kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags gong na med pa ste/_rig sngags 'di la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ni bdag la yang gnod par mi byed/_gzhan la yang gnod par mi 
[\[68b.2\]]byed/_gnyis ka la yang gnod par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de 'di la slob pa'i tshe bdag mi dmigs so mthong ba po'i bar du mi dmigs so/_/gzugs mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /_'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/_/
[\[68b.3\]]skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[68b.4\]]'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang stobs bcu dang /_
[\[68b.5\]]mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so/_/de ltar mi dmigs pas na bdag la yang gnod par mi byed/_gzhan la yang gnod par mi byed gnyis ka la yang 
[\[68b.6\]]gnod par mi byed de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob cing /_sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[68b.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la bslabs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gzung ba ma byas kha ton ma byas/_klag pa dang kun 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]chub par ma byas tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas kyang /_gang na bri shing 'chang ba'i khyim 'am grong ngam grong rdal lam grong khyer der ni mi'am mi ma yin pa glags lta bas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[69a.2\]]pa 'di mchod pa'i phyir/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_
[\[69a.3\]]tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu dang /_'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris 
[\[69a.4\]]dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing /_bcangs pa de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang /_
[\[69a.5\]]bskyab pa dang /_bskyang ba byed de/_lha'i bu de dag 'ongs nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod par byas shing 'dod par 'gyur te/_kau shi ka de ltar gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris te/_
[\[69a.6\]]bcangs na de la tshe 'di'i yon tan dang /_legs pa 'di dag yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste/_dper na/_snying po byang chub bam/_snying po byang chub kyi 'khor tam/_snying po byang chub kyi nang na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags sam/_mir 
[\[69a.7\]]gyur pa gang su 'dug kyang rung ste/_de dag la mi'am mi ma yin pas gtse ba'am/_tho 'tsham bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang de la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/gang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang /_de nyid du bzhugs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[69b.2\]]tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag kyang de nyid la bzhugs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[69b.3\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_sems 
[\[69b.4\]]can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa dang /_kho na med pa dang /_gcugs med par nan tan mdzad nas/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la bkod par gyur to/_/bkod do/_/dgod par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[69b.5\]]bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod par gyur to/_/bkod do/_/dgod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[69b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid kyis sa'i phyogs de sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du byas pas me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos phyag bya ba dang /_gdud pa 
[\[69b.7\]]dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya bar gyur to/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]te bcangs la/_de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa bgyis pa dang /_gang la las de bzhin 
[\[70a.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten du stsal te/_mchod dam/_rin po che sna bdun gyi snod du stsal te/_de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_
[\[70a.3\]]spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa bgyis na/_de gnyis las gang gi bsod nams kyi phung po mang du 'phel ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[70a.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas na de khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lung ston cig_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes 
[\[70a.5\]]pa dang /_sku 'di lta bu mngon par grub pa de lam gang la bslabs pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes te/_sku 'di lta bu mngon par grub par gyur/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_
[\[70a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes te sku 'di lta bu yang mngon par grub bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[70a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ngas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so/_/sku 'di 'dra ba yang mngon par grub bo/_/kau shi ka nga'i sku 'di brnyes pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su yang mi 'gro ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las 
[\[70b.2\]]byung ngo /_/kau shi ka de ltar lus 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi gzhi ste/_gzhi de la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so/_/de lta bas na 
[\[70b.3\]]sku 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes de'i gzhir gyur pas/_sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur cing phyag bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya bar gyur te/_kau shi ka 
[\[70b.4\]]de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_sku gdung mchod pa yang sku la mchod pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/_chos la mchod par mi 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris te 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_
[\[70b.5\]]klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_
[\[70b.6\]]mchod pa byas pas ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid bris te/_gzung 
[\[70b.7\]]bar bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/klag par bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gror bya'o//
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]bkur stir bya'o/_/bsti stang du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten du bcug gam/_rin po che sna bdun gyi snod du blugs 
[\[71a.2\]]shing gces par byas te/_de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang mchod pa byas pa bas/_gang gis shes rab kyi pha 
[\[71a.3\]]rol du phyin pa 'di bris te/_bzung ba dang /_kun chub par byas pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gro dang /_
[\[71a.4\]]bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa byas na/_'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_pha rol du phyin pa lnga yang 'di las byung ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang 'di las 
[\[71a.5\]]byung ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[71a.6\]]'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de 
[\[71a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang 'di las byung ngo /_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang 'di las byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]'di las byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang 'di las byung ngo /_/byams pa chen po yang 'di las 
[\[71b.2\]]byung ngo /_/snying rje chen po yang 'di las byung ngo /_/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' 
[\[71b.3\]]ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo /_/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[71b.4\]]dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo /_/brgya byin gyis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 
[\[71b.5\]]la rim gro mi bgyid/_bkur sti mi bgyid/_bsti stang mi bgyid/_mchod par mi bgyid pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod pa de ltar mthu che bar ma 'tshal tam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[71b.6\]]'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las sangs rgyas la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang chos dang /_dge 'dun la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang sangs rgyas la nem nur med pa dang /_gang chos dang /_dge 'dun la nem nur med pa dang /_gang sangs rgyas 
[\[71b.7\]]la shin du rton pa dang /_gang chos dang /_dge 'dun la shin du rton pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi gang sangs rgyas la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang chos dang /_dge 'dun la mos 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang sangs rgyas la nem nur ma mchis pa dang /_gang chos dang dge 'dun la nem nur ma mchis pa dang /_gang sangs rgyas la shin du rton pa dang /_gang chos dang /_dge 'dun la shin du rton pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo /_/
[\[72a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa 
[\[72a.3\]]de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[72a.4\]]gi mi las kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/_rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/_lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_dam pa ma yin pa'i 
[\[72a.5\]]cha'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/_phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_bla ma'i cha'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/_dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji 
[\[72a.6\]]snyed cig yod/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas 
[\[72a.7\]]kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang so so yang dag par rig 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]pa bzhi thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i slad du/_rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang 'dod chags 
[\[72b.2\]]dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs pa'i slad du/_lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang dam pa ma lags pa'i cha'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/_phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang 
[\[72b.3\]]bla ma'i cha'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/_dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[72b.4\]]tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las/_sangs rgyas la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_chos la mos pa mi 
[\[72b.5\]]phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_dge 'dun la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas la nem nur med pa dang /_chos la nem nur med pa dang /_dge 'dun la nem nur med pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang sangs rgyas la shin du rton pa dang /_chos la 
[\[72b.6\]]shin du rton pa dang /_dge 'dun la shin du rton pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang lan cig phyir 
[\[72b.7\]]'ong par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang bla na med pa 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang byang chub tu spyod par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/_sangs rgyas 
[\[73a.2\]]ma mthong ba dang /_chos ma thos pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen ma bkur ba dang /_sbyin pa ma byin pa dang /_tshul khrims ma bsrungs pa dang /_bzod pa ma bsgoms pa dang /_brtson 'grus ma brtsams pa dang /_bsam gtan ma bsgoms pa dang /_shes 
[\[73a.3\]]rab ma bsgoms pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[73a.4\]]pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du ma thos ma 
[\[73a.5\]]bsgoms pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma thos ma bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can las/_sangs rgyas 
[\[73a.6\]]la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_chos la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_dge 'dun la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ste/_de bas kyang rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa'i bar du ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang bla na med pa yang 
[\[73a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang bsam pa dag pas byang chub tu spyod pa ni ches nyung bar rig par bya'o/_/kau shi ka mi rnams lta zhog gi de ji snyam du sems/_'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang /_mngon par shes pa 
[\[73b.2\]]drug thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las/_kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/_rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/_lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur 
[\[73b.3\]]pa dang /_dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/_phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang /_bla ma'i cha'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/_dgra bcom par gyur pa dang /_rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam bu'i 
[\[73b.4\]]gling gi srog chags rnams las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nem nur med pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la nem nur med pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las mar shes pa dang /_par 
[\[73b.5\]]shes pa dang /_dge sbyong du shes pa dang /_bram zer shes pa dang /_rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang /_sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims bsrung ba dang /_gso sbyin la gnas pa dang /_'dod pa la kha na ma tho bar 'du shes shing rnam par spyod pa dang /_de 
[\[73b.6\]]bzhin du mi rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_bdag med par 'du shes pa dang /_mi gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad du mngon par dga' ba med par 'du shes pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[73b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dang /_kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i slad du/_rgyun du 
[\[74a.2\]]zhugs par gyur pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs pa'i slad du/_lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang /_dam pa ma lags pa'i cha'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/_phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang /_bla ma'i cha'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs 
[\[74a.3\]]pa'i slad du/_dgra bcom par gyur pa dang /_rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni shin du nyung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni de bas kyang 
[\[74a.4\]]ches nyung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 
[\[74a.5\]]thob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dang /_kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/_rgyun du zhugs pa thob pa dang /_
[\[74a.6\]]'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/_lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang /_dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/_phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang /_bla ma'i cha can gyi kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/_dgra bcom par 
[\[74a.7\]]gyur pa dang /_rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/_de bas kyang gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang bla na 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya par 'dod pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/kau shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can tshad med grangs med 
[\[74b.2\]]pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/_de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/_de las phal cher nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[74b.3\]]la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson 'grus med pa/_bsam pa zhan pa/_mos pa dma' ba/_shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub dka'o/_/kau shi ka ngas 'di nas 
[\[74b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang 
[\[74b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/_de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi de las phal cher nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis la gnas par 'gyur pa mthong 
[\[74b.6\]]ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson 'grus med pa/_bsam pa zhen pa mos pa dma' ba/_shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/_/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[74b.7\]]mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag myur zhing bde bar/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/_yang dang yang du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mnyan 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]par bya'o/_/gzung bar bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/klag par bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gzung zhing bcang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byas shing 
[\[75a.2\]]bris te/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gror bya'o/_/bkur stir bya'o/_/bsti stang du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/dge ba'i chos gang ji 
[\[75a.3\]]snyed pa gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'du ste/_de dag kyang gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_kun chub par bya/_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ste/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i 
[\[75a.4\]]pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[75a.5\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dang /_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gang ji snyed shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pa de dag kyang gzung bar bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/klag par 
[\[75a.6\]]bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di ltar shes par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe yang /_'di 
[\[75a.7\]]ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[75b.2\]]tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 
[\[75b.3\]]shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad po 'di dag 
[\[75b.4\]]dang /_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dag la bslab pa mdzad kyis/_bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhan tshad med pa'i bar 
[\[75b.5\]]du yang bdag cag gi ston pa ste/_de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa'o/_/rang sangs rgyas dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis bstan pa yang 'di yin te/_shes 
[\[75b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la slob slob pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin 
[\[75b.7\]]pa la slob slob pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob slob pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la slob slob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob slob pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob slob pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig 
[\[76a.2\]]phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang pha rol du phyin par gyur to/_/pha rol du phyin to/_/pha rol du phyin par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[76a.3\]]bzhugs kyang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[76a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[76a.5\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[76a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po sum cu gnyis pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 
[\[76a.7\]]'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa byas te/_de la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas na/_kau shi ka de 
[\[76b.2\]]la ji snyam du sems/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs 
[\[76b.3\]]kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher ston cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems 
[\[76b.4\]]dang yang mi 'bral la/_gong du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_bsti stang du byed/_mchod par byed na/_
[\[76b.5\]]de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka mchod rten gcig lta zhog gi/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las 
[\[76b.6\]]byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/_de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal 
[\[76b.7\]]mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas na/_kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang bu 'phel lam/_
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing 
[\[77a.2\]]'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral la/_gong du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_
[\[77a.3\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_bsti stang du byed/_mchod par byed na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod 
[\[77a.4\]]rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_mchod pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las 
[\[77a.5\]]byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/_de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_
[\[77a.6\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas na/_kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_
[\[77a.7\]]brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/_'dzin pa dang /_
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_bris shing me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 
[\[77b.2\]]gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_bsti stang du byed/_mchod par byed na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am 
[\[77b.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/_
[\[77b.4\]]de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par 
[\[77b.5\]]byas na/_kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi 
[\[77b.6\]]ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_bris shing me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang 
[\[77b.7\]]byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_bsti stang du byed/_mchod par byed na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]byur bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[78a.2\]]khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/_de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' 
[\[78a.3\]]dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas na/_kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel 
[\[78a.4\]]lam/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang 
[\[78a.5\]]ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/_bkur 
[\[78a.6\]]stir byed/_bsti stang du byed/_mchod par byed na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/_/kau shi ka gal te 
[\[78a.7\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/_de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror 
[\[78b.2\]]byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas na/_kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa 
[\[78b.3\]]mang ngo /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed 
[\[78b.4\]]cing /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_bsti stang du byed/_mchod par byed na/_de'i bsod nams 
[\[78b.5\]]ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag las 
[\[78b.6\]]sems can re res/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag byas te/_de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 
[\[78b.7\]]phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]kyi bu mo gang la las/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par byas pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma 
[\[79a.2\]]bral bar byas te/_de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas na/_
[\[79a.3\]]de nyid bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rim gror bgyis pa dang /_bkur stir bgyis pa dang /_bsti stang du 
[\[79a.4\]]bgyis pa dang /_mchod par bgyis pas ni/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror bgyis pa dang /_bkur stir bgyis pa dang /_bsti stang du bgyis pa dang /_
[\[79a.5\]]mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las/_sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/_rin po 
[\[79a.6\]]che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/_de dag la bskal ba'am/_bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_
[\[79a.7\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/_bkur stir bgyis/_bsti stang du bgyis/_mchod par bgyis pa dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las/_sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/_
[\[79b.2\]]rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/_de dag la bskal pa'am/_bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na 
[\[79b.3\]]bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/_bkur stir bgyis/_bsti stang du bgyis/_mchod par bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar dgongs/_de'i slad du rigs kyi bu 
[\[79b.4\]]'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka mang ngo /_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha 
[\[79b.5\]]rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid cing /_de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna 
[\[79b.6\]]tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/_bkur stir bgyis/_bsti stang du bgyis/_mchod par bgyis na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i nang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te/_'di ltar 
[\[79b.7\]]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang 
[\[80a.2\]]dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[80a.3\]]med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[80a.4\]]'jug pa dgu dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_
[\[80a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang 'dus so/_/de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ste/_de la bslabs shing 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos 
[\[80a.6\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin par gyur to/_/phyin to/_phyin par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[80a.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_gong du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[80b.2\]]dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas na/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/_
[\[80b.3\]]dpag tu med par 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/shes rab 
[\[80b.4\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba ni pha rol du phyin pa lnga dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub 
[\[80b.5\]]kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[80b.6\]]pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams 
[\[80b.7\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga dang /_sems can yongs su smin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o//
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba ni/_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs 
[\[81a.2\]]rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po'o/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/_/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris te/_glegs 
[\[81a.3\]]bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil 
[\[81a.4\]]snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas na/_bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang 
[\[81a.5\]]bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dper yang nye bar mi 'gro/_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ji srid du 
[\[81a.6\]]'dzam bu'i gling du gnas pa de srid du/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de srid du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_
[\[81a.7\]]tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_
[\[81b.2\]]dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms 
[\[81b.3\]]par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_
[\[81b.4\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[81b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de srid du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams dang /_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_
[\[81b.6\]]sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_
[\[81b.7\]]phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung ba yod do/_/bla na med pa'i 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod do/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi 
[\[82a.2\]]lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang ji snyed yod pa de dag la/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/_grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gzung bar bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/klag par bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[82a.3\]]bya'o/_grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par byas pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni/_sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 
[\[82a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag dkon mchog gsum gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/_pha rol du phyin pa thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[82a.5\]]bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags 
[\[82a.6\]]pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong 
[\[82a.7\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa 
[\[82b.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal ba/_kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/kau 
[\[82b.3\]]shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka nam lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang thab mo bya'o/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang mtshams brdal lo snyam na de'i 
[\[82b.4\]]tshe/_kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yid kyis soms la kha ton gyis shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang /_des lha ma yin gyi bsam pa de dag phyir nub par 'gyur te/_sems bskyed pa de dag slos shing rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur 
[\[82b.5\]]ro/_/lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe/_nam bdag cag ngan song su skye bar mthong na yang /_kau shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di kha ton du gyis shig dang /_de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[82b.6\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mos pas lha'i gnas de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos pa ni de ltar don dang ldan pa ste/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/_de dag gis shes rab 
[\[82b.7\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings 
[\[83a.2\]]su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /_bla na med 
[\[83a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji 
[\[83a.4\]]snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid bslabs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab 
[\[83a.5\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[83a.6\]]ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig sngags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 
[\[83a.7\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o/_dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig sngags so/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 
[\[83b.2\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 
[\[83b.3\]]'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i 
[\[83b.4\]]phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rig sngags 'di yod na/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig 
[\[83b.5\]]rten na yod pa yin/_pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[83b.6\]]rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[83b.7\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[84a.2\]]chos nyid dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_mig lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong 
[\[84a.3\]]ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[84a.4\]]yod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_rgyun du zhugs pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba 
[\[84a.5\]]dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin no/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na 
[\[84a.6\]]rtsi dang /_rgyu skar dang /_skar ma thams cad gdags su yod do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/_dge ba'i spyod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_
[\[84a.7\]]stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs 
[\[84b.2\]]kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rtsi thams cad gdags su yod do/_/slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu skar dang /_
[\[84b.3\]]skar ma thams cad kyang gdags su yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe na yang /_byang chub sems 
[\[84b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/_sems can rnams la 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po 
[\[84b.5\]]rnams te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/_pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /_'phags 
[\[84b.6\]]pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la spyod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug 
[\[84b.7\]]dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi sar mi ltung ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du mi byed pa dang /_sems can yongs 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]su smin par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_tshe phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa 
[\[85a.2\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung bar rig par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_
[\[85a.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang /_tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin 
[\[85a.4\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang ldan par 
[\[85a.5\]]'gyur ba lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de sngon gyi las kyi 
[\[85a.6\]]rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par/_dug gis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/mes dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/chus dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/nad brgya rtsa gcig gi bar gyis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang 
[\[85a.7\]]bla mas gnod par bya ba zhig byung ba las/_gal te rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/_de la glags tshol ba de dag gis glags mi rnyed de/_rgyal po'i bu dang /_rgyal po'i 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]blon po chen po dag kyang gtam dri ba dang /_gtam bya bar sems shing /_dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid dang mthus de ltar sems so/_/gal te rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[85b.2\]]mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid kha ton du byed cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/_de la rgyal po'i bu'am rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam dri ba dang /_gtam bya bar sems shing dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i 
[\[85b.3\]]phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag_/snying rje'i sems dang /_dga' ba'i sems dang /_btang snyoms kyi sems nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir te/_kau shi ka
