[\[85b.4\]]rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni/_tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka tshe rabs gzhan gyi 
[\[85b.5\]]yon tan gang dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/_'di lta ste nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_pha rol du phyin pa drug dang /_byang 
[\[85b.6\]]chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[85b.7\]]'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par/_nam yang sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 
[\[86a.2\]]'jig rten du mi skye'o/_/de nam yang yan lag nyams pa can du mi 'gyur/_nam yang dbul po'i rigs su mi skye/_smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/_sme sha can gyi rigs sam/_mgar ba'am/_phyag dar ba'am/_shen pa'am/_phag gsod pa'i rigs sam/_
[\[86a.3\]]dmangs rigs su mi skye ste/_rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi khams gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/_
[\[86a.4\]]nam yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[86a.5\]]te/_de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo yon tan 'di dag phun sum tshogs par 
[\[86a.6\]]'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_kun chub par bya/_tshul bzhin du yid la bya/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bya'o/_/de dag ni nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[86a.7\]]chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe 'di'i yon tan dang /_tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas mu stegs can 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]gzhan dang /_kun du rgyu ba glags pa blta ba'i bsam pa can brgya tsam zhig_/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ba dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun du rgyu ba brgya po glags blta ba'i bsam pa 
[\[86b.2\]]can 'di dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas de la bdag gis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brjod pas/_mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun du rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong nas/_bar chad byed par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis bcom 
[\[86b.3\]]ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha ton du bya'o snyam nas/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las ji snyed bzung ba de dag kha ton du brjod do/_/de nas mu stegs 
[\[86b.4\]]can gzhan dang /_kun du rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de ltar mu stegs can gzhan 
[\[86b.5\]]dang /_kun du rgyu ba de dag gis/_rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas te/_lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir dong na/_de ci'i rgyu zhig snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun 
[\[86b.6\]]du rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par bsams pas/_de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun du rgyu ba 'di dag 
[\[86b.7\]]rgyang ring po ring po nas nga la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun du rgyu ba 'di dag las 'ga' tsam yang dkar po'i sems dang ldan par ma mthong ste/_
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun du rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_glags blta ba'i bsam pa can sha stag ste/_'khor 'dir 'ong bar sems pa sha stag kyang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas 
[\[87a.2\]]pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs par bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_zhe sdang ba'i sems sam/_glags blta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro ba ma mthong ste/_de 
[\[87a.3\]]ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang 
[\[87a.4\]]ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan 
[\[87a.5\]]yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[87a.6\]]gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes 
[\[87a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po 
[\[87b.2\]]gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/_/de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_
[\[87b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur/_'dod pa la spyod pa dang /_gzugs la spyod pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur pa las/_'dir ni gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[87b.4\]]dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyis/_de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste bar chad bya'o snyam nas/_bdud sdig to can gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas/_bcom 
[\[87b.5\]]ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/_/kye ma bdud sdig to can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro bar 'dod la/_bdud sdig 
[\[87b.6\]]to can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi rnam par bkod pa 'di ni/_rgyal po bi ma bi sA ra'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam mi phod/_rgyal po sde rab tu pham byed dang /_shAkya rnams dang /_li tsa byi rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag 
[\[87b.7\]]bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam mi phod de/_bdud sdig to can 'di ni yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la yang glags lta zhing glags tshol/_sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la yang gtse ba'i bsam pa can yin gyis/_bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]pa 'di yang dag par bsam par bya'o/_/dran pas brjod par bya'o snyam nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsams te/_dran pas gsal bar brjod pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_ji lta ji ltar 
[\[88a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa de lta de ltar/_bdud sdig can de dag lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir log go/_/de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis/_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_
[\[88a.3\]]na bza' mang po mngon par sprul nas/_bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor te/_mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad du brjod do/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la yun ring por spyod 
[\[88a.4\]]par gyur cig_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/_dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing /_dge 'dun 
[\[88a.5\]]dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/_
[\[88a.6\]]dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring por gnas shing /_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur zhe'o/_/phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[88a.7\]]rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o/_/phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]po brgya byin dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du/_de 
[\[88b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/_dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing /_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[88b.3\]]dang /_phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/_dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing /_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[88b.4\]]ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba'i phyogs 
[\[88b.5\]]de ni snang ba dang ldan par ngas shes so/_/phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar ngas shes so/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog mod po mngon par sprul nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor te/_'di skad kyi tshig 
[\[88b.6\]]brjod do/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/_'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid cing /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdud dam 
[\[88b.7\]]bdud kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]zhe na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de ni ston pa'am/_ston pa dang mtshungs pa tsam du bdag cag sems so/_/
[\[89a.2\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[89a.3\]]bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dma' ba dang ldan pa ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni sngon 
[\[89a.4\]]gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/_sangs 
[\[89a.5\]]rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[89a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa btsal bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan 
[\[89a.7\]]ma lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so//
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/
[\[89b.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang /_
[\[89b.3\]]gzhan la/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin te/_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga ba las/_le'u nyi 
[\[89b.4\]]shu pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod par mdzad pa de ltar/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ming yang 
[\[89b.5\]]yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/_de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/_/de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[89b.6\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/_/de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/_/de ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_
[\[89b.7\]]stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/_/de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/_/de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 
[\[90a.2\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[90a.3\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/_pha rol du phyin pa lnga dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_
[\[90a.4\]]'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[90a.5\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs 
[\[90a.6\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag gi thog mar 'gro'o/_/kun du 'dren pa'o/_/dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsdos pa'i sbyin pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin nam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs 
[\[90a.7\]]su ma bsngos pa'i tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]pa'i sbyin pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[90b.2\]]stsal ba dga' bo gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin no/_/dga' bo gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul 
[\[90b.3\]]khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin no/_/mi skye ba'i tshul dang /_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[90b.4\]]rol du phyin pa yin no/_/mi skye ba dang /_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin no/_/gsol 
[\[90b.5\]]ba/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_mi skye ba'i tshul dang /_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lags/_ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang 
[\[90b.6\]]mi skye ba'i tshul dang /_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[90b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal ba/_gzugs gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /_byang chub kyi bar du gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis de ltar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]'das ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar byang chub kyi bar du gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul lags/_bcom 
[\[91a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[91a.3\]]'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_pha rol du phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/byang chub kyi bar ni byang chub kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub dang /_pha rol du phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar 
[\[91a.4\]]med do/_/dga' bo de lta bas na pha rol du phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[91a.5\]]rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[91a.6\]]thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byang chub kyi bar gyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes 
[\[91a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid do/_/dga' bo 'di lta ste/_dper na/_sa chen po la sa bon btab pa rgyu rkyen tshogs par gyur nas/_rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba yang /_sa chen po ni de dag gi gnas te/_sa chen po de la rten cing sa bon de dag skye bar 'gyur 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]ro/_/de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rten cing /_pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa 
[\[91b.2\]]rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs 
[\[91b.3\]]kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/_/thams cad shes pa nyid 
[\[91b.4\]]dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel te/_dga' bo rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_pha rol du phyin pa lnga rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_stong pa nyid thams 
[\[91b.5\]]cad rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs 
[\[91b.6\]]lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[91b.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[92a.2\]]pa nyid la rten cing /_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/_/dga' bo de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_pha rol du phyin pa lnga po 'di dag yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/stong pa nyid thams 
[\[92a.3\]]cad yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su 
[\[92a.4\]]sgrub pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid 
[\[92a.5\]]dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po 
[\[92a.6\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga 
[\[92a.7\]]pa/_bam po sum cu gsum pa/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i yon tan gang /_
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las thos te/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig mchis 
[\[92b.2\]]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig bdag gis/_bcom ldan 'das las bzung ste/_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_spel ba de dag thams cad ni bka' ma stsal te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[92b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_spel ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 
[\[92b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i 
[\[92b.5\]]pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[92b.6\]]bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du 'jig rten 
[\[92b.7\]]du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par bgyis pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/'og 
[\[93a.2\]]min gyi bar gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par bgyis pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 
[\[93a.3\]]mchis so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[93a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par bgyis pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[93a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par byas pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa de'i yon tan ni/_der zad 
[\[93a.6\]]par yang ma bshad de/_kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[93a.7\]]nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni tshul khrims kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]du yid la byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur 
[\[93b.2\]]ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed 
[\[93b.3\]]pa de dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i don du zhugs par rig par bya'o/_/kau shi ka nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par 
[\[93b.4\]]grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang /_gang yang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung 
[\[93b.5\]]po las/_kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'di la ni/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi 
[\[93b.6\]]phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po sa brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye 
[\[93b.7\]]bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]grangs su yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bgrang bar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyan thos dang /_
[\[94a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas kyis las sems rnam par grol yang chos gang yongs su shes pa med do/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_
[\[94a.3\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /_bkur stir byed pa dang /_bsti stang du byed pa 
[\[94a.4\]]dang /_mchod par byed pa de dag tshe 'di nyid dang /_tshe rabs phyi ma la yon tan de dag kyang /_rnam pa de bzhin du 'thob par ngas bshad do/_/brgya byin gyis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 
[\[94a.5\]]'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bgyid pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_
[\[94a.6\]]byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid pa dang /_bkur stir bgyid pa dang /_bsti stang du bgyid pa dang /_mchod par bgyid pa de la ni/_bdag gis kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 
[\[94a.7\]]'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bskyang ba bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di/_kha ton du byed pa'i tshe/_lha'i bu brgya stong mang po dga' ba'i yid kyis chos nyan 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]pa'i phyir 'ongs te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa'i tshe yang /_lha'i bu de dag spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par sems so/_/chos smras pa de dag smra ba snyom par gyur na yang /_lha'i bu de dag chos kyi rim gro de nyid 
[\[94b.2\]]kyi spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par sems te/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_bris shing me tog dang /_
[\[94b.3\]]phreng ba dang /_bdug spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /_bkur stir byed pa dang /_bsti stang du byed pa dang /_mchod par byed pa de dag gis tshe 'di'i 
[\[94b.4\]]yon tan 'di yang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'khor bzhi la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston pa'i tshe/_la la zhig bdag la [{]glan ka [,]klan ka [}]tshol zhing glags lta bar gyur du 'ong ngo /_/zhes bya bar zhum 
[\[94b.5\]]pa med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bskyang ba byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la ni/_
[\[94b.6\]]'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_thun mong dang /_thun mong ma yin pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_nyan thos kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[94b.7\]]kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang tha mi dad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'di ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi gter yin la/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang /_nang stong pa nyid la gnas/_
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la glags lta ba de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gang glags lta ba de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong 
[\[95a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gang glags lta bar bya ba de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la sus kyang glags lta ba med do/_/kau shi ka gzhan 
[\[95a.3\]]yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur/_yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur/_'jigs par mi 
[\[95a.4\]]'gyur/_sdang bar mi 'gyur/_skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la sus kyang glags lta ba med do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 
[\[95a.5\]]'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur/_yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur/_'jigs par mi 'gyur/_sdang bar mi 'gyur/_skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/_
[\[95a.6\]]rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gang zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/_yongs su zhum par 'gyur ba'am/_'jigs par 'gyur ba'am/_skrag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i phyir te/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_
[\[95a.7\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_bris shing de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /_bkur stir byed pa dang /_bsti stang du byed pa dang /_mchod par byed pa de dag gis tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan 
[\[95b.2\]]yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_bris shing de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug 
[\[95b.3\]]pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /_bkur stir byed pa dang /_bsti stang du byed pa dang /_mchod par byed pa de ni pha dang ma dang /_gnyen bshes dang /_
[\[95b.4\]]rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dag gis dgongs par bya ba yin/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rang sangs 
[\[95b.5\]]rgyas dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang /_mi slob pa thams cad kyis kyang dben cing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/_'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bcas bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_
[\[95b.6\]]lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pas kyang dgongs shing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/_spobs pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du 
[\[95b.7\]]phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/_nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags 
[\[96a.2\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[96a.3\]]par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_
[\[96a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mi 'phrogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba mi 'phrogs pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par 
[\[96a.5\]]'gyur ba yin/_gzhan gyis phyir brgal ba ji snyed byung ba la yang chos dang mthun par lan gdab pa'i mthu yod pa yin te/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par 
[\[96a.6\]]byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar byed pa dang /_bris shing de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[96a.7\]]ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /_bkur stir byed pa dang /_bsti stang du byed pa dang /_mchod par byed pa des tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_
[\[96b.2\]]mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge 
[\[96b.3\]]ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che ba dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der dong zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[96b.4\]]phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_gdud pa byas shing /_phyir 'dong bar sems so/_/gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha'i bu 
[\[96b.5\]]de dag kyang der dong zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_gdung ba byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/_/kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na med 
[\[96b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor 
[\[96b.7\]]dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu bla na 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha dang /_de ma yin pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[97a.2\]]sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid chen po gzi brjid che bar bya ba mang po de dag kyang der dong zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang 
[\[97a.3\]]phyag bya ba dang /_gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/_/kau shi ka de la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis kyang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_'bras 
[\[97a.4\]]bu che ba'i bar gyi lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha dang /_de ma yin pa'i lha dang /_
[\[97a.5\]]klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba'i 
[\[97a.6\]]phyir lhags pa de dag la chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed par bya ste/_de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di klags pa dang /_bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_mchod pa byas shing /_phyag byas te/_gdud 
[\[97a.7\]]pa byas nas phyir 'dong ngo /_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha dag dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha de dag kyang bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bskyang ba byed de/_kau shi ka de la las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par/_glags lta ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_
[\[97b.2\]]rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di'i yon tan de lta bu dag kyang /_yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang /_der shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba dang /_
[\[97b.3\]]rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bskyang ba bya ba'i don du 'dong bar sems te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[97b.4\]]yang dag par zhugs pa ste/_sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/brgya byin gyis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[97b.5\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_bzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_gdung ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_
[\[97b.6\]]bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod pa'i phyir rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha dag 'dir 'ongs so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka gal te shes rab 
[\[97b.7\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gang du gzhag par snang ba chen po byung bar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos mthong na/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir ni lha mthu chen po mthu chen po/_/rdzu 'phrul che ba dbang che ba/_gzi brjid che bdag shes rab kyi pha 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]rol du phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_gdud pa bya ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod pa'i phyir lhags so/_/zhes bya bar nges par khong 
[\[98a.2\]]du chud par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mos lha rdzas kyi dri ma las 'das pa/_sngon chad de lta bu tshor ma rmyong ba tshor na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des 'di ni lha mthu chen po mthu chen po/_rdzu 'phrul che ba dbang 
[\[98a.3\]]che ba dang /_gzi brjid che bdag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_bcang ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_gdud pa bya ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod pa'i phyir lhags so/_/
[\[98a.4\]]zhes bya bar nges par khong du chud par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang ldan na/_de'i gtsang sbra'i spyod pa des/_lha de dag kyang nye bar 'ongs shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_gzung ba 
[\[98a.5\]]dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par byas nas shin du dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur ro/_/gnas de na lha mthu chung ngu ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag kyang lha mthu chen po mthu chen po de dag gi gzi 
[\[98a.6\]]brjid dang /_dpal dang /_zil mi bzod pa'i phyir gnas de nas gud du 'dong bar sems so/_/ji lta ji ltar lha mthu chen po mthu chen po/_rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /_dbang che ba de dag nye bar 'ong bar sems pa/_de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de yang 
[\[98a.7\]]mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de'i gnas kyi 'khor kun du yang gtsang sbra med pa'i spyod pa mi rgyu bar byas te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir de'i 'khor gyis yang spos chu'i chag chag 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]gis btab bo/_/me tog dang /_spos kyis gtor ro/_/bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod gzhag go/_/dar gyi lda ldi dang /_gos kyi bla re bre zhing sa'i phyogs de yang rnam pa du mas brgyan par bya'o/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la ngal zhing chad par 'gyur 
[\[98b.2\]]ba med de/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ni lus bde ba dang /_lus yang ba dang /_lus gsal ba yang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des ni sems bde ba dang /_sems yang ba dang /_sems gsal ba yang 
[\[98b.3\]]nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas nub mo nyal na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la bsam pas mos par byas na/_sdig to'i rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/des mthong na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[98b.4\]]rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kun du brgyan pa/_sku gser gyi mdog tu bzhugs pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kun nas bskor ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba/_
[\[98b.5\]]chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di lta ste/_pha rol du phyin pa drug dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi chos bstan pa'ang 
[\[98b.6\]]thos par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol du phyin pa drug po de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar de dag gi don 
[\[98b.7\]]rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]par 'tshang rgya ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po chos yang dag par 'gro ba byed cing /_
[\[99a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su bsgrub par bya'o/_/sems can mang po ni 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di ltar yongs su bzung bar bya'o/_/bdud 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'di ltar pham par bya'o zhes zer 
[\[99a.3\]]ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi 
[\[99a.4\]]phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra yang thos par 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[99a.5\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /_nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan 
[\[99a.6\]]las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_steng gi phyogs kyi bar gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/_mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yang mthong 
[\[99a.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rmi lam bzang po de lta bu dag mthong bar 'gyur te/_de dag bde bar nyal zhing bde bar ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[99b.2\]]de'i lus kyang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lus la yong ba'i nyams yod par 'gyur zhing /_lci ba'i nyams med par 'gyur/_zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur/_gos la chags pa med par 'gyur/_nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad la chags pa med par 
[\[99b.3\]]'gyur/_zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/_gos kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/_nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad kyi 'du shes kyang chung bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dper na/_rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i dge slong ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i sems 
[\[99b.4\]]yid la bya bas yongs su brlan pa ni/_zas la cher chags pa med pa yin/_zas kyi 'du shes chung ba yin/_kau shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur ro/_/zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[99b.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la mi ma yin pa rnams lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo//_/shar phyogs dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[99b.6\]]ji snyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/_/kau 
[\[99b.7\]]shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'di nyid la yon tan 'di dag yongs su bzung bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la nan tan du mnyan par bya'o/_/gzung bar bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/klag par bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral bar bya'o/_/kau shi ka de ste rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ma bzung ma bcangs/_ma blags/_kun 
[\[100a.2\]]chub par ma byas/_tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas na yang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing /_glegs bam du byas te/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs 
[\[100a.3\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o/_/bkur stir bya'o/_/bsti stang du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/kau shi ka de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i don du 
[\[100a.4\]]zhugs pa yin/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing bris te/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_
[\[100a.5\]]byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_bsti stang du byed/_mchod par byed na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches 
[\[100a.6\]]mang du 'phel gyi/_phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams la/_nam 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_gzims cha 
[\[100a.7\]]dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag mya ngan las 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]'das nas kyang /_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/_nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_sbos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 
[\[100b.2\]]gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas pas ni ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[100b.3\]]kau shi ka khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba zhig kyang rnyed/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las byin na/_de las gang blang bar bya/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal 
[\[100b.4\]]te bdag 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang la las stsal/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid bdag gis blang bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[100b.5\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag rim gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags/_mi ston pa yang ma lags/_btsun par mi bgyid pa yang ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
[\[100b.6\]]gdung la rim gro bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/_bkur stir bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba'am/_bsti stang du bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/_mchod par bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /_
[\[100b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba ste/_de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rim gror bgyi ba lags/_bkur stir bgyi ba lags/_bsti stang du bgyi ba lags/_mchod par bgyi ba lags so/_/sku gdung de dag ni shes 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas bsgrubs pa ste/_de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga'o/_/bcom ldan 'das nam bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_
[\[101a.2\]]byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid cing /_bkur stir bgyid pa dang /_bsti stang du bgyid pa dang mchod par bgyid pa'i tshe yang /_de bzhin 
[\[101a.3\]]gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba lags pas na/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gror bgyi ba lags/_bkur stir bgyi ba lags/_bsti stang du bgyi ba lags/_mchod par bgyi 
[\[101a.4\]]ba lags pas bsrung zhing rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod par bgyid do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bus/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gzung du med pa 
[\[101a.5\]]gzugs med pa/_bltar med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa yin na/_de la khyod ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gzung du med pa/_gzugs med pa/_bltar med pa/_thogs pa med pa 
[\[101a.6\]]mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa la gzung bar sems/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/_'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/_'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/_bskyed 
[\[101a.7\]]pa'i phyir ma yin/_bskyung ba'i phyir ma yin/_'bri ba'i phyir ma yin/_bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/_rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]'dor ba ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/_'dus ma byas 
[\[101b.2\]]kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bar du nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid nye par sgrub pa ma yin/_dngos po med 
[\[101b.3\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[101b.4\]]yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam 
[\[101b.5\]]par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_
[\[101b.6\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de 
[\[101b.7\]]bzhin te/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar sgrub pa 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]ma yin no zhes bya bar shes pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 
[\[102a.2\]]mi gnyis pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin 
[\[102a.3\]]pa ni mi gnyis pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so/_/zhes bya ba gnang ste/_kau shi ka legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa bzhin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/_
[\[102a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni 
[\[102a.5\]]gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o/_/kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/_chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 
[\[102a.6\]]'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/kau shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[102a.7\]]du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/_chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/kau shi ka 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam 
[\[102b.2\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/kau shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[102b.3\]]du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis 
[\[102b.4\]]mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha 
[\[102b.5\]]ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/_de la bslabs pas ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[102b.6\]]rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi/_lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/_der lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig bdag gi rim gro la mchis pa de dag kun kyang 
[\[102b.7\]]bdag la mchod pa bgyid de/_nam der ba dag ma mchis shing /_stan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe yang lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to zhes stan de la g.yas 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]phyogs su bskor ba ba bgyis cing phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing 'chad ba dang /_kha ton du bgyid cing gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa der/_phyogs bcu'i 
[\[103a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[103a.3\]]sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo /_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo /_/sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo zhes/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag bgyis shing gdung 
[\[103a.4\]]ba bgyis nas slar mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pa'i slad du/_mchod pa mnga' ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[103a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to/_/rgyur gyur to/_/rkyen du gyur to/_/yongs su sgrub par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas 
[\[103a.6\]]na cha de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid len to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di blangs te/_chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe 'jigs pa'am/_
[\[103a.7\]]bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/_rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis 
[\[103b.2\]]rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa de dag ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma ma mchis/_rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/_bcom 
[\[103b.3\]]ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[103b.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_chos thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 
[\[103b.5\]]sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_smos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/_rtags ma mchis/_brjod 
[\[103b.6\]]du ma mchis/_smos su ma mchis pas/_de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[103b.7\]]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_smos su ma mchis pa'i chos bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]phyin pa 'di ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro 
[\[104a.2\]]dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o/_/bris shing me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /_
[\[104a.3\]]bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing /_'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /_de bris shing me tog 
[\[104a.4\]]dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs gyis rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa bgyid pa de ni nam bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[104a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du des sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/nyan thos kyi sa dang 
[\[104a.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[104a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]par bgyid cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'chi par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang stsal la/_shes 
[\[104b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang bris te stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid len to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_de 
[\[104b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rim gror bgyi ba dang /_bkur stir bgyi ba dang /_bsti stang du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/_de 
[\[104b.4\]]dag la rim gror bgyis/_bkur stir bgyis/_bsti stang du bgyis/_mchod par bgyis na/_log par ltung ba dang /_ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong nas/_smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa'am 
[\[104b.5\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni mi 
[\[104b.6\]]'dra ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[104b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/_mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i bar du gsungs te bshad pa dang /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]rigs kyi bu mo la las/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/_gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[105a.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/_/'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo/_/'di las byung ba ni mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i bar dag go/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan 
[\[105a.3\]]yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang po dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs 
[\[105a.4\]]re re zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/_mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i 
[\[105a.5\]]bar du gsungs te bshad pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/_gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni 
[\[105a.6\]]phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/_/'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo/_/'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_chos gtan la dbab 
[\[105a.7\]]pa bstan pa'i bar dag go/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa bgyis pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam du 
[\[105b.2\]]bris shing /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa bgyis par yang 
[\[105b.3\]]mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[105b.4\]]'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /_gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa des ni/_sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin 
[\[105b.5\]]rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig 
[\[105b.6\]]par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin to/_/'chang ngo /_/klog go/_/kun chub par bgyid do/_/tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do/_/bris pa de la yang me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_
[\[105b.7\]]byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/_bkur stir bgyid/_bsti stang du bgyid/_mchod par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o/_/nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_
[\[106a.2\]]klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod 
[\[106a.3\]]par bgyis pa des ni/_gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas/_rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la rten na/_de rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la rten 
[\[106a.4\]]pas/_sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la brten pas/_de dag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gsha' ste/_gang rgyal po la brten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la brten pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 
[\[106a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na mchod pa mnga'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs par blta'o/_/
[\[106a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na bdag gis cha de gnyis las/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so/_/'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa 
[\[106a.7\]]gnyis so/_/'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad do/_/'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'o//
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol du phyin pa lnga ste/_de dag pha rol du phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/_/'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar te/_bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/_grong rdal lam/_grong khyer ram/_
[\[106b.2\]]khams sam/_rgyal po'i gnas sam/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_bris shing rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_
[\[106b.3\]]mchod pa bgyid pa de dag tu mi'am mi ma lags pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las/_theg pa gang yang rung bas mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos 
[\[106b.4\]]can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don du nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan
