[\[106b.5\]]'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mchis pa'i/_'jig rten gyi khams der ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chen po mi dpogs rin chen ces bgyi ba mchis 
[\[106b.6\]]te/_de ni nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/_nor bu rin po che de gang dang gang du gzhag pa de dang der/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]ma lags pa rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/mi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa'am/_bud med kyang nor bu rin po che de 
[\[106b.7\]]bstan na/_mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod de myur du 'pho zhing mi gnas so/_/mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/_mkhris pa de'ang 'byong bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung gis mnar ba'i 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/_rlung de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/_bad kan de'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'dus pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i lus la nor bu 
[\[107a.2\]]rin po che chen po btags na/_'dus pa'i nad de'ang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par mi 'phel lo/_/nub mo ni nor bu rin po che chen po de snang bar bgyid do/_/tsha ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do/_/grang 
[\[107a.3\]]ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de dro bar bgyid do/_/nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de yang /_ha cang yang mi dro ha kyang yang mi grang zhing ran pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/_/nor bu rin po che 
[\[107a.4\]]chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i dog sa'i phyogs der sbrul lam/_de ma lags pa'i sdig pa la sogs pa gdug pa dang /_gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam 
[\[107a.5\]]po sum cu bzhi pa/_bcom ldan 'das skyes pa'am/_bud med la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin pa la/_nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na/_des de mthong ma thag tu dug de yang byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon 
[\[107a.6\]]tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/_skyes pa'am/_bud med la la zhig 'brum bus btab bam mig rab rib can du gyur te/_mig gi nad dam/_rna ba'i nad dam/_sna'i nad dam/_lce'i nad dam/_lkog ma'i nad dam/_lus kyi nad cig byung ba las de'i lus 
[\[107a.7\]]la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/_de dag gi 'brum bu'am/_rab rib bam/_mig gi nad dam/_rna ba'i nad dam/_sna'i nad dam/_lce'i nad dam/_lkog ma'i nad dam/_lus kyi nad de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan no/_/gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de dag chab rnyog pa can kyi nang du stsal na/_de'i mod la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/_/gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de 
[\[107b.2\]]gos sngon pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/_chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/_/gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser po'am/_dmar po'am/_dkar po'am/_leb rgan nam/_shel gyi kha dog gam/_gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 
[\[107b.3\]]nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/_chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/_/chab de la rnyog pa mchis pa yang /_nor bu rin po che chen po des dang ste/_bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang /_
[\[107b.4\]]gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/_sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' 
[\[107b.5\]]bos/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam/_'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la yang yod/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa 
[\[107b.6\]]dga' bo nor bu rin po che chen po de ni lha rdzas te/_btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che gang yod pa de dag ni chung zhing lci/_lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni che zhing yang ste/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag 
[\[107b.7\]]ni lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che de dag gis ni/_lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de'i grangs sam/_cha 'am/_bgrang ba 'am/_dpe'am/_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de nas 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la zhig gi nang du stsal ba las/_snod de nas phyung yang snod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yid du 
[\[108a.2\]]mchi bar 'gyur te/_gzhan yang snod de la mos pa skyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gi lus sam sems kyi sdug bsngal dang /_gnod pa mi las gyur pa'am/_
[\[108a.3\]]mi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyi ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[108a.4\]]'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i snod do/_/bcom ldan 'das bsam 
[\[108a.5\]]gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa 
[\[108a.6\]]nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_
[\[108a.7\]]bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[108b.2\]]dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_
[\[108b.3\]]chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa dang /_mi nyam pa'i 
[\[108b.4\]]chos nyid kyi yon tan ni ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/_mi nyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi nyam pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa 
[\[108b.5\]]mnga'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol du phyin pa rin po che'i snod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol du phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang /_pha rol du phyin 
[\[108b.6\]]pa mi skye mi 'gag pa dang /_pha rol du phyin pa blang ba ma mchis dor ba ma mchis pa dang /_pha rol du phyin pa dbri ba ma mchis bsnan pa ma mchis pa dang /_pha rol du phyin pa 'ong ba ma mchis 'gro ba ma mchis/_gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod do/_/de bas na 
[\[108b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol du phyin pa'i chos nyid kyi snod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol du phyin pa'i chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgos 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]pa'o/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/_/gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur 
[\[109a.2\]]yongs su gtams pa lta zhog_/bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/_
[\[109a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid len to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te mchod 
[\[109a.4\]]pa mnga'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mnga' ste/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim 
[\[109a.5\]]gror bgyid pa dang /_bkur stir bgyid pa dang /_bsti stang du bgyid pa dang /_mchod par bgyid pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' mi dmigs shing /_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing 
[\[109a.6\]]mtho ba'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum mam/_mtshe ma 'am/_dga' ldan nam/_'phrul dga' 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang /_lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de 
[\[109a.7\]]nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu lta de tsam du bas kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang /_blags shing kun chub par bgyis pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su 
[\[109b.2\]]rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[109b.3\]]ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/_/rgyal rigs che zhing 
[\[109b.4\]]mtho ba'am/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'i lus sam/_brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/_tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/_ngal bso po'i gzugs kyang rung ste/_de lus de dag gis sems can yongs su 
[\[109b.5\]]smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 
[\[109b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags/_glo ba mchis 
[\[109b.7\]]pa yang ma mchis/_mchod par mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags/_gzung bar mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]dang /_mchod pa bgyis na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin du bsags pa lags/_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang rim gro dang /_bkur 
[\[110a.2\]]sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed 
[\[110a.3\]]cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag chos kyi sku dang /_gzugs kyi sku dang /_ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing mchod par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_
[\[110a.4\]]klag par bgyi/_kun chub par bgyi/_mchod par bgyi/_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/_tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyid te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang 
[\[110a.5\]]tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa des/_chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes 
[\[110a.6\]]su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gzung 
[\[110a.7\]]bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_klag par bgyi/_kun chub par bgyi/_mchod par bgyi/_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/_chos nyid tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]chos nyid de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/_nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_phyi stong 
[\[110b.2\]]pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ye shes dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ye shes dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_
[\[110b.3\]]tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ye 
[\[110b.4\]]shes dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi ye shes dang /_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams 
[\[110b.5\]]kyi ye shes dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni/_'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/_/de 
[\[110b.6\]]la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/_de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /_gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /_gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma 
[\[110b.7\]]mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang /_'phel ba ma mchis pa dang /_'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/_de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/_chos thams cad ni dngos po ma 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[111a.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la rten te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin 
[\[111a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la rten cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/da ltar 
[\[111a.4\]]byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 
[\[111a.5\]]nyid la brten te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang /_
[\[111a.6\]]ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 
[\[111a.7\]]yod pa de dag gis kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]ro/_/'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa dag na/_rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba 
[\[111b.2\]]de dag gis kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rang byang chub thob bo//_//'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag kyang mtshan ma med 
[\[111b.3\]]pa'i tshul dang /_dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang /_skye ba med pa'i tshul dang /_'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang /_len pa med pa dang /_'dor ba med pa'i tshul dang /_dbri ba med pa dang /_
[\[111b.4\]]bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/_de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni ring du song ba ma yin/_pha rol du 
[\[111b.5\]]phyin pa ma yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshu rol ma yin/_pha rol ma yin/_thad du 'dug pa ma yin/_gshor du 'dug pa ma yin/_mnyam pa ma yin/_mi mnyam pa ma yin/_mtshan ma ma yin/_mtshan ma med pa ma yin/_
[\[111b.6\]]'jig rten pa ma yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/_'dus byas ma yin/_'dus ma byas ma yin/_dge ba ma yin/_mi dge ba ma yin/_'das pa ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa ma yin/_da ltar byung ba ma yin te/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 
[\[111b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin te/_dgra bcom pa'i bar gyi chos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni/_sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yang 
[\[112a.2\]]'tshal te/_sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/sems can du gdags par dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang 
[\[112a.3\]]byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/mig du dmigs pa 
[\[112a.4\]]ma mchis/_yid kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis/_chos kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/mig 
[\[112a.5\]]gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/
[\[112a.6\]]sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/ma rig par dmigs pa ma ma mchis/_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[112a.7\]]pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shir dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis/_tshul khrims kyi 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis/_dngos po 
[\[112b.2\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags 
[\[112b.3\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/rnam 
[\[112b.4\]]par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma ma mchis/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/
[\[112b.5\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma ma mchis/_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su 
[\[112b.6\]]dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/rang byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/
[\[112b.7\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_byang chub dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni dmigs pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang /_gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang /_gang du dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub 
[\[113a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yun ring por spyad pas/_des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/_sangs rgyas lta ci smos/_sangs rgyas kyi chos lta yang ci smos/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_
[\[113a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod kyi de ma lags pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha 
[\[113a.4\]]rol du phyin pa drug po kun la yang /_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/_des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/_gtong ba yang mi dmigs/_len pa yang mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/_tshul 
[\[113a.5\]]khrims ngan pa yang mi dmigs so/_/bzod pa yang mi dmigs/_/bzod pa dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/_gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so/_/brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/_le lo yang mi dmigs so/_/
[\[113a.6\]]bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/_bsam gtan dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/_'khrug pa yang mi dmigs so/_/shes rab kyang mi dmigs/_shes rab dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/_shes rab 'chal pa yang mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka 'on kyang shes 
[\[113a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid mi dmigs 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]pa'i tshul dang /_gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang 
[\[113b.2\]]lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 
[\[113b.3\]]'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 
[\[113b.4\]]tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i 
[\[113b.5\]]khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga 
[\[113b.6\]]shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[113b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa'i 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[114a.2\]]par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[114a.3\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom 
[\[114a.4\]]pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin 
[\[114a.5\]]pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba'i/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/shes 
[\[114a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su sgrub pa'i/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 
[\[114a.7\]]'grus rtsom pa'i/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu'i gling gi 
[\[114b.2\]]shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/_me tog sna tshogs can/_'bras bu sna tshogs can/_dbyibs sna tshogs can/_chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang /_de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs te/_gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro 
[\[114b.3\]]bar zad do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su zin pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la yang khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs so/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[114b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du/_yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/_tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan 
[\[114b.5\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/_yon tan kun du mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/_
[\[114b.6\]]'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te/_bcangs pa dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/_bkur stir bgyis/_bsti 
[\[114b.7\]]stang du bgyis/_mchod par bgyis te/_de nas gong du ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te/_
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]gzhan la stsal na/_de gnyis las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[115a.2\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas 
[\[115a.3\]]bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te bgo bshar byas pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_
[\[115a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/_bkur 
[\[115a.5\]]stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas na/_de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/_brgya phyin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/_de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[115a.6\]]kyi bu mo gang gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/_bkur stir bgyis/_bsti 
[\[115a.7\]]stang du bgyis/_mchod par bgyis pa bas gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na/_'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas/_rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/_sems can gyi ris na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po bskyed de/_
[\[115b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la las chung ngu na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la/_mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/_de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i 
[\[115b.3\]]rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[115b.4\]]du phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/_bkur 
[\[115b.5\]]stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas pa bas/_gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris te/_chos kyi dga' bas gzhan la byin na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams cher 'phel lo/_/kau shi 
[\[115b.6\]]ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du/_gzhan gyi drung du song ste bshad cing bstan pa dang /_brjod cing bkrol ba dang /_rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na 
[\[115b.7\]]rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ni/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag pas/_bsod nams cher 'phel te/_de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo/_/bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig/_
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]yin par bsam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/_ston pa ni gzhan/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[116a.2\]]nyid kyang ston pa/_ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[116a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[116a.4\]]tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med de/_de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[116a.5\]]tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /_nyan thos kyi theg pa 
[\[116a.6\]]pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob po/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis 
[\[116a.7\]]kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /_rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs so/_/'jug go/_/'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[116b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[116b.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du 
[\[116b.4\]]rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang /_bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang /_bsti stang du bya bar 'dod pa dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris te/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_
[\[116b.5\]]phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o/_/bkur stir bya'o/_/bsti stang du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/kau shi ka ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par 
[\[116b.6\]]mthong ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/_gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa byas te/_brten cing rnam par spyad par bya 
[\[116b.7\]]snyam na yang /_kau shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na/_nga dang 'dra ba'am/_lhag 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/_de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/_de lta yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_
[\[117a.2\]]bsti stang dang /_mchod pa byas te/_brten cing rnam par spyad par bya'o/_snyam du bsams so/_kau shi ka chos de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/_kau shi ka de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab 
[\[117a.3\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_bsti stang du byed/_mchod par byed de/_de ltar rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs 
[\[117a.4\]]kyi bu mo/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_
[\[117a.5\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[117a.6\]]kyi bu mo dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_
[\[117a.7\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba ni/_
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so/_/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[117b.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las byung ba ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams so/_/kau shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 
[\[117b.3\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mos/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs 
[\[117b.4\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o/_/bkur stir bya'o/_/bsti stang du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/de ltar de la slob pa'i/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_bla na 
[\[117b.5\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /_
[\[117b.6\]]dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[117b.7\]]du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u nyi shu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gal te/_'dzam bu'i 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar 
[\[118a.2\]]gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa'am bri ba'am kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes 
[\[118a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang /_'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur ba dang /_'thob pa dang 
[\[118a.4\]]thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang /_'thob pa dang /_thob par 'gyur ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems 
[\[118a.5\]]dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa dang /_'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[118a.6\]]'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bar dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[118a.7\]]kyi bar dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[118b.2\]]ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_
[\[118b.3\]]sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka dge ba bcu'i las 
[\[118b.4\]]kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni/_sems can dmyal 
[\[118b.5\]]ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos/_kau shi ka gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems 
[\[118b.6\]]can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la bkod pa bas la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la bzhag na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 
[\[118b.7\]]'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub la bkod pa bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]gcig po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang dgra 
[\[119a.2\]]bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[119a.3\]]kyang mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/_'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang phreng ba dang /_spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang /_na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal 
[\[119a.4\]]mtshan dang ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams 
[\[119a.5\]]cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 
[\[119a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam bri ba'am klag pa'am kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i 
[\[119a.7\]]phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_/'jug par 'gyur ro//
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_yang dag pa'i 
[\[119b.2\]]skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_/'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 
[\[119b.3\]]zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol du phyin pa drug dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_
[\[119b.4\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[119b.5\]]thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_
[\[119b.6\]]btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/_klags pa dang /_bri ba 
[\[119b.7\]]dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/_de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul 
[\[120a.2\]]dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris dang tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang tshangs chen dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams yod do/_/pha 
[\[120a.3\]]rol du phyin pa thams cad yod do/_/stong pa nyid thams cad yod do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms 
[\[120a.4\]]par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod 
[\[120a.5\]]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[120a.6\]]bar du yod do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[120a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /_rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]ji snyed pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_
[\[120b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/_klag pa dang /_bri ba 
[\[120b.3\]]dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las skyes pa ni/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[120b.4\]]dpa'i chos thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad do/_/kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /_rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi/_
[\[120b.5\]]kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod/_rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam 
[\[120b.6\]]du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_kau shi ka 
[\[120b.7\]]de bas rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]rten gyi khams byur bu lta zhog gi/_kau shi ka stong gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi khams/_'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa 
[\[121a.2\]]dang /_rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod pa na kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa 
[\[121a.3\]]mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/_bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/_bsod 
[\[121a.4\]]nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka stong gnyis pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/_kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_
[\[121a.5\]]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod pa na kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[121a.6\]]ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/_bri ba dang /_klag 
[\[121a.7\]]pa dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta zhog gi/_kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de 
[\[121b.2\]]ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_
[\[121b.3\]]kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/_bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i 
[\[121b.4\]]phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las/_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo da ga_/yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par 
[\[121b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/'jug go/_/'jug par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[121b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_/'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par 
[\[121b.7\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos/_de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]pa nyid kyi bar dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar 
[\[122a.2\]]ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[122a.3\]]pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/
[\[122a.4\]]kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/_de bas 'di'i 
[\[122a.5\]]bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_bram ze'i rigs 
[\[122a.6\]]che zhing mtho ba dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_
[\[122a.7\]]tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams yod 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]do/_/pha rol du phyin pa rnams yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yod 
[\[122b.2\]]do/_thams cad shes pa nyid yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs 
[\[122b.3\]]rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_
[\[122b.4\]]rigs kyi bu mo la las/_bsam gtan bzhi la bkod/_tshad med pa bzhi la bkod/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bkod/_mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi 
[\[122b.5\]]bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi 
[\[122b.6\]]pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to/_/
[\[122b.7\]]kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling lta zhog_/gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang lta zhog_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang lta zhog_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang lta zhog_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta yang zhog gi 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]kau shi ka shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re 
[\[123a.2\]]zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_bsam gtan bzhi la bkod/_tshad med pa bzhi la bkod/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bkod/_
[\[123a.3\]]mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom 
[\[123a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glags bam/_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 
[\[123a.5\]]'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las/_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par 
[\[123a.6\]]zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_/'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang byang 
[\[123a.7\]]chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_/'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[123b.2\]]pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[123b.3\]]rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi sems can dang /_phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re re zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/_sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[123b.4\]]dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no/_/de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni 'di yin te/_gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi 
[\[123b.5\]]gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi gnyis 
[\[123b.6\]]pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'dzin pa 
[\[123b.7\]]dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_nang stong pa nyid 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[124a.2\]]stong pa nyid kyi bar du tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po sum cu lnga ba/_gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_
[\[124a.3\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis 
[\[124a.4\]]la spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i 
[\[124a.5\]]blos/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gzhan la rnam grangs du 
[\[124a.6\]]mar rgya cher rjod cing ston la/_'chad cing 'grel ba dang /_rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/_yang dag par ston cing de'i don gtan la dbab pa ston pa byed na/_kau shi ka de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin 
[\[124a.7\]]te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gnyis su blta ba ma yin/_gnyis su med par blta ba ma yin/_mtshan mar ma yin/_mtshan ma med par ma yin/_blang bar ma yin/_dor bar ma yin/_dbri bar ma yin/_bsnan par ma 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]yin/_kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/_rnam par byang bar ma yin/_skye bar ma yin/_'gag par ma yin/_gzung bar ma yin/_mi gzung bar ma yin/_len par ma yin/_dor bar ma yin/_gnas par ma yin/_
[\[124b.2\]]mi gnas par ma yin/_yang dag par ma yin/_log par ma yin/_ldan par ma yin/_mi ldan par ma yin/_'dre bar ma yin/_mi 'dre bar ma yin/_rkyen du ma yin/_rkyen med par ma yin/_chos su ma yin/_chos ma yin par 
[\[124b.3\]]ma yin/_de bzhin nyid du ma yin/_de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par ma yin te/_'di ni gnyis su med pa'i don to/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[124b.4\]]du phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing ston la/_'chad cing 'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/_yang dag par ston par byed cing /_de'i don gtan la dbab par ston na/_bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/_
[\[124b.5\]]bdag 'ba' shig gis bzung ba'am/_kun chub par byas pa'am/_bcangs pa'am/_blags pa'am/_tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni ma yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 
[\[124b.6\]]bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dzin cing /_kun chub par byed de/_'chang zhing klog la/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_gzhan la yang rgya cher rjod cing ston la/_'chad cing 'grel ba dang /_rnam par 
[\[124b.7\]]'byed cing gsal bar byed la/_yang dag par ston par byed cing /_de'i don gtan la dbab par ston na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ni shin du mang du 'phel lo/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan la yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bgyi 'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[125a.2\]]kyi bu mos/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya ste/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ni bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi 
[\[125a.3\]]ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re re zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med/_grangs med pa dag la/_nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_
[\[125a.4\]]spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /_bkur stir byas pa dang /_bsti stang du byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas 
[\[125a.5\]]pa bas/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_
[\[125a.6\]]yang dag par bstan pa byas na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de ni ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[125a.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/_bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du 
[\[125b.2\]]phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa bas ni/_gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_gzhan la rgya cher brjod cing ston 
[\[125b.3\]]la 'chad cing rnam par 'god pa dang /_rab tu 'god cing rnam par 'byed la/_gsal bar byed cing yang dag par ston pa byed na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de la dmigs pa ni 'di yin te/_kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[125b.4\]]dpa' dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa gtong zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa gtong ngo /_/sbyin pa ni 'di gtong ngo /_/'di la ni sbyin par bya'o snyam na/_des sbyin pa de ltar btang bas sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no/_/
[\[125b.5\]]bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo /_/tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo snyam na/_des tshul khrims de ltar bsrungs bas/_tshul khrims nyid du 'gyur gyi/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no/_/bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo/_/bzod pa 'di sgom mo 
[\[125b.6\]]snyam na/_des bzod pa de ltar bsgoms pas/_bzod pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/'di'i don du brtson 'grus brtsam mo snyam na/_des brtson 'grus de ltar brtsams 
[\[125b.7\]]pas/_brtson 'grus nyid du 'gyur gyi/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no/_/bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug go/_/bsam gtan ni 'di dag la mnyam par gzhag go_/snyam na/_des bsam gtan la de ltar 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]mnyam par bzhag pas/_bsam gtan nyid du 'gyur gyi/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no/_/bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/_/shes rab ni 'di bsgom mo snyam na/_des shes rab de ltar bsgoms pas 
[\[126a.2\]]shes rab nyid du 'gyur gyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ltar dmigs pa la spyad pas ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa/_yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshul 
[\[126a.3\]]khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[126a.4\]]pos/_ji ltar spyad na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_ji ltar spyad na/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_ji ltar spyad na/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[126a.5\]]'gyur/_ji ltar spyad na/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_ji ltar spyad na/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_ji ltar spyad na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs 
[\[126a.6\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'di la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/_yongs su gtong ba mi dmigs/_sbyin pa dang len pa mi dmigs so/_/tshul 
[\[126a.7\]]khrims srung ba'i tshe/_tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims yang dag par blang bar mi dmigs so/_/bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/_bzod pa dang /_bzod pa bsgom pa mi dmigs so/_/brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/_brtson 'grus dang /_
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi dmigs so/_/bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan dang bsam gtan sgom pa mi dmigs so/_/shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/_shes rab dang shes rab bsgom pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka de ltar 
[\[126b.2\]]spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du 
[\[126b.3\]]phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar khong du chud pa med par/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du 
[\[126b.4\]]phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bstan par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rigs kyi bu'am rigs bu mo la la/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[126b.5\]]theg pa pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa 'byung ste/_der rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag gis kyang gzugs brnyan de thos nas/_lam ston par 'gyur te/_de dag la shes 
[\[126b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 
[\[126b.7\]]'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan to/_/snyam zhing de dag gzugs brnyan ston pa byed pa'o/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston par byed pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston te/_de la 'di 
[\[127a.2\]]ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan te/_'di ltar gzugs mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_
[\[127a.3\]]tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /_'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/_su la bstan pa de dag kyang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar 
[\[127a.4\]]rtog par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang 
[\[127a.5\]]bdag med ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de dag gzugs mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang 
[\[127a.6\]]tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med 
[\[127a.7\]]do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_gzugs mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_gzugs sdug bsngal 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag 
[\[127b.2\]]go zhes bya bar ston/_mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang sna'i rnam par shes pa dang lce'i rnam par shes pa dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bya 
[\[127b.3\]]bar ston/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang sna'i rnam par shes pa dang lce'i rnam par shes pa dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_
[\[127b.4\]]mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_rna ba'i 'dus te 
[\[127b.5\]]reg pa dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[127b.6\]]rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_
[\[127b.7\]]lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_sa'i khams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_sa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba 
[\[128a.2\]]dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi 
[\[128a.3\]]khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_ma rig pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_ma rig pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag 
[\[128a.4\]]med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming 
[\[128a.5\]]dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang /_skye ba dang rga shi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_sbyin 
[\[128a.6\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 
[\[128a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin du phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sdug 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_nang stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[128b.2\]]kyi bar du mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug 
[\[128b.3\]]bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_yang dag par 
[\[128b.4\]]spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi 
[\[128b.5\]]rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal
