[\[128b.6\]]lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /_'di skad du gang de ltar ston pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/_su la bstan pa de dag kyang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs sdug 
[\[128b.7\]]bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_mi sdug ces bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]bdag med ces bya ba dang /_mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_bdag 
[\[129a.2\]]med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /_mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur te/_kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gzugs brnyan no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 
[\[129a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston na 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgoms shig_/khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas 
[\[129a.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sgoms shig_/khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms dang /_
[\[129a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas par 'gyur ro zhes/_de yang mtshan ma'i tshul dang /_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston te/_de dus kyi 'du shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom par 'gyur te/_kau shi 
[\[129a.6\]]ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod 
[\[129a.7\]]kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms na/_nyan thos kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes ston te/_kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]gzugs brnyan no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa na 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[129b.2\]]sgoms shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyis de ltar mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[129b.3\]]sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la gnas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/_rim gro dang bkur sti dang sti stang dang mchod par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes/_
[\[129b.4\]]rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na 'di skad ston te/_rigs kyi bu dag su shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du 
[\[129b.5\]]yid la byed pa de ni bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur ro zhes zer te/_de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs 
[\[129b.6\]]kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'di ltar ston to/_/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 
[\[129b.7\]]thugs dang po bskyed pa nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/_rjes su dga' bar gyis la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]yongs su bsngos shig ces/_rigs kyi bu las rigs kyi bu mo de dag de ltar ston cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[130a.2\]]de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub 
[\[130a.3\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgoms shig_/gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig_/de ci'i 
[\[130a.4\]]phyir zhe na/_gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni gzugs rtag ces 
[\[130a.5\]]bya'am/_gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/_/de la gzugs nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston 
[\[130a.6\]]to/_kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[130a.7\]]sgoms shig_/tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig_/'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rnam par shes 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/_/de la rnam par shes pa nyid 
[\[130b.2\]]kyang med na/_rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub 
[\[130b.3\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgoms shig_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag 
[\[130b.4\]]par rjes su ma lta shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[130b.5\]]pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/_/de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med na/_rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/_kau shi ka 
[\[130b.6\]]de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[130b.7\]]de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgoms shig_/chos gang las kyang yongs su 'da' bar ma byed cig_/chos gang la yang gnas gnas par ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la chos gang las 'da' bar bya ba 'am/_gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos gang 
[\[131a.2\]]yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni blang bar bya ba 'am/_dor bar bya ba 'am/_bskyed par bya ba 'am/_dgag par bya ba'i chos gang yang med do 
[\[131a.3\]]zhes ston te/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/_/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i don bstan 
[\[131a.4\]]par bya ste/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ches mang du 'phel gyi/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag gi ni ma yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa 
[\[131a.5\]]de dag_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_
[\[131a.6\]]bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de 
[\[131a.7\]]bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]shig_/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las/_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i 
[\[131b.2\]]gling gi sems can lta yang zhog_/gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[131b.3\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta yang zhog gi/_kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing /_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig 
[\[131b.4\]]gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[131b.5\]]stsal ba/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di 
[\[131b.6\]]skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams 
[\[131b.7\]]mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]ba'i 'bras bu la bkod/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol 
[\[132a.2\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_
[\[132a.3\]]bshang de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/
[\[132a.4\]]ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/_ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_
[\[132a.5\]]rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la bkod pa lta yang zhog_/gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 
[\[132a.6\]]sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[132a.7\]]ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la bkod pa lta yang zhog gi/_phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/_rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i 
[\[132b.2\]]rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 
[\[132b.3\]]don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zung shig_/kun chub 
[\[132b.4\]]par gyis shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi 
[\[132b.5\]]pha rol du phyin pa 'di las/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[132b.6\]]la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_
[\[132b.7\]]bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis 
[\[133a.2\]]shig_/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/_rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[133a.3\]]khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[133a.4\]]pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/_ches 
[\[133a.5\]]de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 
[\[133a.6\]]bskul ba byas pa lta yang zhog_/gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[133a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta yang zhog gi/_/kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing /_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[133b.2\]]'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_
[\[133b.3\]]bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/
[\[133b.4\]]ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/_rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/_rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi 
[\[133b.5\]]bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod kyi shes rab kyi 
[\[133b.6\]]pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[133b.7\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol ba/_bcom 
[\[134a.2\]]ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de 
[\[134a.3\]]bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/ji ltar bstan 
[\[134a.4\]]pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa de'i tshe/_rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/_shes 
[\[134a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang 
[\[134a.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 
[\[134a.7\]]'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta yang zhog_/gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]khams kyi sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de 
[\[134b.2\]]dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta yang zhog gi/_kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/_
[\[134b.3\]]kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang 
[\[134b.4\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur 
[\[134b.5\]]rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod 
[\[134b.6\]]gang gi tshe ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa de'i tshe/_rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod kyis 
[\[134b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i 
[\[135a.2\]]gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/_de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par 
[\[135a.3\]]rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs 
[\[135a.4\]]shig/_tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/_ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa de'i tshe/_rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi 
[\[135a.5\]]pha rol du phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams 
[\[135a.6\]]thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[135a.7\]]yang dag par zhugs pa lta yang zhog_/gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lta yang zhog_/stong 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa lta yang zhog_/kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag 
[\[135b.2\]]thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/_de dag la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing 
[\[135b.3\]]rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /_'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi 
[\[135b.4\]]pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa de'i tshe/_rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[135b.5\]]slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes 
[\[135b.6\]]bsgo na/_ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am 
[\[135b.7\]]rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/_de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]dpa' chen po la la zhig 'di skad du/_bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge 
[\[136a.2\]]dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta yang zhog_/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[136a.3\]]kyi sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lta yang zhog_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog 
[\[136a.4\]]par gyur pa lta yang zhog ga_/kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 
[\[136a.5\]]la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /_bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/_de'i nang nas byang chub sems 
[\[136a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig 'di skad du/_bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge 
[\[136a.7\]]dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni nges pa ste/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub du gzhol zhing bla na med pa 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas na/_de dag la ni de tsam du chos bstan kyang mi dgos kyi/_'di ni 'khor ba nas 'byung bar 'dod la/_snying rje chen pos mnar ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[136b.2\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par 
[\[136b.3\]]bgyi'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/_/nang stong pa nyid la 
[\[136b.4\]]gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_
[\[136b.5\]]stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[136b.6\]]'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par 
[\[136b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/_/gos 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad kyis kyang rjes su gzung bar bgyi ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la chos kyis bsdu ba dang /_zang zing gis bsdu bas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi 
[\[137a.2\]]bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel gyi/_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni yod yang de ltar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lags pa de ni pha rol du phyin pa rnams la gdams shing 
[\[137a.3\]]rjes su bstan pa'o/_/stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa 
[\[137a.4\]]brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so 
[\[137a.5\]]yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/_kau shi ka de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[137a.6\]]rnams kyis mos pa bskyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang yongs su skyong ba legs so/_legs so/_/kau shi ka khyod kyis de bzhin du bya'o/_/'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par 'dod pa des kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[137a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams zang zing dang /_chos kyis phan gdags pas phan gdags shing yongs su bskyang bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]kyi dge 'dun ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las 'byung ngo /_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyed na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[137b.2\]]dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag la slob pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang 
[\[137b.3\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[137b.4\]]pa'i stobs rnams dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la slob pa ma yin te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang 
[\[137b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur na/_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos rnams kyang yod par mi 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag la yang slob la/_stong 
[\[137b.6\]]pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[137b.7\]]par 'jug pa dgu dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la yang slob pas/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[138a.2\]]sangs rgyas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin gyi ris kyang yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i ris kyang 
[\[138a.3\]]mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 
[\[138a.4\]]'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs ris dang tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang tshangs 
[\[138a.5\]]chen dang snang ba dang chung snang dang tshad med snang ba dang kun snang dang ba dang dge ba dang chung dge dang tshad med dge ba dang dge rgyas dang che ba dang chung che dang tshad med che ba dang 'bras bu che ba dang mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang shin du mthong ba dang gya nom snang ba dang 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten 
[\[138a.6\]]du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[138a.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 
[\[138b.2\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[138b.3\]]bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 
[\[138b.4\]]'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_brgya byin gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[138b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po byams pas/_gnas brtan rab 'byor la smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[138b.6\]]chen po bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsdo ba gang yin pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod 
[\[138b.7\]]nams bya ba'i dngos po dang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]dag las/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa 'di nyid rab 
[\[139a.2\]]ces bya'o/_/dam pa zhes bya'o/_/gtso bo zhes bya'o/_/mchog ces bya'o/_/phul zhes bya'o/_/gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/bla na med pa zhes bya'o/_/gong na med pa zhes bya'o/_/mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//_//
[\[139a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po sum cu drug pa/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang tshul khrims las byung ba dang bsgom pa las 
[\[139a.4\]]byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni bdag gdul ba dang /_bdag zhi bar bya ba dang bdag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_
[\[139a.5\]]bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[139a.6\]]rig pa bzhi dang mngon par shes pa drug dag kyang /_bdag gdul ba dang /_bdag zhi bar bya ba dang bdag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par zad kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad gdul ba dang /_zhi bar bya ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan 
[\[139a.7\]]las bzla ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi/_'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 
[\[139b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang /_lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med 
[\[139b.3\]]tshad med dpag du med pa dag gi/_/'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[139b.4\]]par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang /_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi dam pa'i chos kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang 
[\[139b.5\]]dag par zhugs pa de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang slob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang mi slob pa de dag gi 
[\[139b.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol 
[\[139b.7\]]ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang phan par bzhed pa dang thugs rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa dang chos bstan pa de la bslabs shing rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]'bras bu thob pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub thob pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /_gang gis 
[\[140a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs kyang rung /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/_de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa/_de thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gtso bo dam pa/_rab phul gya nom pa bla na med pa/_gong 
[\[140a.3\]]na med pa/_mnyam pa med pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ste/_de ltar rjes su yi rang nas/_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[140a.4\]]pa'i byang chub sgrub par gyur cig ces/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa des de skad du smras te/_sems kyi rnam pa de lta bus yongs su bsngos na/_dmigs 
[\[140a.5\]]pa gang dang dngos po gang dag gis sems de lta bu skyes par gyur pa'i dngos po de dag dang /_dmigs pa de dag rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mchan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmigs su yod pa yin nam/_byams pas smras pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi 
[\[140a.6\]]bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du/_dngos po de dag dang /_dmigs pa de dag dmigs su yod pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_gal te de ltar dngos po med pa de dag 
[\[140a.7\]]dmigs su med na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa de dag dang /_de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa'i rigs 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /_slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /_mi slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu gsogs bsdus te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[140b.2\]]mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngos na/_ji ltar mi rtag pa la rtag go zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang /_sems phyin ci log pa dang /_lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bde zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med pa la bdag ces bya ba dang /_mi 
[\[140b.3\]]gtsang ba la gtsang zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang /_sems phyin ci log pa dang /_lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa de ltar de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu ma gyur tam/_de lta yin yang thams cad dngos po ji lta ba dang /_dmigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/_
[\[140b.4\]]sems kyang de bzhin sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang de bzhin/_gzugs dang 
[\[140b.5\]]tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /_yid kyang de bzhin/_gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos kyang de bzhin/_khams dang skye mched dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang de bzhin/_
[\[140b.6\]]nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang de bzhin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar yang de bzhin/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams 
[\[140b.7\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang de bzhin te/_gal te de ltar 
[\[141a.2\]]dngos po ji lta ba dang /_dmigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/_sems kyang de bzhin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang de bzhin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[141a.3\]]gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang de bzhin/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang de bzhin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[141a.4\]]dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[141a.5\]]pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[141a.6\]]stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang de bzhin na ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dngos po de ni 
[\[141a.7\]]gang zhig yin/_dmigs pa de ni gang zhig yin/_byang chub de ni gang zhig yin/_sems de ni gang zhig yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang zhig yin/_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig yin/_byams pas smras pa/_gal 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su zin pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslab pa de

[\[141b.3\]]byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/de dag ni 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste gnyis kyi tshul gyis ma yin no/_/gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/
[\[141b.4\]]dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/nyon mongs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/rnam par byang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/skye ba'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/'gag pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa 
[\[141b.5\]]yang ma yin/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa yang ma yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa yang ma yin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yang ma yin/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs par gyur ba yang ma 
[\[141b.6\]]yin/_de dag ni dngos po de dag dang /_dmigs pa de dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur te/_
[\[141b.7\]]btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_
[\[142a.2\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de ltar bstan pa ni/_theg pa la gsar 
[\[142a.3\]]du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[142a.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_

[\[142a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni de la dad pa tsam 'am/_dga' ba tsam 'am/_mos pa tsam 'am/_gus pa tsam zhig yod pa de yang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]po'i mdun du bshad cing bstan to/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /_sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ltar bstan pa

[\[142b.5\]]par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[142b.6\]]bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam 
[\[142b.7\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ltar bstan par bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams bshad par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/des ni de thos na mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_byams pa 
[\[143a.2\]]sems gang gis rjes su yi rang zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ba'i sems de ni zad cing 'gags la med de rnam par gyur la/_dngos po de dag dang /_dmigs pa de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 
[\[143a.3\]]zad cing 'gags la med de rnam par gyur na/_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems de ni gang zhig_/dngos po de dag ni gang zhig_/dmigs pa de dag ni gang zhig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang zhig_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo 
[\[143a.4\]]bar bya/_ci sems kyis sems yongs su bsngo'am/_de ltar sems kyis sems yongs su bsngo na ni/_sems gnyis 'phrad par 'gyur ba med de/_sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[143a.5\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_

[\[143a.7\]]rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dngos po med pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams ni dngos po med pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i

[\[143b.3\]]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bya bar shes na/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[143b.4\]]pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[143b.5\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_gnas brtan rab 'byor la smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na/_'jigs shing sdang ba'am/_skrag par mi 'gyur ram/_
[\[143b.6\]]btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/_ji ltar na des rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams 
[\[143b.7\]]bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bzung zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la dmigs nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan 
[\[144a.2\]]ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[144a.3\]]du phyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/_nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_nang stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[144a.4\]]bar la spyod cing /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod cing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i 
[\[144a.5\]]tshul gyis/_'dzin par byed/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[144a.6\]]mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[144a.7\]]pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad po de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_
[\[144b.2\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed na/_des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang /_bsam 
[\[144b.3\]]gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang /_nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[144b.4\]]nyid kyi bar la mos pa mang ba dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mos pa mang ba dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mos pa mang ba 
[\[144b.5\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la mos pa mang ba dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin 
[\[144b.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[144b.7\]]nyid la mos pa mang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par ston par 'gyur te/_de yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]chud kyi bar du/_ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du 
[\[145a.2\]]phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs 
[\[145a.3\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[145a.4\]]rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/_/de la bdud kyi 
[\[145a.5\]]las rnams kyang ston par 'gyur ro/_/des bdud kyi las de dag thos nas 'grib pa'am/_'phel ba med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar bdud kyi las de dag la ngo bo nyid med do/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[145a.6\]]ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/_de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rigs de dag yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[145a.7\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i/_shar phyogs dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba 
[\[145b.2\]]dang /_chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spros pa'i tshul chad par gyur pa/_tshig gi lam nyams pa mi mnga' ba/_khur bor ba/_grong gi tsher ma rab tu bsal ba/_srid pa kun du sbyor ba yongs su chad pa/_yang dag par yongs su mkhyen pas/_thugs shin du 
[\[145b.3\]]rnam par grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gis bsod nams mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /_de dag du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/_rgyal 
[\[145b.4\]]chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum 'am/_mtshe ma 'am/_dga' ldan nam 'phrul dga' 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dam/_tshangs ris sam/_tshangs lha nye phan nam/_tshangs pa kun 'khor tam/_tshangs chen nam/_snang ba'am/_chung snang ngam/_tshad 
[\[145b.5\]]med snang ba'am/_kun snang dang ba'am/_dge ba'am/_chung dge 'am/_tshad med dge ba'am/_dge rgyas sam/_che ba'am/_chung che 'am/_tshad med che ba'am/_'bras bu che ba'am/_mi che ba'am/_mi gdung ba'am/_shin tu mthong ba'am/_gya nom snang ba'am/_'og 
[\[145b.6\]{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams sam/_sus kyang rung ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig bskyed pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste/_rjes su yi rang ba'i rab dam pa/_mchog phul/_gtso bo gya nom pa bla na med pa/_gong na med pa/_mnyam pa med pa/_
[\[145b.7\]]mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang bar byas te/_rjes su yi rang bar byas nas kyang /_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]dpa' chen po byams pas/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[146a.2\]]'das de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad la sems shing bsams nas/_rjes su yi rang ba'i rab dam pa/_mchog phul gtso bo gya nom pa/_bla na med pa/_gong na med pa/_mnyam pa med pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas 
[\[146a.3\]]rjes su yi rang ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba yin/_sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba yin/_lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 
[\[146a.4\]]'gyur ba yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang bcas pa de dag la sems kyang /_de la sangs rgyas su 'du shes par mi 'gyur/_nyan thos su 'du shes 
[\[146a.5\]]par mi 'gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa bar 'du shes par mi 'gyur zhing /_sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la yang sems kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur na/_de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'du shes phyin ci log 
[\[146a.6\]]tu 'gyur ba med do/_/sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med do/_/lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang bcas pa de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de 
[\[146a.7\]]dag la sems shing /_mtshan mar 'dzin la mtshan mar bzung nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/_/sems phyin 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]ci log tu 'gyur ro/_/lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems gang gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang bcas pa de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la sems pa'i sems de la yang dag par sems shing /_
[\[146b.2\]]'di ltar zad pa la zad ces bya bar shes la gang zad pa des yongs su bsngo bar mi nus te/_sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de nyid kyi chos nyid kyang de yin la/_chos gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de'i chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes/_gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo 
[\[146b.3\]]na/_yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ste log pa ma yin no/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs 
[\[146b.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /_de dag tu so so'i skye bo mang pos dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed 
[\[146b.5\]]pa dang /_chos bstan pa gang ji snyed cig thos pa dang /_de dag tu lha dang /_klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang /_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 
[\[146b.6\]]sam/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sam/_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sam/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams sam/_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos ji snyed cig thos te/_bla na 
[\[146b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/_gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste/_rjes su yi rang ba'i rab/_mchog phul/_dam pa/_gya nom pa/_bla na med pa/_gong na med pa/_mnyam pa med pa/_mi mnyam pa dang /_
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]mnyam pas rjes su yi rang nas/_de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /_gal te 'di ltar chos de dag ni zad do/_/'gags so/_med do/_rnam par gyur to/_/gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o 
[\[147a.2\]]zhes/_gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/_/gal te 'di ltar chos kyis chos yongs su bsngo bar mi bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar 
[\[147a.3\]]shes la/_gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de dag ni de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[147a.4\]]'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/_/sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/_/lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i 
[\[147a.5\]]phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yongs su bsngo ba la mngon par chags pa med do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yang mngon par chags pa med do/_/byang chub de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[147a.6\]]byang chub kyi sems de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de phung po dang /_
[\[147a.7\]]khams dang /_skye mched rnams dben par shes te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas dben par shes/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas dben par shes/_nang stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dben par shes/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis dben par shes/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam 
[\[147b.2\]]gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes 
[\[147b.3\]]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis dben par shes/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[147b.4\]]kyis dben par shes na/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba re/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/_/gal te de byang chub sems 
[\[147b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de/_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben par shes te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[147b.6\]]'das de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/mngon par 'du bya ba de dag ni mngon par 'du bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_byang chub kyi sems de ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis 
[\[147b.7\]]dben no/_/yongs su bsngo ba ni yongs su bsngo ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/tshul khrims 
[\[148a.2\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis 
[\[148a.3\]]dben no/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni/_byang chub kyi phyogs 
[\[148a.4\]]kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[148a.5\]]dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[148a.6\]]bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no zhes bya bar shes na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[148a.7\]]chen po des dben pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo na/_'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag kyang yongs su mya ngan 
[\[148b.2\]]las 'das pa ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba 'di yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/sems gang gis bsngo ba'i sems de yang de dang tshul mthun te/_de'i ngo bo nyid do zhes/_gal te de ltar shes na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[148b.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/_de ltar yongs su bsngo na/_'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/_/sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/_/lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[148b.4\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su shes na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa 
[\[148b.5\]]de dag kyang mtshan ma ma yin/_mtshan ma'i yul ma yin no/_/des gal te de ltar sems na yang mtshan mar byed pa yin gyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te/_de ltar na de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu 
[\[148b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/_/lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang /_sems 
[\[148b.7\]]bskyed pa de dag yongs su shes pa med cing mtshan mar mi byed na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/_/lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/_/byams pas smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing /_bla na med pa 
[\[149a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la thabs mkhas pa de dag bslab par bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[149a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa rig par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ma rten par bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/_/byams pas smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la med de mi 
[\[149a.4\]]dmigs so zhes bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang /_gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag kyang med de mi dmigs so zhes bya ba 'di skyon du smos par mi 'gyur ram snyam na/_de la 
[\[149a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_bdag gi lus de dag kyang 'gags par gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang /_sems bskyed pa de dag kyang 
[\[149a.6\]]'gags par gyur na/_bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang /_sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing rnam par rtog pa lta/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[149a.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/_de ltar mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba la rjes su dgyes pa dang /_mngon par bsngags pa ma mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams mtshan mar byas shing /_rnam par 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]brtags te dmigs pa ni/_de'i dmigs pa chen por 'gyur te/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pas/_mi dmigs shing mtshan ma med par byas te yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[149b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can dang /_mtshan ma'i 'du shes can gyi yongs su bsngo ba de ni don che bar ma gsungs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug can zug rngu can te/_'di lta ste dper na kha zas bsod 
[\[149b.3\]]pa/_kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/_dri phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod kyang dug dang 'dres par gyur na/_kha dog dang dri dang /_ro yid du 'ong ba yang yin mod kyi 'on kyang dug can du zad na/_de la skyes bu byis pa'i ngang tshul can/_shes rab 'chal pa'i ngang tshul can ni bza' 
[\[149b.4\]]bar sems te/_des de zos na yang kha dog dang /_dri dang /_ro zhim par tshor mod kyi/_sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'di la log par rig pa dang /_log par shes pa dang /_log par bslabs pa las don ma rtogs mi shes 
[\[149b.5\]]shing 'di skad du ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[149b.6\]]kyi bar dang /_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar dang /_dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /_
