[\[201b.3\]]snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[201b.4\]]spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam 
[\[201b.5\]]par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi 
[\[201b.6\]]pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang ma chags pa legs 
[\[201b.7\]]par bstan pa 'di ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]rnams la chags pa dang /_ma chags pa legs par bstan to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_
[\[202a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 
[\[202a.3\]]'byung ba chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[202a.4\]]du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/
[\[202a.5\]]nang stong pa nyid chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/
[\[202a.6\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[202a.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_
[\[202b.2\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[202b.3\]]nyid kyi bar du chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/_gzugs chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes 
[\[202b.4\]]pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/_/skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes 
[\[202b.5\]]pa med do/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_
[\[202b.6\]]bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_
[\[202b.7\]]mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags pa'am/_ma chags pa 
[\[203a.2\]]zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/_/rang byang chub chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/_/bla na 
[\[203a.3\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa'am/_ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/_ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/_bstan kyang mi 'phel/_ma bstan kyang mi 'phel 
[\[203a.4\]]ba ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/_ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/_bstan kyang mi 'phel ma bstan kyang mi 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper 
[\[203a.5\]]na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing /_nam mkha'i legs pa'am/_ma legs pa brjod kyang /_nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'phel ba med do/_/nyes pa brjod pas yongs su 
[\[203a.6\]]'grib pa med do/_/nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba 'phel ba med do/_/nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do/_/nyes pa brjod kyang 
[\[203a.7\]]yongs su 'grib pa med do/_/legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin/_ma bstan kyang de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe zhum pa dang /_g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brtson par bgyid cing bla na med 
[\[203b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' 
[\[203b.3\]]bsgom pa ste/_nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/_/nam mkha' la ni skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma mchis so/_/nam mkha' 
[\[203b.4\]]la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma mchis so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma mchis so/_/
[\[203b.5\]]nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so/_/nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang 
[\[203b.6\]]po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so/_/nam mkha' la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs 
[\[203b.7\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so/_/nam mkha' la ni 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so/_/nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[204a.2\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ma mchis so/_/nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub ma mchis so/_/nam mkha' la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[204a.3\]]pa'i byang chub ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson par mos/_'bad par mos/_rtsol bar mos pa 
[\[204a.4\]]dag ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi 
[\[204a.5\]]slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdeg par 'tshal ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can 
[\[204a.6\]]rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi don du/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[204a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/_dpa' bo bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/_'di lta ste dper na/_'dam bu'i byings sam/_'od ma'i 
[\[204b.2\]]tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_smyig ma'i tshal lam/_'bras kyi zhing ngam/_til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa'am/_bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te de bzhin 
[\[204b.3\]]gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa'am/_gang bar mi gda'o/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sems can ma mchis pa dang /_sems can dben pa'i 
[\[204b.4\]]slad du ste/_de bzhin du gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang /_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'di lta ste dper na/_'dam bu'i byings sam/_'od ma'i tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_smyig ma'i tshal lam/_'bras kyi zhing ngam 
[\[204b.5\]]til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa'am/_bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis pa yongs su 
[\[204b.6\]]mya ngan las bzlas kyang /_sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa'am gang bar mi gda'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sems can ma mchis pa dang /_sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na bdag 'di skad du sems can rnams kyi slad du/_
[\[204b.7\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags zhes mchi'o/_/de nas dge slong gcig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/_
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa yang med la/_tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang 
[\[205a.2\]]yod/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub kyang yod/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/_rgyun du zhugs pa yang yod/_
[\[205a.3\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[205a.4\]]dkon mchog kyang yod/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo snyam pa dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa 
[\[205a.5\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/_de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la bslab 
[\[205a.6\]]par sems pa de ni nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[205a.7\]]'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par 
[\[205b.2\]]bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas na/_de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par 'gyur ro/_gal 
[\[205b.3\]]te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/_de la mi'am mi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de 
[\[205b.4\]]ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par gang sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung pa dang 
[\[205b.5\]]bskyang pa dang /_bskyab par sems pa ste/_de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_rmi lam dang /_sgra brnyan dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor dang /_sprul pa la bsrung 
[\[205b.6\]]ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par nus sam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/_/smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams/_bsrung ba dang /_
[\[205b.7\]]bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]dang /_/bskyab par nus sam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/_/smras pa kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_
[\[206a.2\]]bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang /_bskyang 
[\[206a.3\]]ba dang bskyab par nus sam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/_/smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang bskyab par 
[\[206a.4\]]gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[206a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/_rmi lam lta bu'i chos dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang /_de ltar yongs su shes pas/_byang chub sems 
[\[206a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rom sems su mi byed 
[\[206a.7\]]pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/_gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/_gzugs la rlom sems su mi 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]byed na/_de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[206b.2\]]'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_
[\[206b.3\]]rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rlom sems su mi byed/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung 
[\[206b.4\]]bas rlom sems su mi byed/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rlom sems su mi byed na/_de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems 
[\[206b.5\]]su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rlom sems su mi byed/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_byang chub kyi phyogs 
[\[206b.6\]]kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rlom sems su mi byed na/_de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems 
[\[206b.7\]]su mi byed do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed na/_de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi 
[\[207a.2\]]lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams rlom sems su mi byed 
[\[207a.3\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/_de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_
[\[207a.4\]]sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[207a.5\]]ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad rlom sems su mi byed/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/_de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom 
[\[207a.6\]]sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam pa 
[\[207a.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/_de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/sprul pa'i bar du rlom 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang /_mtshe ma dang dga' ldan 
[\[207b.2\]]dang 'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[207b.3\]]mngon par 'thor zhing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig du 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs 
[\[207b.4\]]pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/_mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/_dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid 
[\[207b.5\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su 'dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur to/_/lho dang nub dang /_byang dang byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_
[\[207b.6\]]lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing yang /_sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/_dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /_
[\[207b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su 'dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[208a.2\]]'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang /_sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[208a.3\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang /_rtags gang dang /_mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na 
[\[208a.4\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'di la rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[208a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba_'am/_
[\[208a.6\]]gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya ba_'am/_gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/_mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs bcings shes bya ba 'am/_
[\[208a.7\]]grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs 'das shes bya ba 'am/_ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/_da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/_rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag med ces bya ba 'am/_rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/_mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam 
[\[208b.2\]]par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba 'am/_grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa 'das shes bya ba 'am/_ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/_da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos 
[\[208b.3\]]ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 
[\[208b.4\]]bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya ba'am/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/_mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bzhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rten cing 'brel 
[\[208b.5\]]par 'byung ba bcings shes bya ba'am/_grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'das shes bya ba 'am/_ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/_da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong 
[\[208b.6\]]pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi 
[\[208b.7\]]chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag med ces bya ba 'am/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sdug ces bya ba 'am/_mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bcings shes bya ba 'am/_grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'das shes bya ba 'am/_ma 'ongs 
[\[209a.2\]]shes bya ba 'am/_da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas 
[\[209a.3\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal 
[\[209a.4\]]zhes bya ba 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag med ces bya ba 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/_mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar 
[\[209a.5\]]chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/_grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa rnams 'das shes bya ba 'am/_ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/_da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[209a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag med 
[\[209a.7\]]ces bya ba 'am/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/_mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams bcings shes bya 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]ba 'am/_grol zhes bya ba chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das shes bya ba 'am/_ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/_da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang 
[\[209b.2\]]dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[209b.3\]]rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag med ces bya ba 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya 'am/_mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par 
[\[209b.4\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/_grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'das shes bya ba 'am/_ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/_da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston 
[\[209b.5\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[209b.6\]]bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag med ces bya ba 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/_mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[209b.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings shes bya ba 'am/_grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das shes bya ba 'am/_ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/_da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos ni ji ltar ston par 'gyur ston nas ji zhig ston par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 
[\[210a.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs shin du rnam par dag go zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag go/_zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro 
[\[210a.3\]]skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin du rnam par dag go/_zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shin du rnam 
[\[210a.4\]]par dag go/_/zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_
[\[210a.5\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams shin du rnam par dag go/_zhes bya bar shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin 
[\[210a.6\]]rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin du rnam par dag go/_/zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[210a.7\]]chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin du rnam par dag go/_zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin du rnam par dag go/_zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[210b.2\]]pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad 
[\[210b.3\]]dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[210b.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[210b.5\]]yongs su dag pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[210b.6\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[210b.7\]]'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams 
[\[211a.2\]]cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[211a.3\]]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji 
[\[211a.4\]]ltar na ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[211a.5\]]'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom 
[\[211a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[211a.7\]]pa la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon 
[\[211b.2\]]mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam 
[\[211b.3\]]par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba 
[\[211b.4\]]med pa ni mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[211b.5\]]gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang 
[\[211b.6\]]ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su dag pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs 
[\[211b.7\]]su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir nam mkha' yongs su dag pa ste/_rab 'byor nam mkha' 
[\[212a.2\]]la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[212a.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[212a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar/_nam 
[\[212a.5\]]mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod 
[\[212a.6\]]du ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/_shes 
[\[212a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/_
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/
[\[212b.2\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba 
[\[212b.3\]]ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad shin 
[\[212b.4\]]du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul 
[\[212b.5\]]bzhin du yid la bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i nad dang /_sna'i nad dang /_lce'i nad dang /_lus kyi nad dang /_yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro/_/rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 
[\[212b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bde ba mi spongs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang 
[\[212b.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang /_tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang /_bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/_bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba/_tshad ma mchis pa/_grangs ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/_
[\[213a.2\]]gzhal du ma mchis pa/_dpag tu ma mchis pa/_rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[213a.3\]]phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te/_bsod nams kyi phung po mang po dang /_tshad med pa grangs med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa gzhal du med pa dpag tu med pa rab tu 'phel bar 
[\[213a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o/_/rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te/_sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/_/byol song gi skye gnas dang /_
[\[213a.5\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mi dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/_/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/_/bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/_/khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i 
[\[213a.6\]]ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/'du shes med 'du shes med [{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin 
[\[213a.7\]]pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub 'byin pa'o/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]par bstan te/_de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma 
[\[213b.2\]]dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung 
[\[213b.3\]]dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che ba dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_
[\[213b.4\]]rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_
[\[213b.5\]]rang byang chub yod do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yod na/_bsam gtan bzhi yod do/_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/_/sbyin 
[\[213b.6\]]pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos 
[\[213b.7\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_
[\[214a.2\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/_/de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad 
[\[214a.3\]]rgya cher bstan te/_de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_
[\[214a.4\]]dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang chung dge dang 
[\[214a.5\]]tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang che ba dang /_chung che dang tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' 
[\[214a.6\]]yas skye mched dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med [{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs 
[\[214a.7\]]rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/de bas na de ni pha rol du phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa rin po che de la ni 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_yongs su gzung ba'am/_dor ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba'am/_'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_yongs su gzung ba'am/_
[\[214b.2\]]dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do/_/rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa 'am zag pa med pa'am/_'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs 
[\[214b.3\]]su med de rab 'byor rnam grangs nges kyang pha rol du phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che la ni gang gis kyang 'go ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor de'i 
[\[214b.4\]]phyir na pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rin po che 'o/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la/_de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/_
[\[214b.5\]]de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing /_
[\[214b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod 
[\[214b.7\]]par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa'am/_rnam par ston pa'am/_yongs su ston pa'am/_'dzin par byed pa'am/_'byin par byed pa'am/_skye bar byed pa'am/_
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]'gag par byed pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa'am/_rnam par byang bar byed pa'am/_'grib par byed pa'am/_'phel bar byed pa'am/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung bar byed pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha 
[\[215a.2\]]rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/_gnas par byed pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/_gnas par byed pa ma yin/_gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/_gnas par byed pa ma yin/_sbyin pa'i 
[\[215a.3\]]pha rol du phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_nang 
[\[215a.4\]]stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad 
[\[215a.5\]]med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa 
[\[215a.6\]]ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_
[\[215a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_rang 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]byang chub sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bzhi bcu gcig pa/_
[\[215b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/_'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /_chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_chos 
[\[215b.3\]]kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par thugs su chud do/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas 
[\[215b.4\]]kyang gsung ngo /_/ston to/_/rjod do/_/'grel to/_/rnam par 'byed do/_/gsal bar mdzad do/_/yang dag par ston to/_/de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung ste/_lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad mo dang /_ku mud 
[\[215b.5\]]dang /_pund ri ka dang /_mAn dA ra ba dang /_mAn dA ra ba chen po 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/_/kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bstan pas/_lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/_'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 
[\[215b.6\]]'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin/_gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin no/_/
[\[215b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang chos gang yang 'khor ba'am/_mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/_mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo /_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[216a.2\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[216a.3\]]pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[216a.4\]]lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya dpas stong ngo /_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[216a.5\]]thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[216a.6\]]rnams kyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/
[\[216a.7\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo /_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo /_/dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo /_/
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chen mo ste/_
[\[216b.2\]]'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/_/de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[216b.3\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang /_chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma mchis/_chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la chos gang yang 'khor ba'am mi 'khor ba'am rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/_de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su 
[\[216b.4\]]mthong ba'am yongs su ma mthong ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'am rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin du mngon par ma grub 
[\[216b.5\]]pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/_mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/_/mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/_/smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am mi 'khor bar 
[\[216b.6\]]bgyid pa ma lags so/_/de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa dang /_rab tu bstan pa dang /_bsgrags pa dang rab tu dgod pa dang gzhag pa dang /_rnam par dbye ba dang /_rnam par dgrol ba dang smos pa dang /_gsal bar bgyi ba dang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni 
[\[216b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ngo /_/gang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/_/gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/_chos bstan pa 'di la gang su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[217a.2\]]rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[217a.3\]]'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni

[\[217a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ming dang

[\[217b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha

[\[218a.1\]]'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_

[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dus byas dang 'dus

[\[220b.7\]]du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol du 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/
[\[221a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdzu 
[\[221a.3\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_
[\[221a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 
[\[221a.5\]]byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom 
[\[221a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[221a.7\]]stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /_rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhi ba'i 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/_smon pa med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[221b.2\]]ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 
[\[221b.3\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 
[\[221b.4\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin pa dang /_ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[221b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims ngan pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnod sems dang bzod pa 
[\[221b.6\]]dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_le lo dang brtson 'grus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_
[\[221b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bsam gtan dang 'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shes rab dang 'chal ba'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[222a.2\]]rol du phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/
[\[222a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[222a.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom 
[\[222a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom 
[\[222a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad la 
[\[222a.7\]]dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du 
[\[222b.2\]]grag pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de 
[\[222b.3\]]dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/_/gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kun chub par byas nas kyang /_de bzhin nyid du shes rab 
[\[222b.4\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos te/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[222b.5\]]sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris so/_/yongs su zhus so/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur la 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_
[\[222b.6\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do snyam pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[222b.7\]]ti'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/_mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur la/_'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 
[\[223a.2\]]zab pa ste/_sngon pha rol du phyin pa drug la ma spyad pas ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mos par bgyi bar mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems 
[\[223a.3\]]pa dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i 
[\[223a.4\]]slad du ste/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[223a.5\]]ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_nang stong pa nyid ni ji 
[\[223a.6\]]ltar bsgom par bgyi/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub 
[\[223a.7\]]kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[223b.2\]]pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus/_yongs su ma dris so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sha 
[\[223b.3\]]ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shin du zab na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo 
[\[223b.4\]]mtshar kyang ci che/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi 
[\[223b.5\]]stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[223b.6\]]pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin 
[\[223b.7\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin 
[\[224a.2\]]no/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin te/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rnam 
[\[224a.3\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brjod do/_/kau shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa 
[\[224a.4\]]nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/
[\[224a.5\]]sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[224a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[224a.7\]]brtson par bya'o/_/khams gsum gyi phul du 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/bdud thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]pa la brtson par bya'o/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[224b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[224b.3\]]du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i 
[\[224b.4\]]pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[224b.5\]]pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 
[\[224b.6\]]dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na 
[\[224b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de ltar 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa legs so legs so/_/kau shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byung ngo /_/kau shi ka 'di la byang chub 
[\[225a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs la mi gnas te/_/gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/_gang 
[\[225a.3\]]gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/mig la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_mig la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe yid la mi 
[\[225a.4\]]gnas pa de'i tshe/_yid la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/gzugs la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_chos la 
[\[225a.5\]]brtson par byed pa yin no/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas/_rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la 
[\[225a.6\]]mi gnas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/sa'i khams la mi gnas te/_gang gi 
[\[225a.7\]]tshe sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_sa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]tshe/_rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/ma rig pa la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe ma rig pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_ma rig pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor 
[\[225b.2\]]ba dang /_sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe rga shi la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_rga shi la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[225b.3\]]rol du phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe shes rab kyi 
[\[225b.4\]]pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[225b.5\]]pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 
[\[225b.6\]]la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[225b.7\]]lag brgyad pa la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/_/rnam par thar pa
