[\[246b.7\]]gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nang stong pa nyid 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[247a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu 
[\[247a.3\]]mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa 
[\[247a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag 
[\[247a.5\]]par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan par 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don 
[\[247a.6\]]du skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni ngas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do/_/'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[247a.7\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod de/_de dag tshe 'das nas kyang 'di lta ste/_bla 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid kyi don du spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te de dag gzhan la yang 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du rnam pa de lta bu nyid brjod par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mnyam par bzhag par 
[\[247b.2\]]'gyur te/_de dag ni bdud dam bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams kyis kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par mi nus na/_sdig to la mos pa dang /_sdig to'i spyod pa can shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spong ba gzhan gyis lta ci smos/_sha 
[\[247b.3\]]ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/_dga' zhing nyams bde ba rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po yang dge 
[\[247b.4\]]ba'i chos la 'god par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni nga'i mdun du 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /_srog chags 
[\[247b.5\]]brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu rab tu dgod par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o/_/yang dag par gzeng bstod par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o/_/phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes 
[\[247b.6\]]bya ba'i tshig smras so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni/_sems la sems kyis rnam par bltas te ngas rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[247b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar yang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di skad du/_bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /_srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /_srog chags brgya stong phrag 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]mang po byang chub tu dgod par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o/_/yang dag par gzeng bstod par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o/_/phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i 
[\[248a.2\]]tshig smras so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni/_sems la thugs kyis rnam par gzigs te/_rjes su dgyes par mdzad do/_/
[\[248a.3\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /_srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /_srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu 
[\[248a.4\]]'god par 'gyur/_yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_yang dag par gzeng bstod par 'gyur/_yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/_phyir mi ldog par lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag 
[\[248a.5\]]ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la mos pa rlabs po cher 'gyur te/_de dag sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong bar 'gyur/_sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 
[\[248a.6\]]'du byas nas/_rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de dag rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongs su bzung nas/_sems can de dag nyid kyi don du rnam par smin pa rlabs po che las de bas kyang ches rlabs che ba'i rnam par smin pa yongs su 'dzin 
[\[248a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar phyi'am nang gi dngos po de dag kyang sems can de dag nyid la yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/_de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mngon du gyur pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa la brten par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams 
[\[248b.2\]]las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di mngon sum du thos nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du'ang srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /_srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /_srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag 
[\[248b.3\]]par ston par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par skul bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par gzeng bstod par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa 
[\[248b.4\]]dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las/_chos gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis la/_de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis te/_sems can rnams kyi sems thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma 
[\[248b.5\]]mchis pa ni ngo mtshar che ste/_'di ltar 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[248b.6\]]zhing dang /_nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen 
[\[248b.7\]]to/_/da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi byang chub sems 
[\[249a.2\]]dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du brtson par bgyid cing /_pha rol du phyin pa drug 
[\[249a.3\]]po 'di dag tshol ba dang /_yongs su tshol ba'i tshe/_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang /_yongs su tshol ba las kyang /_la las ni btsal ba las pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag thob par 'gyur/_la las ni thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[249a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de lta ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus mi gtong ba de dag kun gyis kyang pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 
[\[249a.5\]]'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi don du brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_ci lags bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag 
[\[249a.6\]]kun kyang 'grub par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag mi 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med/_skabs med do 
[\[249a.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can rnams yang dag par ston cing yang dag par skul ba dang /_yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang /_yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang /_'god cing rab tu 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]gzhog pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag tshe 'das nas kyang pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni nam yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/_sems can yongs 
[\[249b.2\]]su smin par ma byas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du ji skad du bstan pa'i pha rol du phyin pa drug po de dag las brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[249b.3\]]stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u sum cu pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[249b.4\]]pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa/_pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa/_sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni 'di dag lags na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo bla na 
[\[249b.5\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de dag la bar chad tu 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye na/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud 
[\[249b.6\]]kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye bar 'gyur/_de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[249b.7\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed na/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des shin du 'phyi ste spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni byang chub 
[\[250a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shin du myur bar spobs pa skye na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad 
[\[250a.3\]]du shin du myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur/_de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i 
[\[250a.4\]]pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 
[\[250a.5\]]ha cang myur bar spobs pa skye la/_des rlom sems su byed na/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des spobs pa ha cang myur bar skye ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang glal zhing 
[\[250a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dri na/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang dgod cing 'dri na/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig 
[\[250a.7\]]par bya'o/_/rab 'byor phan tshun steg cing 'dri na/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/sems g.yengs shing 'dri na/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]rig par bya'o/_/yi ge gzhan la chags shing tshig gi don mi shes par 'dri na/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[250b.2\]]sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang glal zhing lung 'bog na/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/glal zhing kha ton byed dam 'dzin tam klog gam 
[\[250b.3\]]ston tam glal zhing tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun dgod cing 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam klog gam kun chub par byed dam/_tshul 
[\[250b.4\]]bzhin du yid la byed na/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun steg cing 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam klog gam kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_
[\[250b.5\]]de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang sems g.yeng pas 'dzin tam 'chang ngam klog gam kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_de yang byang chub sems 
[\[250b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang yi ge gzhan dang gzhan la chags shing 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam klog gam kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_de yang byang chub sems 
[\[250b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/_
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]'di'i rom myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/zhes bka' stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di'i ro mi myong bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 
[\[251a.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[251a.3\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la ma spyad pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las bdag cag lung ma bstan to zhes ma dad pa'i yid kyis stan las langs shing 
[\[251a.4\]]'dong ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las lung ma bstan pa de dag stan las langs shing mchi bar 'gyur 
[\[251a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyon med par ma chud pa ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan te/_de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las mi 'byung ngo 
[\[251a.6\]]bdag gi ming yang yongs su ma brjod do/_/zhes dad par mi 'gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[251a.7\]]du phyin pa zab mo 'di las/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming yongs su ma brjod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]rnams kyi ming ni yongs su mi brjod de/_de la bdag gi ming yang 'di las mi 'byung /_bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal gyi ming yang mi 'byung ngo zhes/_de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi mnyan to snyam byed cing /_'khor de nas 
[\[251b.2\]]'gro bar sems na/_sems bskyed pa des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing /_gom pa ji snyed gcig bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/_de dag la gzod brtson par bya dgos so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bor zhing /_
[\[251b.3\]]mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa de dag kun chub par bya bar sems te/_des na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te/_
[\[251b.4\]]de nyid kyi yal ga dang 'dab ma dang lo ma la 'ju bar sems par gyur pa dag ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[251b.5\]]kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur ba de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mdo sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag ste/_'di ltar dran pa 
[\[251b.6\]]nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa 
[\[251b.7\]]nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]'thob pa dang /_rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur gyi/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par mi 'gyur ba ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 
[\[252a.2\]]gang la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bor zhing /_kun chub par bya bar sems pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[252a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba ni/_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten 
[\[252a.4\]]pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_khyi la la zhig jo bo'i zan na ra ma bor te/_las mi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du/_rab 'byor ma 'ongs 
[\[252a.5\]]pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te/_yal ga dang lo ma dang /_'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang /_
[\[252a.6\]]rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la brten par sems pa 'byung ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg 
[\[252a.7\]]pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bor nas/_khe dang bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde rnams kun chub par bya bar sems pa 'byung ste/_rab 'byor de yang 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_mi la la zhig glang po 'dod la/_des glang po rnyed kyang /_glang po'i rjes btsal bar sems pa yod na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[252b.2\]]du sems/_skyes bu de mkhas pa'i dang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang 
[\[252b.3\]]zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing mdo sde gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag btsal bar sems pa dag kyang dpe de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[252b.4\]]sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po blta bar 'dod la/_ba lang gi rjes btsal bar sems shing /_des ba lang gi rmig rjes mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du/_rgya mtsho chen po'i 
[\[252b.5\]]tshad 'di dang mnyam 'am/_mi mnyam snyam na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[252b.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/_
[\[252b.7\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_phywa mkhan nam phywa mkhan gyi slob ma rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du khang pa zhig dbub cing bslang bar 'dod de/_nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang yongs su btsal bar sems shing /_nyi 
[\[253a.2\]]ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang las tshad blang bar sems na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang dpe tshul bzung ste/_de dang 'dra ba'i khang ba dbub par nus sam/_
[\[253a.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_phywa mkhan nam phywa mkhan gyi slob ma de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[253a.4\]]'das skyes bu de ni byis pa'i ngang tshul can du rig par bgyi ste/_mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs 
[\[253a.5\]]kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs 
[\[253a.6\]]su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar 
[\[253a.7\]]gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu la la zhig 'khor los 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la/_des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas 'di snyam du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po kha dog dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba zhig yod ces/_des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang /_dbyibs kyi mtshan ma gzung bar bsams 
[\[253b.2\]]te/_'di skad du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang tshul dang mtshan ma yang /_sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra ba zhig yod grang zhes zer na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[253b.3\]]'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes 
[\[253b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal 
[\[253b.5\]]bar sems pa 'byung na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i dang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 
[\[253b.6\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu shin tu bkres pa la la zhig 
[\[253b.7\]]gis/_ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas rnyed kyang /_drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal bar sems shing /_des kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de bor nas/_drug cu pa'i kha zas la bza' bar bsams na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skyes 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i 
[\[254a.2\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/_
[\[254a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa byung na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[254a.4\]]ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu la la zhig gis nor 
[\[254a.5\]]bu rin po che rin thang med pa rnyed nas/_nor bu mching bu dang bsgrun par bsams na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_
[\[254a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 
[\[254a.7\]]'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/_rab 'byor 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[254b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/_
[\[254b.3\]]spobs pa mang po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i dkrugs mar 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba 'di ltar/_gzugs kyi spobs pa dang /_sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos kyi spobs pa dang /_sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang /_tshul 
[\[254b.4\]]khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi spobs pa dang /_'dod pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang /_gzugs kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang /_lud dpog pa dang /_kha ton 
[\[254b.5\]]du bya ba'i spobs pa dang /_rim gror bya ba'i spobs pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam gyi spobs pa dang 
[\[254b.6\]]bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi spobs pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /_
[\[254b.7\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /_stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[255a.2\]]phyin pa ni spobs pa med pas rnam par byang ba'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems med pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa 
[\[255a.3\]]med pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brjod du med 
[\[255a.4\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba med pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la med 
[\[255a.5\]]cing mi dmigs te/_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/_chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems 
[\[255a.6\]]dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[255a.7\]]tu phyin pa bri bar nus lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de lta ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/_/bsam gtan 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid 
[\[255b.2\]]thams cad cad dang /_byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/_mi dmigs so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[255b.3\]]pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/_/ting nge 
[\[255b.4\]]'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[255b.5\]]rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/_/ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pa gang yin pa 
[\[255b.6\]]de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_dngos po med pas dngos po med pa bri bar mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[255b.7\]]dngos po med ces bya bar 'du shes na/_de yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]yi ger bris nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchi na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la yi ger mngon par chags pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni yi ge 
[\[256a.2\]]ma mchis pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[256a.3\]]rol du phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/
[\[256a.4\]]nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa 
[\[256a.5\]]rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/
[\[256a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rnam pa thams 
[\[256a.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la/_yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par 
[\[256b.2\]]chags par bgyid pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam 
[\[256b.3\]]gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /_mngon 
[\[256b.4\]]par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[256b.5\]]rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags par bgyid na/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[256b.6\]]chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[256b.7\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_zhu ba dang 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_sgom pa'i tshe yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po skyed na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bzhi bcu bzhi pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[257a.2\]]rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang kha ton bya ba dang /_zhu ba dang 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_sgom pa'i tshe grong gi yid la bya ba dang /_grong rdal gyi yid la bya ba dang khams kyi 
[\[257a.3\]]yid la bya ba dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang /_mkhan po'i yid la bya ba dang /_pha dang ma dang phu nu dang sring mo dang /_gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_rkun po dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_
[\[257a.4\]]phyag dar ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_'jig rten dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_stu 'tshong ma dang ldan pa dang /_bud med dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_yid la bya ba gzhan mang po skye na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 
[\[257a.5\]]'di 'dri ba dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/_bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 'gyur ba nye bar sbyor te/_de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[257a.6\]]pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/_khe dang bkur bsti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang chos gos dang 
[\[257a.7\]]zas dang mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad mang po byung la/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]la byed pa'i tshe/_de dag gi ro myong bar byed na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid 
[\[257b.2\]]la byed pa'i tshe/_bar chad de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid 
[\[257b.3\]]la byed pa dang sgom pa'i tshe/_bdud sdig to can dag mdo sde zab mo gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma 
[\[257b.4\]]med pa dang smon pa med pa dag nye bar bsnyen par byed de/_de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos thabs mkhas pas bdud kyis bsnyen pa'i mdo sde zab mo de dag la 'dod pa mi bskyed do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[257b.5\]]de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mi mkhas pa dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems te/_de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[257b.6\]]chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa yang rgya cher bstan te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di las kyang /_thabs mkhas pa rgya cher btsal bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[257b.7\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las thabs mkhas pas btsal bar sems pa yod na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/shes rab 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u sum cu gcig pa'o//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya bar dga' la/_chos smra ba ni 
[\[258a.2\]]phyi shol byed na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton bya bar phyi shol mi byed la 
[\[258a.3\]]chos nyan pa ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa 
[\[258a.4\]]dang kha ton bya bar 'dod la/_chos smra ba ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/_khe dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa lhur len 
[\[258a.5\]]cing gos dang zas dang mal cha dang nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad lhur len la/_chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes la/_rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_mi g.yeng ba/_sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa/_shes rab dang ldan 
[\[258a.6\]]pa zhig ste/_khe dang bkur stis 'jigs na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par 
[\[258a.7\]]bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_mi g.yeng ba/_sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/_khe dang bkur 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]stis 'jigs la/_chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa che zhing sdig to 'dod la/_khe dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa lhur len cing /_gos dang zas dang mal cha dang nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad lhur len na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri 
[\[258b.2\]]ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni dgon pa ba/_bsod snyoms pa/_phyag dar 
[\[258b.3\]]khrod pa/_zas phyis mi len pa/_stan gcig pa/_ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa/_dur khrod pa/_bla gab med pa/_shing drung pa/_cog pu pa/_gzhi ji bzhin pa/_chos gos gsum par gyur la/_chos nyan pa ni dgon pa ba ma yin/_bsod 
[\[258b.4\]]snyoms pa ma yin/_phyag dar khrod pa ma yin/_zas phyis mi len pa ma yin/_stan gcig pa ma yin/_ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/_dur khrod pa ma yin/_bla gab med pa ma yin/_shing drung pa ma yin/_cog pu pa ma yin/_gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin/_chos 
[\[258b.5\]]gos gsum pa ma yin/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/
[\[258b.6\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni dgon pa pa dang /_chos gos gsum pa'i bar du gyur la/_chos smra ba ni dgon pa ba ma yin/_chos gos gsum pa'i bar du ma yin/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa 
[\[258b.7\]]dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni dad cing bsam pa dge la/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'dod/_lung 'phog par 'dod/_kha ton bya bar 'dod la/_chos smra ba ni ma dad pa/_tshul khrims ngan pa can/_sdig pa'i chos can zhig ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar mi 'dod/_lung 'bog par mi 'dod/_
[\[259a.2\]]kha ton byed par mi 'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig 
[\[259a.3\]]par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni dad cing bsam pa dge la/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_kha ton byed pa'i bar du 'dod la/_chos nyan pa ni ma dad na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 
[\[259a.4\]]'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su 
[\[259a.5\]]gtong zhing sems la chags pa med la/_chos nyan pa ni ser sna can chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa 
[\[259a.6\]]ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sems la chags pa med la/_chos smra ba ni ser sna can chags 
[\[259a.7\]]pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni/_chos smra ba la gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad yongs su gtong bar 'dod la/_chos smra ba ni len par mi 'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab 
[\[259b.2\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni glengs pa tsam 
[\[259b.3\]]gyis shes la/_chos nyan pa ni bkri dgos shing tshig lhur len par gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[259b.4\]]dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni glengs pa tsam gyis shes la/_chos smra ba ni bkri dgos shing tshig lhur len par gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa 
[\[259b.5\]]dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[259b.6\]]dang ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin du rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la/_chos nyan pa ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis 
[\[259b.7\]]bsnyad pa dang lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang 'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang shin du rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]kyi khyad par mi shes na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su 
[\[260a.2\]]rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang gtan la bab par bstan pa'i chos kyi bar gyi khyad par shes la/_chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang lung bstan pa dang gtan la 
[\[260a.3\]]bab par bstan pa'i chos kyi bar gyi khyad par mi shes na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[260a.4\]]bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan la/_chos nyan pa ni pha rol du phyin pa drug dang mi ldan na/_rab 'byor de 'ang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi 
[\[260a.5\]]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan la/_chos smra ba ni pha rol du phyin pa drug dang mi ldan na/_rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[260a.6\]]pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni pha rol du phyin pa drug la thabs mkhas la 
[\[260a.7\]]chos nyan pa ni pha rol du phyin pa drug la thabs mi mkhas na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni pha rol du phyin pa drug la thabs mkhas la/_chos smra ba ni pha rol du phyin pa drug la thabs mi mkhas na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_
[\[260b.2\]]lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gzungs thob par gyur la/_chos nyan pa ni gzungs ma thob na/_
[\[260b.3\]]rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[260b.4\]]gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gzungs thob par gyur la/_chos smra ba ni gzungs ma thob na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang 
[\[260b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos sma ba ni 'dri bar 'dod/_klag par 'dod/_lung 'bog par 'dod/_/kha ton bya bar 'dod/_bsgom par bya bar 'dod la/_chos nyan pa ni 'dri bar 
[\[260b.6\]]mi 'dod/_klag par mi 'dod/_lung 'bog par mi 'dod/_kha ton bya bar mi 'dod/_mnyan par mi 'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor 
[\[260b.7\]]de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni 'dri bar 'dod/_mnyan pa'i bar du 'dod la/_chos smra ba ni 'dri bar mi 'dod/_bsgom pa'i bar du mi 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]'dod par gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su 
[\[261a.2\]]rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bral/_gnod sems dang /_snyom pa dang /_gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang bral/_the tshom dang bral la/_chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/_gnod sems dang /_snyom pa dang /_
[\[261a.3\]]gnyid dang /_'gyod pa dang bcas/_the tshom dang bcas par gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[261a.4\]]chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bral/_gnod sems dang /_snyom pa dang /_gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang bral/_the tshom dang bral la/_chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/_gnod sems 
[\[261a.5\]]dang /_snyom pa dang gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang bcas/_the tshom dang bcas par gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[261a.6\]]dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i tshe/_la la zhig der 'ongs te sems 
[\[261a.7\]]can dmyal ba'i mi snyan pa brjod/_/byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul gyi mi snyan pa brjod cing /_sems can dmyal ba ni 'di lta bur sdug bsngal lo/_/byol song gi skye gnas ni 'di lta bur sdug bsngal lo/_/
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul ni 'di lta bur sdug bsngal lo/_/khyod kyi sdug bsngal 'di nyid du mthar phyin par gyis shig_/gang la sdug bsngal stong phrag mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya/_khyod 
[\[261b.2\]]yun ring pos 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur ta re zhes zer na/_rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud 
[\[261b.3\]]kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang 'chang ba dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/_la la zhig der 'ongs te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 
[\[261b.4\]]rnams kyi legs pa brjod/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dang mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod cing /_
[\[261b.5\]]'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pas 'di ltar bde'o/_/gzugs kyi khams ni bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde'o/_/gzugs med pa'i khams ni snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde ste/_de dag kyang 
[\[261b.6\]]mi rtag cing sdug bsngal la bdag med do/_/rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can/_zad pa'i chos can/_'jig pa'i chos can/_skye ba'i chos can/_'gag pa'i chos can yin gyis/_khyod kyi 'di nyid du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig_/lan 
[\[261b.7\]]cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig_/'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis shig_/phyin chad 'khor ba nam 'khor bar gyis shig ces zer na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/_
[\[262a.2\]]zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/_chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na/_rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[262a.3\]]dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig pu ste/_zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/_chos smra ba ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 
[\[262a.4\]]'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/_zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/_chos nyan 
[\[262a.5\]]pa ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/_rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[262a.6\]]gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig pu ste/_zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/_chos smra ba ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor 
[\[262a.7\]]de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'di skad du su 'ang phyi bzhin du 'brang ba de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dir sbyin no zhes zer la/_chos nyan pa ni phyi bzhin mi 'brang na/_rab 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni/_
[\[262b.2\]]chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'dod la/_chos smra ba ni drung du 'gro ba'i skabs mi 'byed na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[262b.3\]]pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par 'dod/_klog tu gzhug par 'dod/_lung 'bog par 'dod/_kha ton byed du gzhug par 'dod/_smra bar 
[\[262b.4\]]'dod la/_chos nyan pa ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir drung du 'gro bar ma mos na/_rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[262b.5\]]dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'dod/_nyan pa'i bar du 'dod la/_chos smra ba ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[262b.6\]]sbyin par mi 'dod/_nyan par gzhug pa'i bar du mi 'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su 
[\[262b.7\]]rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/_chos nyan pa ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/_chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar mi 
[\[263a.2\]]'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang 
[\[263a.3\]]na zas dkon pa dang /_chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la chos nyan pa ni 'gro bar mi 'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[263a.4\]]sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang na zas dkon pa dang /_chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/_chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_
[\[263a.5\]]lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas mod pa dang /_chu mod pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/_chos 
[\[263a.6\]]nyan pa yang rjes su 'brang na/_des de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod zang zing gi don du song ste ci rung legs par bsam pa sems par gyis shig_/zas thob ma thob dang bsod mi bsod kyis 'gyod par gyur ta re zhes zer na/_de'i phyir chos ston pa des kyang /_thabs phra 
[\[263a.7\]]mos chos la spang ba byas par 'gyur te/_de yang mi dga' zhing 'di snyam du 'du shes te/_'di ni sbyin par 'dod pa'i mtshan ma ma yin gyi/_spong ba'i mtshan ma yin no snyam na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba ni gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang /_chom po'i 'jigs pa dang /_rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[263b.2\]]gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang /_sbrul gyi 'jigs pa dang /_'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der 'gro bar 'dod la/_chos nyan pa dag kyang chos kyi don du chos kyis skom zhing rjes su 'brang na/_dge slong chos smra bas chos nyan pa de dag la 'di skad smras te/_rigs 
[\[263b.3\]]kyi bu dag khyed gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang /_chom po'i 'jigs pa dang /_rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang /_sbrul gyi 'jigs pa dang /_'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der dong ste ci rung zhes/_de ltar dge slong chos smra 
[\[263b.4\]]ba des chos mi bstan pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par mi 'dod/_/klog tu gzhug par mi 'dod/_/lung 'bog par mi 'dod/_kha ton byed du gzhug par mi 'dod/_/nyan du gzhug par mi 'dod par gyur la/_de dag 
[\[263b.5\]]gis dge slong chos smra ba'i tshig de thos nas/_mi dga' zhing mi dga' ba'i tshul can du gyur te/_dge slong chos smra ba gang na ba der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/_/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton 
[\[263b.6\]]byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor byed par gyur te/_de bsod snyoms gtong ba'i 
[\[263b.7\]]grong khyer gtso bor gyur pas/_bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer de dag yang dang yang blta bar sems shing /_der yang dang yang blta bas chos nyan pa phyir zlog cing /_tshe dang ldan pa dag ngas ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong blta dgos te/_bsod snyoms gtong 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]pa'i grong du 'gro dgos so zhes nas/_des chos nyan pa de dag phyir zlog pas phyir dong na/_rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub 
[\[264a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di su yang 'dri bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_lung 'bog par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kha ton 
[\[264a.3\]]byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdud sdig to can dag dge 
[\[264a.4\]]slong gi cha byad du bgyis shing /_ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di su yang 'dri bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_lung 'bog par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kha ton bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ba 
[\[264a.5\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing 'di skad du nged kyis ji ltar khong du chud pa 'di ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yin te/_ji skad du khyod klog pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[264a.6\]]du phyin pa ma yin no/_/zhes dbyen byed cing zlog la mos pa med par byed do/_/rab 'byor de la bdud sdig to can gyis de ltar dbyen byas pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' gang lung ma bstan pa de dag ni the tshom skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag tha tshom du gyur nas/_shes 
[\[264a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri bar 'gyur/_mi klog par 'gyur lung mi 'bog par 'gyur/_kha ton mi byed par 'gyur/_mi sgom par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas 
[\[264b.2\]]nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs shing /_'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed par 'gyur te/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[264b.3\]]'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ni rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/zhes zer na/_des tshig de thos nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[264b.4\]]mi spyod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes 
[\[264b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa'i tshe/_bar chad du 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi las mang du 'byung ste/_bdud kyi las de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rig par byas nas rnam par spang bar bya'o/_/de skad ces 
[\[264b.6\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bgyi ste/_spang bar bgyi ba de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[264b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las te/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste/_rnam par spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag 
[\[265a.2\]]kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/_/rnam par spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa 
[\[265a.3\]]nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar 
[\[265a.4\]]pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[265a.5\]]ba de dag kyang /_bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la nye bar bsnyen te/_de yang de la dga' ba skyed na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha 
[\[265a.6\]]ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du lus gser kyi kha dog dang /_mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa 
[\[265a.7\]]gnyis dang /_'od 'dom gang bar ldan par byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mos pa skyed do/_/des mos pa bskyed nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]yongs su nyam par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o rab 
[\[265b.2\]]'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i mdun du sangs rgyas la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nye bar ston to/_/des de la 'dod pa bskyed cing bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[265b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bur shog shig_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang /_tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis chos ji ltar ston pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos 
[\[265b.4\]]bstan par bgyi'o/_/zhes de de la 'dod pa bskyed pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyam par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa 
[\[265b.5\]]ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag du ma/_byang chub sems 
[\[265b.6\]]dpa' stong phrag du ma/_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[265b.7\]]pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de lta bu dag nye bar ston te/_de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la 'dod pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/des de dag la 'dod pa bskyed nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyam par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_sgom pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[266a.2\]]chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la gzugs med do/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa med do/_/skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med do/_/
[\[266a.3\]]pha rol du phyin pa rnams med do/_/stong pa nyid rnams med do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med do/_/bsam gtan rnams med do/_/tshad med pa rnams med do/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 
[\[266a.4\]]med do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad med do/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa med do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams med do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams med 
[\[266a.5\]]do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med do/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi med do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi med do/_/byams pa chen po med do/_/snying rje chen po med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[266a.6\]]med do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub med do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do/_/rab 'byor gang la 
[\[266a.7\]]gzugs med pa dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /_'du byed dang rnam par shes pa med pa dang /_skye mched med pa dang khams med pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams med pa dang /_stong pa nyid rnams med pa dang /_
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams med pa dang /_tshad med pa rnams med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad med pa dang /_mthar 
[\[266b.2\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams med pa dang ting nge 'dzin rnams med pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams med pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[266b.3\]]gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams med pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med pa dang /_snying rje chen po med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med pa dang /_lan cig 
[\[266b.4\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub med pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/rang sangs rgyas med do/_/nyan 
[\[266b.5\]]thos med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ba ste/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang 
[\[266b.6\]]lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la yang bar chad tu 'gyur ba med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i rin po che gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang dngul 
[\[266b.7\]]dang sa le sbram gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing /_phyir rgol ba mang ba dag go_/rab 'byor de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la yang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyir rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[267a.2\]]ni de bzhin no/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni de bzhin te/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i rin po che gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang dngul dang /_sa le sbram gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur pa mang zhing slar rgol ba mang ba 
[\[267a.3\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bgyid pa dang /_ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag la yang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung 
[\[267a.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/slar rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog 
[\[267a.5\]]pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang dag gis bar chad bgyid pa ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa de dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang 
[\[267a.6\]]rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bgyid pa dang ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gi bar chad bgyid pa de dag ni/_blo rgya shin du chung bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs po che dag 
[\[267a.7\]]la de dag gi sems mi 'jug go/_/de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri/_mi klog lung mi 'bog_/kha ton mi bgyid/_mi sgom tshul bzhin du yid la mi bgyid de/_gzhan 'dri zhing klog pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang /_ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]bgyid pa dag la yang bar chad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri/_mi klog lung mi 'bog_/kha ton 
[\[267b.2\]]mi byed/_mi sgom tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing /_gzhan 'dri ba dang klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi bar chad byed pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa/_
[\[267b.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du chung ba/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsgrubs pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa dag ste/_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[267b.4\]]dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mi 'dri mi klog_/lung mi 'bog_/kha ton mi byed/_mi sgom/_tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing /_gzhan 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang /_ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[267b.5\]]byed pa de dag gi bar chad byed pa de dag ni blo rgya shin du chung bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs po che dag la de dag gi sems mi 'jug go_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed 
[\[267b.6\]]pa dang /_ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag la bdud kyi las 'di dag 'byung mod kyi/_'on kyang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /_lung 'bog cing kha ton byed pa dang /_
[\[267b.7\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]rdzogs par byed pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad 
[\[268a.2\]]med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[268a.3\]]rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_thams cad 
[\[268a.4\]]shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed na/_rab 'byor de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par shes par bya ste/_des rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes 
[\[268a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o/_/klog go_/lung 'bog go_/kha ton byed do/_/tshul bzhin du yid la byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gong du pha rol du phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs 
[\[268a.6\]]par byed do/_/stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam
