[\[268a.7\]]par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su 
[\[268b.2\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_bstan 
[\[268b.3\]]pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang 
[\[268b.4\]]kha ton byed pa dang ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing /_yongs su 'dzin par byed do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bzhi bcu lnga pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_
[\[268b.5\]]bud med la la zhig la/_bu lnga 'am/_bcu 'am/_nyi shu 'am/_sum cu 'am/_bzhi bcu 'am/_lnga bcu 'am/_brgya 'am/_stong zhig yod na/_de dag ni ma de ci nas kyang mi na bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed cing bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na nad med par 'gyur/_
[\[268b.6\]]bdag cag gi ma 'di la ji ltar na bar chad du mi 'gyur/_bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/_bdag cag gi ma 'di ring du 'tsho bar byed na ji ltar bya/_bdag cag gi ma 'di lus la mi bde ba'i nyams med par bya na ji ltar bya/_'di ni bdag cag 
[\[268b.7\]]skyed skyed pa ste/_srog gi sbyin bdag go/_/zhes de dag ma de la rim gro legs par bya bas rim gro byed do/_/de dag ni 'di'i srog gi bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong ngo /_/lus nyam chung bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo /_/lus la sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sbrul 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]gyis gtse ba'i mi bde bas bab du 'ong ngo /_/tsha ba dang /_grang ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pas mi bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo /_/zhes bsti stang legs par bya bas bsti stang du byed do/_/de ltar bu de dag ma de la 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa'o/_/'di 
[\[269a.2\]]ni 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o/_/zhes bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rgyun tu rim gro byed cing bsti stang dang bkur bsti cher byed do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab 
[\[269a.3\]]mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gzigs shing dgongs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed skyed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di ston ston pa'o/_/zhes rgyun tu gzigs shing 
[\[269a.4\]]dgongs so/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 
[\[269a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed skyed pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[269a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'di yang ston ston pa'o/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/_/de 
[\[269a.7\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/'di las byung ba ni nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro/_/'di las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong 
[\[269b.2\]]ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_
[\[269b.3\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad do/_/'di las byung ba ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_
[\[269b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[269b.5\]]bar ro/_/'di las byung ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[269b.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs 
[\[269b.7\]]par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rten te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang 
[\[270a.2\]]sgom pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[270a.3\]]dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ci nas kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 
[\[270a.4\]]srung ba mdzad do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'jig 
[\[270a.5\]]rten ston pa'o/_/zhes bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[270a.6\]]pa 'jig rten ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa bskrun pa lags/_'jig rten ni de bzhin gshegs pas gang la gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi 
[\[270a.7\]]pha rol du phyin pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed do/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bskyed do/_/rab 'byor chos de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs par brjod de/_rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[270b.2\]]gsungs pa'i 'jig rten gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor phung po lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du gsungs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mos phung po lnga ni ji ltar bstan pa lags/_
[\[270b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni ji ltar phung po lnga ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni phung po lnga po 'di dag 'jig par ston pa ma yin/_rab tu 'jig par ston pa ma yin te/_skye zhes bya bar mi ston to/_
[\[270b.4\]]'gag ces bya bar mi ston to/_/kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang /_'phel zhes bya ba dang /_'grib ces bya ba dang /_blang zhes bya ba dang /_dor zhes bya ba dang /_'das zhes bya ba dang /_ma 'ongs shes bya ba dang /_da ltar byung zhes bya bar 
[\[270b.5\]]mi ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 'jig pa'am/_rab tu 'jig pa med do/_/mtshan ma med pa la 'jig pa'am/_rab tu 'jig pa med do/_/smon pa med pa la 'jig pa'am/_rab tu 'jig pa med do/_/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'jig pa'am/_
[\[270b.6\]]rab tu 'jig pa med do/_/skye ba med pa la 'jig pa'am/_rab tu 'jig pa med do/_/dngos po med pa la 'jig pa'am/_rab tu 'jig pa med do/_/rang bzhin med pa la 'jig pa'am/_rab tu 'jig pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[270b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'jig rten ston par gsungs te/_rab 'byor sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems dang spyod pa mkhyen pa de dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid la brten cing rab tu mkhyen te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]pa zab mo 'di la ni sems can med do/_/sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs so/_/gzugs med do/_/gzugs su gdags pa mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa med do/_/rnam par shes par gdags pa mi 
[\[271a.2\]]dmigs so/_/mig med do/_/gzugs med do/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa med do/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/_/mig du gdags pa mi dmigs so/_/gzugs su gdags pa mi dmigs so/_/mig gi rnam 
[\[271a.3\]]par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/_/rna ba med do/_/skra med do/_/sna med do/_/dri med do/_/lce med do/_/ro med do/_/
[\[271a.4\]]lus med do/_/reg bya med do/_/yid med do/_/chos med do/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/_/yid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/_/chos su gdags pa mi dmigs so/_
[\[271a.5\]]yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams med do/_/pha rol du phyin pa rnams med do/_/stong 
[\[271a.6\]]pa nyid thams cad med do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med do/_/bsam gtan rnams med do/_/tshad med pa rnams med do/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad med do/_/
[\[271a.7\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa med do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams med do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams med do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]stobs rnams med do/_/mi 'jigs pa rnams med do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med do/_/snying rje chen po med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[271b.2\]]pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ston pa yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzugs ston par byed pa ma yin no/_/tshor ba 
[\[271b.3\]]dang 'du shes dang /_'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ston par byed pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 
[\[271b.4\]]'di nyid la med cing mi dmigs na/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yod pa'am/_dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'am/_dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_rab 
[\[271b.5\]]'byor gzhan yang sems can ji snyed cig gdags su yod pa/_gzugs yod pa'am/_gzugs med pa'am/_'du shes yod pa'am/_'du shes med pa'am/_'du shes yod pa yang ma yin/_'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[271b.6\]]'di dang /_phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag gi yang rung ste/_de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_spros pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sems bsdus pa dang /_spros par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de 
[\[271b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_spros pa yang dag par ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_spros pa ni chos nyid kyis yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_spros pa chos nyid gang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[272a.2\]]pa/_rab 'byor de ni chos nyid gang la chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na/_sems bsdus pa dang /_spros pa lta smos kyang mi smos pa'i chos nyid des/_de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen 
[\[272a.3\]]to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[272a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_spros pa de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can de 
[\[272a.5\]]dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_spros pa ni zad pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_spros pa ni 'dod 
[\[272a.6\]]chags dang bral ba dang /_'gag pa dang /_spong ba'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_spros pa ni 
[\[272a.7\]]zhi ba dang /_dben pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'dod 
[\[272b.2\]]chags dang bral ba'i sems la/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/zhe sdang dang bral ba'i 
[\[272b.3\]]sems la/_zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la/_gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la/_gti mug 
[\[272b.4\]]dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la/_'dod 
[\[272b.5\]]chags dang bcas pa'i sems shes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/_ji ltar na zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems shes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/_bcom 
[\[272b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med do/_/sems las byung ba'i chos 
[\[272b.7\]]rnams kyang dmigs su med na/_'dod chags dang bcas pa 'am/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor sems zhe sdang dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni/_sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med de/_sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su med na/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa 'am/_zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor sems gti mug dang bcas 
[\[273a.2\]]pa gang yin pa de ni/_sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med de/_sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su med na/_gti mug dang bcas pa 'am/_gti mug dang bral ba'i 
[\[273a.3\]]sems dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen 
[\[273a.4\]]to/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la/_gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 
[\[273a.5\]]'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor sems 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/_sems kyi 'dod chags 
[\[273a.6\]]dang bcas pa nyid ma yin/_'dod chags dang bral ba nyid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med de/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la/_'dod chags dang 
[\[273a.7\]]bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na sems can de dag gi sems zhe sdang dang bral ba la/_zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor sems zhe sdang dang 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]bral ba gang yin pa de ni/_sems kyi zhe sdang dang bcas pa nyid ma yin te/_zhe sdang dang bral ba nyid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med de/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 
[\[273b.2\]]zhe sdang dang bral ba la/_zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems gti mug dang bral ba la/_gti mug dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji 
[\[273b.3\]]lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor sems gti mug dang bral ba de ni/_sems kyi gti mug dang bcas pa nyid ma yin/_gti mug dang bral ba nyid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med de/_rab 'byor de ltar na 
[\[273b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems gti mug dang bral ba la/_gti mug dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_
[\[273b.5\]]sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems rgya che ba la/_sems rgya che zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_
[\[273b.6\]]gang zag pha rol gyi sems rgya che ba la/_sems rgya che zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems de rgya che 
[\[273b.7\]]bar mi 'gyur/_sems de rgya chung bar mi 'gyur/_sems de 'phel bar mi 'gyur/_sems de 'grib bar mi 'gyur/_sems de 'ong bar mi 'gyur/_sems de 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/_sems de dngos po med pas rgya che bar 'gyur ba ma yin/_rgya chung bar 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]'gyur ba ma yin/_'phel bar 'gyur ba ma yin/_'grib par 'gyur ba ma yin/_'ong bar 'gyur ba ma yin/_'gro bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar sems la gang gis rgya chen por 'gyur 
[\[274a.2\]]ba'am/_rgya chung ngur 'gyur ba'am/_'phel bar 'gyur ba'am/_'grib par 'gyur ba'am/_'ong bar 'gyur ba'am/_'gro bar 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes 
[\[274a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems rgya che ba la/_sems rgya che zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[274a.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol kyi sems yangs pa la/_sems yangs shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[274a.5\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems yangs pa la sems yangs shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la 
[\[274a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems de la 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba mi gzigs so/_/skye ba dang 'gag pa dang gnas pa dang gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi gzigs 
[\[274a.7\]]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems de la gang 'ong bar 'gyur ba'am/_'gro bar 'gyur ba'am/_skye bar 'gyur ba'am/_'gag par 'gyur ba'am/_gnas par 'gyur ba'am/_gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid med de/_rab 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems yangs pa la/_sems yangs shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[274b.2\]]du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems tshad med pa la/_sems tshad 
[\[274b.3\]]med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems tshad 
[\[274b.4\]]med pa la/_sems tshad med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems gnas par yang dag 
[\[274b.5\]]par rjes su mi gzigs/_rnam par gnas pa dang /_yongs su gnas pa dang /_nye bar gnas par yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud ni rten med cing tshad med pa ste/_sems kyi rgyud de dag la gang la gnas par 
[\[274b.6\]]bya ba'i rten med pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems tshad med pa la/_sems tshad med 
[\[274b.7\]]ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]sems bstan du med pa la/_sems bstan du med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[275a.2\]]la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems bstan du med pa la/_sems bstan du med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_mtshan 
[\[275a.3\]]nyid med pa'i sems la/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_mtshan nyid med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[275a.4\]]pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems bstan du med pa la bstan du med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[275a.5\]]rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems bltar med pa la bltar med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[275a.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems bltar med pa la/_bltar med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 
[\[275a.7\]]'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga la/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems de dag snang bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems bltar med pa la/_bltar med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[275b.2\]]kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[275b.3\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen 
[\[275b.4\]]ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa gang ji snyed cig skye zhing 'byung ba de dag thams 
[\[275b.5\]]cad kyang gzugs la brten/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la brten pas skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems de dag rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[275b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de la 
[\[275b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/_bdag dang 'jig rten rtag ces bya ba de nyid 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bden gyi/_gzhan ni don med do ces bya ba de ni/_gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten mi rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de 
[\[276a.2\]]ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten rtag kyang rtag la/_mi rtag kyang mi rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don med do/_zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba 
[\[276a.3\]]dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa 'ang ma yin/_mi rtag pa 'ang ma yin/_zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du 
[\[276a.4\]]byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don med do/_/zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_bdag dang 
[\[276a.5\]]'jig rten ni mtha' dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan pa yang yin la/_mtha' dang mi 
[\[276a.6\]]ldan pa yang yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang 
[\[276a.7\]]ma yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/lus de srog dang ldan zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par 
[\[276b.2\]]shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas yod ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas 
[\[276b.3\]]med ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas yod kyang yod la med kyang med ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas yod par 'gyur ba yang ma yin/_med par 'gyur ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs 
[\[276b.4\]]la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen te/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[276b.5\]]la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[276b.6\]]la brten te/_gzugs mkhyen to/_/gzugs ji ltar mkhyen ce na/_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/_mtshan ma med cing byed pa med de/_spros pa med cing dmigs su med pa de ltar mkhyen to/_/tshor ba dang 'du 
[\[276b.7\]]shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mkhyen to/_/rnam par shes pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na/_de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/_mtshan ma med cing byed pa med de/_spros pa med cing dmigs su med pa de ltar mkhyen to/_/rab 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa rnams kyang de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 
[\[277a.2\]]rab tu mkhyen to/_/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_'gyur ba med pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du mkhyen to/_/de ltar na 'phro ba dang 'du ba dang bkram pa dang bcum pa'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[277a.3\]]gang yin pa de ni/_phung po'i de bzhin nyid do/_/phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_khams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rten cing 
[\[277a.4\]]'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_pha rol du phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid do/_/pha rol du phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/
[\[277a.5\]]stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/_/bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin 
[\[277a.6\]]pa de ni/_tshad med pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/_/tshad med pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_mngon par shes pa lnga'i de bzhin 
[\[277a.7\]]nyid do/_/mngon par shes pa lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid do/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]bar 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[277b.2\]]pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 
[\[277b.3\]]de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid do/_/byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid do/_/snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/sangs 
[\[277b.4\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[277b.5\]]gang yin pa de ni/_mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams 
[\[277b.6\]]kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/
[\[277b.7\]]zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_'dus byas dang /_'dus 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[278a.2\]]ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang 
[\[278a.3\]]yin pa de ni/_rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_
[\[278a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_de bzhin nyid gcig pa nyid de tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_mi zad pa ste mi zad pa'i phyir gnyis su med de/_gnyis su byar med do/_/rab 'byor de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin 
[\[278a.5\]]nyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten te/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di ston pa'o/_/rab 
[\[278a.6\]]'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do/_/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do/_/de bzhin nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[278a.7\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab pa ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid des na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub brjod cing smos so/_/bcom ldan 'das slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[278b.2\]]rnams dang /_gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams ma gtogs par su zhig 'di la mos par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams la gsungs 
[\[278b.3\]]pa ni shin du zab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mi zad pa ste/_ci'i phyir mi zad ce na/_chos thams cad ni mi zad pa'i phyir te/_de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[278b.4\]]rgyas kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams la gsungs te/_'di ltar chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u sum cu 
[\[278b.5\]]gnyis pa'o//_//de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas mngon par 'thor zhing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na 
[\[278b.6\]]ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[278b.7\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo bshad na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]zab mo 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes 
[\[279a.2\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/
[\[279a.3\]]lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_rnam par byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_dngos po 
[\[279a.4\]]med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 
[\[279a.5\]]'di ni/_mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang /_de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi brdar bka' 
[\[279a.6\]]stsal te/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis gzhan du bya bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang mtshan nyid der zad de/_/lha'i bu 
[\[279a.7\]]dag mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid gzhan du mi byed do/_/mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid shes par mi byed do/_/mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa shes par mi byed do/_/mtshan nyid med pa ni mtshan nyid med pa shes par mi byed do/_/de ltar na mtshan nyid dang /_mtshan nyid med pa dang /_mtshan 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]nyid yod pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa de gnyis ka la yang gang gis shes par bya ba dang /_gang shes par bya ba dang /_gang shes par byed pa de lta bu mi srid do/_/lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni gzugs kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_
[\[279b.2\]]rnam par shes pas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha 
[\[279b.3\]]rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/stong pa nyid thams cad kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis 
[\[279b.4\]]'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_
[\[279b.5\]]mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams 
[\[279b.6\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni mi'am/_mi ma yin pa'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa med pa'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'am/_'dus byas sam/_/'dus ma byas kyis 
[\[279b.7\]]ma yin te/_lha'i bu dag la la zhig 'di skad du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gang yin zhes zer na/_ci de yang dag par smra bas/_yang dag par smra ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_yang dag par smra bas/_yang dag par smra 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]ba ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid gang yang ma mchis so/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_
[\[280a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings de ni de bzhin du gnas so/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pas ma nor bar mngon par sangs rgyas te/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes 
[\[280a.3\]]bya'o/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa chos 
[\[280a.4\]]thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis par 'jug cing mtshan nyid de dag la zhugs pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtshan nyid thams cad kyi chags pa las 'das pa 'di mngon par rdzogs 
[\[280a.5\]]par sangs rgyas te/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par bstan pas/_mtshan nyid rnams rab tu bstan pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pas/_mtshan nyid zab mo mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bcom 
[\[280a.6\]]ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur te/_de la spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_bla na med 
[\[280a.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu dbye bar mdzad de/_'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang /_
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_skye mched kyi mtshan nyid dang khams kyi mtshan nyid dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba mdzad pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/de skad 
[\[280b.2\]]ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag gzugs ni gzhig tu rung ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[280b.3\]]so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid/_'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid/_'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid/_rnam par shes pa ni so so'i bye brag shes pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[280b.4\]]rgyas so/_/phung po rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid/_khams rnams ni gdug pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/skye mched rnams ni 'byung ba'i sgo'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[280b.5\]]bas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid de/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni yongs su 
[\[280b.6\]]gtong ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gdung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du 
[\[280b.7\]]phyin pa ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ni yang dag par sdud pa'i mtshan nyid/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]bsam gtan bzhi dang tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dag ni mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi 
[\[281a.2\]]chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par 
[\[281a.3\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de ni de 
[\[281a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam par thar pa rnams ni 'grel ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/stobs rnams ni shin du rnam par gdon mi za ba'i 
[\[281a.5\]]mtshan nyid/_mi 'jigs pa rnams ni shin du brtan pa'i mtshan nyid/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yongs su mi chod pa'i mtshan nyid/_byams pa chen po ni phan par sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid/_snying rje chen po ni skyob pa'i mtshan nyid/_dga' ba chen po ni rab tu dga' 
[\[281a.6\]]ba'i mtshan nyid/_btang snyoms chen po ni ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni mi 'phrogs pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[281a.7\]]pa nyid kyi ye shes ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/lha'i bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/_de'i phyir na 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ni chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes can zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'jig 
[\[281b.2\]]rten ston pa'o/_/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos 'di la brten cing rnam par spyod do/_/chos de la rim gror mdzad cing mchod pa mdzad do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de 
[\[281b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa rim gro mdzad pa dang bkur bsti mdzad pa dang bsti stang mdzad pa dang /_mchod pa mdzad pa de ni chos dang ldan pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las byung ste/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs 
[\[281b.4\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byas pa mkhyen pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byas pa dgongs pa'o/_/rab 'byor gang la la zhig yang dag par smra bas byas pa shes shing byas pa dran pa'o zhes smra na/_
[\[281b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa mkhyen cing byas pa dgongs pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas/_yang dag par smra'o/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas byas pa mkhyen cing byas pa dgongs pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[281b.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa gang gis byon pa dang /_lam gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa'i theg pa de nyid dang lam de nyid la/_de bzhin gshegs pa rim gro mdzad pa dang /_bkur bsti mdzad 
[\[281b.7\]]pa dang bsti stang mdzad pa dang mchod pa mdzad pa dang /_yongs su bsrung ba mdzad pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa mkhyen pa dang /_byas pa dgongs par blta'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma med 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]pa la brten te/_byed pa po med pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/lus med pa'i phyir ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[282a.2\]]phyin pa la brten te/_chos thams cad la bya ba med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa mkhyen pa dang byas pa dgongs pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brten te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[282a.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes byas pa med pa/_/chos thams cad la 'jug pa med pa'i brdas 'jug ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[282a.4\]]ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad la shes pa po ma mchis shing /_mthong ba po ma mchis na/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing 'jig rten 'di ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin 
[\[282a.5\]]te/_chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa'o/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa gsog gsob dbang med pa/_snying po med pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[282a.6\]]yang chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa ste/_rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi gnas shing khongs su chud pa ma yin pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos 
[\[282a.7\]]thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o/_/de yang gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]pa mthong ba po med pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin 
[\[282b.2\]]gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji 
[\[282b.3\]]ltar na skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag 
[\[282b.4\]]nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bzhi bcu drug pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/_gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam 
[\[282b.5\]]par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba med 
[\[282b.6\]]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam pha rol du phyin pa rnams la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags 
[\[282b.7\]]pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[283a.2\]]pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/_rnam pa thams 
[\[283a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig 
[\[283a.4\]]rten ston pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'jig rten du stong pa zhes rjod de/_'jig rten du ci stong pa zhes rjod ce na/_phung po lnga stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/skye mched bcu gnyis stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 
[\[283a.5\]]rjod do/_/khams [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/pha rol du phyin pa drug stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/nang stong pa nyid stong ngo 
[\[283a.6\]]zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam 
[\[283a.7\]]gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_
[\[283b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/_/rab 
[\[283b.3\]]'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ston na/_'jig rten stong zhes bya bar rjod/_'jig rten stong zhes bya bar shes par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig 
[\[283b.4\]]rten ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ston te/_'jig rten ji ltar stong zhes bya bar ston ce na/_'jig rten na phung po stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na skye mched dang /_khams dang /_
[\[283b.5\]]rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong ngo zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na pha rol du phyin pa drug dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun stong zhes bya 
[\[283b.6\]]bar ston to/_/'jig rten na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par 
[\[283b.7\]]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor 
[\[284a.2\]]de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston te/_ji ltar 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya 
[\[284a.3\]]bar ston ce na/_phung po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi 
[\[284a.4\]]khyab ces bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston te/_'jig rten ji ltar dben zhes bya bar ston ce na/_phung po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/
[\[284a.5\]]skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig 
[\[284a.6\]]rten ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/_ji ltar 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/_phung po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 
[\[284a.7\]]'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/_ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/_phung po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/skye 
[\[284b.2\]]mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_de 
[\[284b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes byar bar ston te/_ji ltar 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 
[\[284b.4\]]ston ce na/_phung po'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig 
[\[284b.5\]]rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te/_ji ltar 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston ce na/_phung po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya 
[\[284b.6\]]bar ston to/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_de bzhin 
[\[284b.7\]]gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te/_ji ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston ce na/_phung po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[285a.2\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten ji ltar ston ce na/_ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'ang mi 'gyur la/_'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba'am/_'jig 
[\[285a.3\]]rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar 
[\[285a.4\]]gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab 
[\[285a.5\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor shes 
[\[285a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_don dpag tu med pa dang /_don gzhal du med pa dang /_don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas 
[\[285a.7\]]pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste/_'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i don to/_/rab 'byor 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_
[\[285b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[285b.3\]]sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa la/_gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang /_dpag par nus pa de lta bu gang yang med de/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de 
[\[285b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid 
[\[285b.5\]]dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du med de/_sus kyang gzhal bar mi nus so/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[285b.6\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[285b.7\]]rgyas rnams la mnyam pas mnyam pa yang su yang med na/_lhag pa lta ci smos te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab la dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /_mi mnyam 
[\[286a.2\]]pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/rab 'byor sangs 
[\[286a.3\]]rgyas nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu med gzhal du med de mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/
[\[286a.4\]]rab 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/skye mched rnams dang khams rnams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag 
[\[286a.5\]]tu med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal 
[\[286a.6\]]du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems mi dmigs so/_/sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa 
[\[286a.7\]]ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor skye mched dang /_
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa 
[\[286b.2\]]dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/_ci'i slad du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed 
[\[286b.3\]]dang rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/_ci'i slad du skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis/_gzhal du ma mchis 
[\[286b.4\]]shing /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/_ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[286b.5\]]pa/_rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/_/skye 
[\[286b.6\]]mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[286b.7\]]ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/_ci'i slad du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/_
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]ci'i slad du skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/_ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa 
[\[287a.2\]]dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu med tshad med gzhal du med la/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad 
[\[287a.3\]]dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu med tshad med gzhal du med la/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang 
[\[287a.4\]]dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med tshad med/_gzhal du med la/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_de'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung 
[\[287a.5\]]ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med tshad med/_gzhal du med la/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad 
[\[287a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ji snyams du sems/_gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmigs su 
[\[287a.7\]]yod dam/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/_skye mched dang khams 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su yod dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu 
[\[287b.2\]]med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs 'dis 
[\[287b.3\]]chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/dpag pa dang bral 
[\[287b.4\]]ba'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o/_/tshad dang bral ba'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o/_/mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu med/_gzhal du med pa 
[\[287b.5\]]ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/dpag pa las yongs su 'das pas na/_dpag tu med pa'o/_/tshad 
[\[287b.6\]]las yongs su 'das pas na/_gzhal du med pa'o/_/mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba 'di ni bsam du med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[287b.7\]]dpag tu med ces bya ba 'di ni dpag tu mi rung ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam pas mnyam pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_rab 'byor 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[288a.2\]]dpag tu med ces bya ba ni nam mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhal du med ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir ro/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 
[\[288a.3\]]de dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med/_gzhal du med pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/_bsam pa'am dpag par mi nus te/_de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhal du med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[288a.4\]]chos rnams ni gzhal du med do/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang gzhal du med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems 
[\[288a.5\]]rnam par grol lo/_/dge slong ma brgya phrag nyi shu nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge bsnyen stong phrag drug cu dang /_dge bsnyen ma stong phrag sum cu ni/_chos rnams la rdul dang bral zhing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_
[\[288a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shu ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u sum cu gsum 
[\[288a.7\]]mo//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/_/don tshad ma mchis pa dang /_don dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/_don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye 
[\[288b.2\]]bar gnas pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/_don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/_don tshad med pa dang /_don 
[\[288b.3\]]dpag tu med pa dang /_don gzhal du med pa dang /_don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dir ni pha rol du phyin pa lnga 'dus so/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dir ni/_nang stong 
[\[288b.4\]]pa nyid 'dus so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dus so/_/yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[288b.5\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar 
[\[288b.6\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_
[\[288b.7\]]mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'dus so/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dir ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba srid brtan par gyur pa'i rgyal po'i dgos pa'am/_yul gyi dgos pa gang ci yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad la blon po las su bcug na/_de'i tshe rgyal po ni rgyal po'i 
[\[289a.2\]]dgos pa dang /_yul gyi dgos pa la snying las chung zhing khur bor ba yin/_rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
