[\[310a.6\]]dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_
[\[310a.7\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]ma mchis so/_'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni tshor ba'o/_/'di ni 'du shes so/_/'di ni 'du byed do/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di ni skye mched do/_/'di ni khams so/_/'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni pha rol du phyin pa thams 
[\[310b.2\]]cad do/_/'di ni stong pa nyid thams cad do/_/'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no/_/'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/_/'di ni bsam gtan rnams so/_/'di ni tshad med pa rnams so/_/'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[310b.3\]]rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/_/'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/_/'di ni rnams par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'o/_'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/'di ni 
[\[310b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/_/'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o/_/'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o/_/'di ni byams pa chen po'o/_/'di ni snying rje chen po'o/_/'di 
[\[310b.5\]]ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad do/_/'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ro zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_gzugs 
[\[310b.6\]]kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do/_
[\[310b.7\]]pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 
[\[311a.2\]]'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[311a.3\]]kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med de/_'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di ni skye mched 
[\[311a.4\]]dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni pha rol du phyin pa thams cad do/_/'di ni stong pa nyid thams cad do/_/'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no/_/'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/_/'di ni bsam 
[\[311a.5\]]gtan rnams so/_/'di ni tshad med pa rnams so/_/'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/_/'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/_/'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa 
[\[311a.6\]]nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o/_/'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/_/'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o/_/'di ni 
[\[311a.7\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o/_/'di ni byams pa chen po'o/_/'di ni snying rje chen po'o/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad do/_/'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ro zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa gang yang med de/_rab 'byor 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos de ltar zhi bdag la rtog kyang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing bdag gis chos de dag ni 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni 'di ltar mngon par 
[\[311b.2\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos de ltar zhi ba dang /_de ltar bzang ba de dag bshad par bya'o snyam du sems pa ni dka' ba byed pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[311b.3\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'jig 
[\[311b.4\]]rten gyi gling du gyur pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_chu klung ngam/_chu bran nam/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na chus yongs su bcad pa'i gnas gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni gling zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_
[\[311b.5\]]phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs 
[\[311b.6\]]su chad pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[311b.7\]]pa dang /_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]kyi bar ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams 
[\[312a.2\]]dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_
[\[312a.3\]]mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[312a.4\]]chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa 'dis chos 
[\[312a.5\]]thams cad yongs su chad pa ste/_rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba'o/_/de ni bzang po'o/_/de ni yang dag pa ste/_'di ltar stong pa nyid dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_lam gyi rgyun chad 
[\[312a.6\]]pa dang /_sred pa zad pa dang /_'dre ba med pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[312a.7\]]par sangs rgyas nas/_de ltar zhi ba dang /_de ltar bzang po'i chos de dag ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi gling du 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[312b.2\]]dpa' chen po yun ring du ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs kyi rab rib kyis kun nas 'khris shing mun pas zil gyis non pa'i sems can rnams la shes rab kyis snang bar byed cing /_gti mug gi mun pa dang /_ma rig pa'i mun gnag dang /_mi shes pa'i rab rib 
[\[312b.3\]]sel te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[312b.4\]]chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing 'od 'byin pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[312b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_mdo sde pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa/_byin gyi rlabs bzhi dang ldan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang ldan pa de dag gi don ma nor bar/_sems can rnams la yang dag par ston ste/_
[\[312b.6\]]sems can rnams kyang de la yang dag par skul zhing sbyor la/_gzhog cing rab tu 'god de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems 
[\[312b.7\]]can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing 'od 'byin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can lam ngan par zhugs shing tshul ma yin pa bzhi la zhen pa rnams 
[\[313a.2\]]la/_sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i don du mya ngan dang gnod pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba nub par bya ba dang /_rig pa dang ldan pa'i chos go bar bya ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir gcig la rten pa'i 
[\[313a.3\]]lam ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[313a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi yongs su 'dren par gyur pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa 
[\[313a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_gzugs skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed 
[\[313a.6\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_
[\[313a.7\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[313b.2\]]byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/nang stong pa nyid skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa dang /_'gag 
[\[313b.3\]]pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston 
[\[313b.4\]]to/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_
[\[313b.5\]]tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[313b.6\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[313b.7\]]ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad skyed ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 
[\[314a.2\]]skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[314a.3\]]sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi yongs su 'dren par gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi lam 
[\[314a.4\]]du gyur pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_gzugs ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems rnams las chos ston to/_/
[\[314a.5\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can 
[\[314a.6\]]rnams la chos ston to/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[314a.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni nam 
[\[314b.2\]]mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/_de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya 
[\[314b.3\]]bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/_de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 
[\[314b.4\]]'brel bar 'byung ba'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/_de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags 
[\[314b.5\]]pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[314b.6\]]sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang 
[\[314b.7\]]dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/_de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rnam pa 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/_de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[315a.2\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi lam du gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 
[\[315a.3\]]'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de la sa mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtshan ma med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i 
[\[315a.4\]]ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_smon pa med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/
[\[315a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi skye mi 'gag pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'ang 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi skye mi 'gag pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi 
[\[315a.6\]]dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la 'gro 
[\[315a.7\]]ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rmi lam gyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rmi lam la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i ngang tshul can te/_
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sgyu ma la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sgra brnyan gyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sgra brnyan la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba 
[\[315b.2\]]mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mig yor gyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mig yor la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan gyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni 
[\[315b.3\]]ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs brnyan la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni smig rgyu'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_smig rgyu la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs 
[\[315b.4\]]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chu zla'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chu zla la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sprul pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/
[\[315b.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sprul pa la la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtha' yas kun du mtha' yas pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtha' yas kun du mtha' yas pa la 'gro ba'am 
[\[315b.6\]]'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbyung ba dang mi dbyung ba med dpa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dbyung ba dang mi dbyung ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams 
[\[315b.7\]]cad ni dbri ba dang bsnan pa med pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dbri ba dang bsnan pa med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'ong ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[316a.2\]]zhe na/_blang ba dang dor ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni phrad pa med pa dang /_'bral pa med pa dang /_'dre ba med pa dang /_mi 'dre ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[316a.3\]]zhe na/_phrad pa med pa dang /_'bral ba med pa dang /_'dre ba med pa dang /_mi 'dre ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[316a.4\]]bdag nyid kyang shin tu med na de la 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_byed du 
[\[316a.5\]]'jug pa po dang /_slong ba po dang /_yongs su slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor byed pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mthong ba po nyid kyang shin du med na de la 
[\[316a.6\]]'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rtag pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rtag pa nyid kyang shin du med na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga yod/_rab 'byor chos thams 
[\[316a.7\]]cad ni bde ba dang /_bdag dang sdug pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sdug pa nyid kyang shin du med na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mi rtag pa nyid kyang shin du med na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul 
[\[316b.2\]]de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mi sdug pa nyid kyang /_shin du med na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[316b.3\]]'dod chags kyi dngos po nyid kyang shin du med na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhe sdang gi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor zhe sdang gi dngos po nyid kyang shin du 
[\[316b.4\]]med na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gti mug gi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gti mug gi dngos po nyid kyang shin du med na/_de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la 
[\[316b.5\]]yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lta ba'i rnam pa'i dngos po nyid kyang shin du med na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 
[\[316b.6\]]de bzhin nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag par mtha' dang /_mnyam 
[\[316b.7\]]pa nyid dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi g.yo ba'i ngang 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos gang la yang g.yo ba med de 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 
[\[317a.2\]]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs nyid kyang shin du med na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_
[\[317a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid kyang shin du med na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sbyin 
[\[317a.4\]]pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang shin du med na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du 
[\[317a.5\]]phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang shin du med na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni nang 
[\[317a.6\]]stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shin tu ma dmigs na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 
[\[317a.7\]]ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ngang tshul 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/_de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[317b.2\]]gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam gyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor lam nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_
[\[317b.3\]]rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[317b.4\]]sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen 
[\[317b.5\]]po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba 
[\[317b.6\]]ltag la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/_de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la 
[\[317b.7\]]yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rang byang 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]chub nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bla na med pa yang 
[\[318a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la su zhig mos par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[318a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du spyad par gyur pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba de 
[\[318a.4\]]dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u sum cu drug pa'o//_//gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[318a.5\]]gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi tshul dang /_mtshan ma dang /_rnam pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[318a.6\]]pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dod chags rnam par bsal bas/_dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 
[\[318a.7\]]ni zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnam par bsal bas/_dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[318b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[318b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su 'tshal bar 
[\[318b.4\]]'gyur ba de dag gi ngang tshul ji lta bur 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[318b.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can du 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[318b.6\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can ni sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[318b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di 'tshal kyang /_de la sems can dang sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o/_/
[\[319a.2\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs kyang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin 
[\[319a.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang shin du med la/_byang 
[\[319a.4\]]chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang /_'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 
[\[319a.5\]]'brel ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang shin du med la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[319a.6\]]go cha de ni bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin/_sems can dang 'brel pa ma yin/_srog dang 'brel pa ma yin/_skye ba dang 'brel pa ma yin/_gso ba dang 'brel pa ma yin/_skyes bu dang 'brel pa ma yin/_gang zag dang 'brel pa ma yin/_
[\[319a.7\]]shed can dang 'brel pa ma yin/_shed bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin/_byed pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin/_tshor ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin/_shes pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin/_mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]mthong ba po yang shin du med la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha de yang med pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel pa 
[\[319b.2\]]ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang shin du med la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[319b.3\]]dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[319b.4\]]rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang shin du med la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de 
[\[319b.5\]]ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shin du med la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha de yang med pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[319b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin du med la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med 
[\[319b.7\]]pas/_de'i phyir go che de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dran 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang shin du med la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de 
[\[320a.2\]]ni yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang 
[\[320a.3\]]shin du med la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[320a.4\]]kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin du med la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 
[\[320a.5\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma 
[\[320a.6\]]yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs 
[\[320a.7\]]par mi bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/_
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]de ni gnas ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/_sems can gyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis 
[\[320b.2\]]don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/_de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par 
[\[320b.3\]]mi bya'o zhes smras/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can nyi tshe nyung zad cig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/_ye shes [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/_de ci'i 
[\[320b.4\]]slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad 
[\[320b.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin te/_
[\[320b.6\]]ye shes [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos 
[\[320b.7\]]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shin du zab pa ste/_de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi/_ci yang bsgom par mi bgyi/_gang du yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa'am/_gang bsgom par bgyi ba'am/_gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi 
[\[321a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom 
[\[321a.3\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[321a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par 
[\[321a.5\]]bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[321a.6\]]phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom 
[\[321a.7\]]ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 
[\[321b.2\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi 
[\[321b.3\]]pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[321b.4\]]'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po 
[\[321b.5\]]dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams 
[\[321b.6\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa 
[\[321b.7\]]rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom 
[\[322a.2\]]pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang 
[\[322a.3\]]byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de 
[\[322a.4\]]bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[322a.5\]]'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[322a.6\]]'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu 
[\[322a.7\]]dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shes bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa thams 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_stong pa nyid thams cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_byang 
[\[322b.2\]]chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[322b.3\]]'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[322b.4\]]bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po 
[\[322b.5\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/de nas yang 
[\[322b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/_rab 'byor 
[\[322b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[323a.2\]]'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[323a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[323a.4\]]chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/'phags 
[\[323a.5\]]pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[323a.6\]]med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/
[\[323a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems 
[\[323b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_pha rol gyis smras pa dang pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por mi blta 
[\[323b.3\]]'am phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro 'am/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi 
[\[323b.4\]]pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pa'i 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/_phyir mi ldog 
[\[323b.5\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/_bzod pa'i 
[\[323b.6\]]pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/_zhes 
[\[323b.7\]]yongs su brtag par bya ste/_gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/_mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur la zhum pa dang /_yongs su zhum par mi 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]'gyur zhing /_de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dka' la/_thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la/_klog cing kun chub par byed de/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/_de bzhin 
[\[324a.2\]]nyid du nan tan du byed na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang /_gzung zhing bcangs te kun chub par byas pa dang /_tshul 
[\[324a.3\]]bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/_mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur la zhum par mi 'gyur 
[\[324a.4\]]yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing de'i yid phyir mi ldog la/_thos nas kyang ched du 'dzin cing 'chang la klog cing kun chub par byed de/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 
[\[324a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing /_zhum par mi 'gyur yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 
[\[324a.6\]]'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o/_/gsol 
[\[324a.7\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/_rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /_nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /_
[\[324b.2\]]skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /_de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /_yang 
[\[324b.3\]]dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la 
[\[324b.4\]]rtog pa yin/_rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no//_
[\[324b.5\]]//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bzhi bcu dgu pa/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[324b.6\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa dang /_nam mkha' dang skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[324b.7\]]nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa nyid dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang /_rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan dang sgra brnyan dang smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/_
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/_
[\[325a.2\]]skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rtog pa lags sam/_pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa lags sam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam 
[\[325a.3\]]gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[325a.4\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams 
[\[325a.5\]]pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[325a.6\]]dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rtog pa ma yin no/_/pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang 
[\[325a.7\]]stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs 
[\[325b.2\]]kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/_/
[\[325b.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas rnam par ma byas/_mngon par ma byas/_gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/_gang 
[\[325b.4\]]du yang ma song /_/phyogs na yang mi gnas/_yul na yang mi gnas gang na yang mi gnas pa ste/_de la grangs mi dmigs so/_/'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang mi dmigs so/_/gang la grangs mi dmigs shing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de la ni gang gis 
[\[325b.5\]]kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/_gzugs kyis ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pas ma yin no/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas ma yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas 
[\[325b.6\]]ma yin no/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas ma yin no/_/nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/_/
[\[325b.7\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/tshor ba nyid dang /_
[\[326a.2\]]'du shes nyid dang /_'du byed nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi 
[\[326a.3\]]de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[326a.4\]]kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_pha rol 
[\[326a.5\]]du phyin pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_
[\[326a.6\]]tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[326a.7\]]med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[326b.2\]]de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u sum cu bdun pa'o//_//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha 
[\[326b.3\]]rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang /_pad mo dang /_ku mud dang /_bun da ri ka mang po khyer te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to/_/gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[326b.4\]]kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin 
[\[326b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/_/tshor 
[\[326b.6\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[326b.7\]]pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[327a.2\]]kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[327a.3\]]nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dag pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs 
[\[327a.4\]]dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dad bsam gtan dang tshad med pa 
[\[327a.5\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam 
[\[327a.6\]]par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po 
[\[327a.7\]]dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin 
[\[327b.2\]]nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing 
[\[327b.3\]]gnyis su byar med do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[327b.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin 
[\[327b.5\]]nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/dngos 
[\[327b.6\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin 
[\[327b.7\]]pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/'phags pa'i bden 
[\[328a.2\]]pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/rnam par 
[\[328a.3\]]thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 
[\[328a.4\]]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa 
[\[328a.5\]]ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sangs 
[\[328a.6\]]rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes 
[\[328a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu ma mchis la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/_zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba ste/_'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_
[\[328b.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel 
[\[328b.3\]]bar 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin 
[\[328b.4\]]pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa 
[\[328b.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[328b.6\]]pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 
[\[328b.7\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/'phags 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/_/rnam 
[\[329a.2\]]par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[329a.3\]]stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[329a.4\]]pa'o/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[329a.5\]]de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin 
[\[329a.6\]]pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de 
[\[329a.7\]]bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 
[\[329b.2\]]dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[329b.3\]]nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig 
[\[329b.4\]]pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam 
[\[329b.5\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin 
[\[329b.6\]]nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[329b.7\]]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/
[\[330a.2\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[330a.3\]]kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[330a.4\]]zhe na/_'di ltar 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu med la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/_zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bya ba 'jig 
[\[330a.5\]]rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/_de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/_gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/_gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag 
[\[330a.6\]]nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag bsam 
[\[330a.7\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag mi skye mi 'gag pa dang /_mngon par 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang mngon par 
[\[330b.2\]]rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/sems can dang srog dang 'gro ba dang gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang gang zag dang shed can dang shed bdag dang byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes 
[\[330b.3\]]pa po dang mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 
[\[330b.4\]]'byung ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi 
[\[330b.5\]]pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar 
[\[330b.6\]]gzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 'phags 
[\[330b.7\]]pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rnam par thar pa dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs 
[\[331a.2\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'i 
[\[331a.3\]]chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma 
[\[331a.4\]]lags mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi 
[\[331a.5\]]chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[331a.6\]]smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[331a.7\]]pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_chos zab mo 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub dang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gi 
[\[331b.2\]]gzugs so/_/bdag ni gzugs can no/_/bdag ni tshor ba'o/_/bdag gis tshor bar bya'o/_/bdag gi 'du shes so/_/bdag ni 'du shes can no/_/bdag gi 'du byed do/_/bdag gis mngon par 'du bya'o/_/bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o/_/bdag gis rnam par 
[\[331b.3\]]shes par bya'o/_/bdag gi skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/_/bdag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos can no/_/bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bdag 
[\[331b.4\]]gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[331b.5\]]pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[331b.6\]]phyin pa'o/_/bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro/_/bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo 
[\[331b.7\]]bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_
[\[332a\]]
