[\[354b.1\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dmyal bar mi skye/_byol song gi skye gnas su mi skye/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye/_mi khom pa brgyad po'i bar gyi nang du mi skye zhing /_bud med du 'gyur 
[\[354b.2\]]ba yongs su mi 'dzin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[354b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung zhing spyod de/_bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs shing gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_srog gcod pa spang ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang 
[\[354b.4\]]gis srog gcod pa spangs ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' ba yin/_bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang zhe gcod pa dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_chags sems dang /_
[\[354b.5\]]gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spongs shing gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs bde dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' 
[\[354b.6\]]ba yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 
[\[354b.7\]]rmi lam na yang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi dmigs na/_sad pa na lta ci smos te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nam sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[355a.2\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/_sems can thams cad kyi phyir sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa bsgom mo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/bsam gtan la mnyam par 
[\[355a.3\]]gzhog go/_/shes rab bsgom mo rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[355a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po ni mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin du rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_
[\[355a.5\]]gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i chos de dag chos kyi sbyin pa bya ba'i don du kun chub par byas nas/_de chos kyi sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe 'di snyam du chos kyi sbyin pa 'dis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bsam 
[\[355a.6\]]nas/_de chos kyi sbyin pa de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 
[\[355a.7\]]phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos zab mo la nem nur med/_the tsom med/_yid gnyis med do/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos zab mo la nem nur ma mchis/_the tsom mchis/_yid gnyis ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_chos gang yang 
[\[355b.2\]]yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med de/_gang la nem nur ram/_yid gnyis sam/_the tsom du 'gyur ba'i gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am 'du shes sam 'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_skye mched dam khams sam/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'am/_pha rol 
[\[355b.3\]]du phyin pa'am/_stong pa nyid dam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'am/_bsam gtan nam tshad med pa'am/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'am/_rnam par thar pa'am mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'am/_
[\[355b.4\]]stong pa nyid dam/_mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa'am ting nge 'dzin tam/_gzungs kyi sgo 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sam/_mi 'jigs pa'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa'am/_byams pa chen po'am snying rje chen 
[\[355b.5\]]po'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'am/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[355b.6\]]po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lus kyi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/_ngag gi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/_yid kyi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin te/_rab 'byor 
[\[355b.7\]]rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa'i lus kyi 
[\[356a\]]
[\[356a.1\]]las dang /_byams pa'i ngag gis las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig 
[\[356a.2\]]par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di lta ste/_'dod pa la mos pa dang /_gnod sems dang rmugs pa dang gnyid dang rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dang /_the tshom gyi sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag dang lhan cig 
[\[356a.3\]]tu mi gnas te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[356a.4\]]po ni bag la nyal ba thams cad med de/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub 
[\[356a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gro zhing 'ong yang /_nor ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro/_/nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'ong ste/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong na yang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag cing 'gro/_dran pa nye bar gzhag cing 'ong ste/_de dran bzhin du 
[\[356a.6\]]'gro/_/dran bzhin du 'ong /_dran bzhin du 'chag_/dran bzhin du sdod/_dran bzhin du 'dug_/dran bzhin du nyal te/_de 'phral las las rkang pa mi 'deg_/'phral la sa la rkang pa mi 'jog ste/_dran bzhin du rkang pa 'deg_/dran bzhin du rkang pa 'jog cing 
[\[356a.7\]]de sa'i phyogs mthong bzhin du 'gro ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub 
[\[356b\]]
[\[356b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gos kyi tshags la smad du med pa yin/_rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang ldan te/_gtsang zhing dring ba med la rdul dang dri ma dang bral zhing nad nyung ba yin te/_
[\[356b.2\]]rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang mir gyur pa rnams kyi lus la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu lus de nyid 
[\[356b.3\]]la za ba yod pa de dag kyang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus la thams cad du thams cad/_rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[356b.4\]]chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i lus la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu po de dag med de/_
[\[356b.5\]]rab 'byor ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs 
[\[356b.6\]]su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 
[\[356b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus yongs su dag pa lags/_ngag yongs su dag pa lags/_sems yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[357a\]]
[\[357a.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ji lta ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis lus dang ngag dang sems mi drang ba dang /_lus dang ngag 
[\[357a.2\]]dang sems kyi gya gyu yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/_de yang de lta de ltar lus kyis legs par spyad pa rnam pa gsum spyod do/_/ngag gis legs par spyad pa rnam pa bzhi spyod do/_/yid kyis legs par spyad pa rnam pa gsum spyod de/_'di ni byang 
[\[357a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag pa'o/_/de lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag pa des/_nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' yang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed de/_
[\[357a.4\]]rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag par rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir 
[\[357a.5\]]mi ldog par rig par bya'o rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni khe dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa ma yin/_bsod snyoms lhur len pa ma yin/_chos gos gsum pa'i bar du lhur len 
[\[357a.6\]]pa ma yin zhing de sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis kyang yang dag par blangs te spyod do/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[357a.7\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ser sna'i sems skye ba med do/_/tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems skye ba med do/_/'khrugs pa'i sems skye ba med do/_/le lo'i sems skye ba med do/_/
[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems skye ba med do/_/shes rab 'chal pa'i sems skye ba med do/_/phrag dog gi sems skye ba med do/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 
[\[357b.2\]]phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa ni blo brtan pa yin/_blo zab pa yin/_gus par gzhan la chos nyan pa yin/_gzhan las chos gang ci thos kyang /_de thams cad 
[\[357b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yang dag par sgrub pa yin/_'jig rten pa'i bya ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brten te/_chos nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub cing /_chos gang chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'byor pa 
[\[357b.4\]]de lta bu gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_de thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'byor bar yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba yin te/_rab 'byor de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[357b.5\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bdud sdig to can gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad mngon par sprul nas/_sems can 
[\[357b.6\]]dmyal ba chen po re rer yang /_byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag 
[\[357b.7\]]mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag mang po bsreg cing btso ba dang /_mi bzad par sdug bsngal ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_tsha ba'i tshor ba myong bar mngon du sprul nas bstan te/_/
[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa yin te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po 'dir skyes so/_/khyod kyang de bzhin 
[\[358a.2\]]gshegs pas phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa ni/_sems can dmyal bar lung bstan te/_da dung yang khyod kyis byang chub kyi sems 'di thong shig dang khyod sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur te/_de ltar byos dang khyod mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes zer 
[\[358a.3\]]yang /_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'khrug cing nem nur med/_the tshom med na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de 
[\[358a.4\]]dag gis kyang lung bstan par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges pa yin te/_phyir mi ldog pa'i khams su gnas pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med pa ste/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[358a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[358a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can dge sbyong gi cha byad du 'ongs te/_'di skad du gang khyod kyis sngon 
[\[358a.7\]]'di ltar bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar 
[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar 
[\[358b.2\]]bdag gis nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis yang dag 
[\[358b.3\]]par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[358b.4\]{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes 
[\[358b.5\]]nas/_thos par gyur pa de dag shogs shig_/thong shig 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang bcas pa rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar 
[\[358b.6\]]bzung ste/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yid rang ba de dag kyang so sor shogs shig_/thong shig_/gang khyod kyis thos pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[358b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin te/_de ni rang bzor byas pa'o/_/gang ngas bshad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'o zhes zer la/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khrug cing nem nur byed dam/_
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]the tshom za na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis lung ma bstan par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni ma nges pa yin te/_
[\[359a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i khams su gnas pa ma yin no/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrug cing nem nur mi byed/_the tshom mi za la chos nyid la brten cing mngon par 'du ma byas pa dang /_ma skyes pa la brten 
[\[359a.3\]]te/_gzhan la yid mi ches pas mi 'gro zhing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[359a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing /_'di ltar dper na dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa gzhan la yid ches pas mi 'gro zhing /_chos nyid mngon du gyur pas 
[\[359a.5\]]bdud sdig to can gyis mi 'phrogs pa de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis mi thub cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[359a.6\]]las phyir mi zlogs na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges pa yin te/_phyir mi ldog pa'i khams su gnas shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[359a.7\]]rgyas la yid ches pas kyang mi 'gro na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_bdud sdig to can nam/_mu stegs can dang kun du rgyu ba gzhan dag la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des gang la yid ches pas 'gro ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam 'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/_tshor ba dang 'du shes sam 'du 
[\[359b.2\]]byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dam/_skye mched dam khams sam/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/pha rol du phyin pa'am/_stong pa nyid dam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sam/_byang chub kyi 
[\[359b.3\]]phyogs kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'phags pa'i bden pa'am/_bsam gtan nam/_tshad med pa'am/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'am/_rnam par thar pa'am/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[359b.4\]]'jug pa'am/_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa'am ting nge 'dzin tam/_gzungs kyi sgo 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sam/_mi 'jigs pa'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa'am/_byams pa chen 
[\[359b.5\]]po'am/_snying rje chen po'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub kyi bar ram/_byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_
[\[359b.6\]]rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po 
[\[359b.7\]]lnga bcu gcig pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can dge slong gi cha byad du 'ongs nas/_'di skad du 'di ni 'khor bar spyod pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ma yin gyis 'di nyid 
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]du khyod kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces zer zhing bdud sdig to can de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lam gyi gzugs brnyan gang 'khor bar spyod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i rnam pas lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston te/_
[\[360a.2\]]yang na rus par 'du shes pa ston to/_/yang na bsam gtan dang po dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du ston cing /_tshe dang ldan pa lam dang nan tan gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 
[\[360a.3\]]'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba'i lam dang nan tan ni 'di yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa lam dang nan tan 'dis 'di nyid du khyod kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyung shig dang /_phyin cad 'khor ba na spyod pa'i 
[\[360a.4\]]sdug bsngal de dag myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kye ma khyod kyis lus 'di 'di nyid tu mngon par ma grub na/_lus gzhan yang ji ltar yongs su gzung bar sems shes zer yang /_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan 
[\[360a.5\]]sems mi 'khrugs mi g.yo zhing /_gong du yang 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag la lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa ni/_dge slong 'di bdag la phan 'dogs pa ste/_lam gyi gzugs brnyan des ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar 
[\[360a.6\]]yang mi 'gyur/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur/_rang byang chub mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du 
[\[360a.7\]]bya bar yang mi 'gyur ro snyam ste/_de las kyang gong du gang bdag la de ltar chags pas ston pa'i dge slong 'di ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa yin gyis/_bdag gis chags pa de dag shes par bya ste/_theg pa gsum po kun la bslab par bya'o zhes dga' 
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]ba skye la/_bdud sdig to can des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dga' bar gyur par shes nas/_de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang pos/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[360b.2\]]snyed la na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du gang gis sbyin pa'i 
[\[360b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[360b.4\]]byas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur byas te/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[360b.5\]]du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar 
[\[360b.6\]]gzhag pa la spyod pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_
[\[360b.7\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi 
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[361a.2\]]pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par bgyi zhes/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi don du kun dris shing yongs su zhus pa rnams la blta bar 'dod dam/_de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang bshad pa 
[\[361a.3\]]la/_de bzhin du gnas te de bzhin du brtson par byas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dag gis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/_de ltar gdams pa dang /_de ltar bstan pa dang /_
[\[361a.4\]]de ltar gnas pa dang /_de ltar slob slob pa rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na/_khyod kyis lta bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur re skan zhes brjod de/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la snying 
[\[361a.5\]]brnyan bcug kyang de'i sems gzhan du mi 'gyur la/_mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing /_gang du yang dge slong 'di ni de ltar bdag la chags pa gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang 'thob par mi 'gyur/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_
[\[361a.6\]]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang thob par mi 'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi 'gyur ba'i chags pa ston pa ni/_bdag la phan 'dogs 
[\[361a.7\]]pa'o zhes dga' ba bskyed pas/_bdud sdig to can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i sems la zhum pa med par rig nas/_sa'i phyogs de nyid du dge slong mang po mngon par sprul te dge slong 'di dag kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]byang chub tu 'jug 'jug pa sha stag ste/_de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par gyur na/_khyod ltas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur re skan zhes zer yang /_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[361b.2\]]dpa' chen po de 'di snyam ste/_'di ni bdud sdig to can te/_lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi 
[\[361b.3\]]ldog cing /_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung la/_de las kyang gong du 'di snyam ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[361b.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang 
[\[361b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i gnas med/_skabs med de/_de ni gnas ma yin no snyam na/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[361b.6\]]chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du gal te de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du bstan pa de ltar bslab la/_
[\[361b.7\]]spyod pa de dang ma bral zhing pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa 'di dag gis spyod pa de ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las yongs su mi nyam/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du 
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las yongs su mi nyam/_nang stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyam/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las yongs su mi nyam/_dran pa 
[\[362a.2\]]nye bar gzhag pa las yongs su mi nyam/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las yongs su mi nyam/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang 
[\[362a.3\]]tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las yongs su mi nyam/_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_
[\[362a.4\]]ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las yongs su mi nyam/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[362a.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las yongs su mi nyam mo snyam la/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sus bdud kyi las su rig pa de ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su mi nyam mo snyam na/_rab 
[\[362a.6\]]'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[362a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci las slar ldog pa'i slad du/_phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni gzugs kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_tshor ba dang 
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/skye mched kyi 'du shes dang /_khams kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/'dod chags kyi 'du shes dang /_zhe sdang gi 'du shes dang /_gti mug gi 'du shes dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa'i 'du shes las 
[\[362b.2\]]phyir ldog go/_/pha rol du phyin pa'i 'du shes dang /_stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i 'du shes dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 
[\[362b.3\]]'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa 
[\[362b.4\]]nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying 
[\[362b.5\]]rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang sangs 
[\[362b.6\]]rgyas kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong bas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste/_des chos rdul tsam 
[\[362b.7\]]yang dmigs pa med do/_/dmigs pa med pas mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/mngon par 'du mi byed pas skyed pa med de/_de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba la bzod pa zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na rnam pa de 
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]dag dang tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u sum cu dgu pa'o//_//
[\[363a.2\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can nye bar 'ongs te mos pa zlog cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o/_/chos 
[\[363a.3\]]'di dag kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o/_/de ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la/_gang mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[363a.4\]]'tshang rgya ba dang gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de dag gang yang mi dmigs te/_chos 'di dag thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid 
[\[363a.5\]]kyis stong pas 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/snyam pa'i de na khyod nyon mongs la don med par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni bdud kyis bstan pa'o/_/'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[363a.6\]]bshad pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu yid la byed pa de dag thong la/_khyod yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa med par ma spyod cig_/sdug bsngal ba dang /_log par ltung ngo zhes zer na/_de la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des/_tshig de dag thos nas 'di 
[\[363a.7\]]ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las zlog pa de ni bdud kyi las te/_chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong mod kyi/_de dag 
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]sems can rnams kyis ma shes ma mthong /_khong du ma chud kyis de'i phyir bdag gis nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i go cha bgos te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[363b.2\]]par byas la/_sems can thams cad la 'byung ba'i chos bstan to/_/sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang 
[\[363b.3\]]byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/snyam du sems bskyed cing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_chos de dag 
[\[363b.4\]]thos nas sems brten par bya'o/_/sems mi g.yo bar bya'o/_/sems mi 'phrogs par bya'o/_/de sems brten pa dang /_sems mi g.yo ba dang /_sems mi 'phrogs pa dang ldan pas/_pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod na/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon 
[\[363b.5\]]med par 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyir ldog pa zhes bgyi'am/_'on tam slar ldog 
[\[363b.6\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o/_/phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyir mi ldog pa zhes 
[\[363b.7\]]bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyir ldog pa zhes bgyi/_ci'i slad du slar ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor 
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir ldog pa de ni/_rab 'byor phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[364a.2\]]sems dpa' gang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir mi ldog pa de ni/_rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/_de ni phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag gis byang 
[\[364a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya ste/_rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[364a.4\]]pa'i byang chub las bzlog par mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dod na/_bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa la 
[\[364a.5\]]snyoms par 'jug go/_/'gog pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug go/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dod na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_
[\[364a.6\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go mngon 
[\[364a.7\]]par shes pa lnga mngon par sgrub bo/_/de bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po de dag gis 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la 'dris par byed/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams goms par byed/_
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa goms par byed/_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[364b.2\]]yang snyoms par 'jug ste/_bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin 
[\[364b.3\]]to/_/lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/rang byang chub thob par mi byed do/_/de 'dod na ched du bsams shing lus yongs su 'dzin te/_lus gang gis sems 
[\[364b.4\]]can rnams kyi don bya bar 'gyur ba/_de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin to/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[364b.5\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub yid la byed pa dang ldan te/_byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing gzugs lhur len pa ma yin/_mtshan ma lhur len pa ma yin lus lhur len pa ma yin/_sbyin pa lhur len 
[\[364b.6\]]pa ma yin/_tshul khrims lhur len pa ma yin/_bzod pa lhur len pa ma yin/_brtson 'grus lhur len pa ma yin/_bsam gtan lhur len pa ma yin/_shes rab lhur len pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin/_dngos po med pa'i 
[\[364b.7\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du lhur len pa ma yin/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams lhur len pa ma yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lhur len pa ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo lhur len pa ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[365a.2\]]bcu lhur len pa ma yin/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams lhur len pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du lhur len pa ma yin/_
[\[365a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas blta ba lhur len pa ma yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lhur len pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad 
[\[365a.4\]]rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la lhur blang pa bskyed pa dang /_gang gis bskyed pa dang /_gang la bskyed par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[365a.5\]]chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o/_/rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yid la byed pa de dang ldan pas/_spyod lam bzhir 'gro 'am/_'ong 
[\[365a.6\]]na yang nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'gro/_nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'ong /_nor ba'i sems kyis mi sdod/_nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'chag_/nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'dug_/nor pa'i sems kyis mi nyal te/_de dran bzhin du 'gro'o/_/dran bzhin 
[\[365a.7\]]du 'ong ngo /_/dran bzhin du 'chag go/_/dran bzhin du sdod do/_/dran bzhin du 'dug go/_/dran bzhin du nyal lo/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni khyim na gnas kyang thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar len to/_/de sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_zas 'dod pa la 
[\[365b.2\]]zas skom 'dod pa la skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa la bzhon pa/_gos 'dod pa la gos/_mal cha 'dod pa la mal cha/_me tog 'dod pa la me tog_/bdug pa 'dod pa la bdug pa/_spos 'dod pa la spos/_'phreng ba 'dod pa la 'phreng ba/_byug pa 'dod pa la byug pa 
[\[365b.3\]]gnas 'dod pa la gnas/_nor dang 'bru dang nor bu dang mu tig dang baiDUr+ya dang dung dang /_man shel dang byi ru dang gser dang /_dngul 'dod pa la nor dang 'bru dang /_nor bu dang mu tig dang baiDUr+ya dang dung dang men shel dang /_byi ru dang gser dang dngul dang 'tshog chas dang /_
[\[365b.4\]]yo byad gzhan dang /_gzhan dag kyang de 'dod pa rnams la yongs su gtong ste/_de bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod la/_gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do/_gzhan gang 
[\[365b.5\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed do/_/bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_gzhan yang shes rab 
[\[365b.6\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do/_/gzhan gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[365b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni khyim na gnas na 'dzam bu'i gling rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong /_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_
[\[366a\]]
[\[366a.1\]]stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang /_de 'dod pa la yongs su mi spyod de/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par tshangs par spyod pa yin/_gnod pa gang gis gzhan 
[\[366a.2\]]mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnod pa de lta bu gang yang mi spyod de/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[366a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyi bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[366a.4\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_bdag gis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang bar bya'o zhes yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/_gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rjes su 'brang ngo /_/ji tsam du lag na rdo rje'i rigs rnams 
[\[366a.5\]]rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rjes su 'brang ba de tsam du de la mi'am/_mi ma yin pa dag gis gnod par mi nus te/_de la 'jig rten na lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gang sus kyang chos dang 'thun par thub pa med de/_de'i sems byang chub yid la byed pa 
[\[366a.6\]]nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rnam par 'khrug pa med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i dbang po 'di lta ste/_mig gi dbang po dang /_rna ba'i dbang po dang /_sna'i dbang po dang /_
[\[366a.7\]]lce'i dbang po dang /_lus kyi dbang po dang /_yid kyi dbang po dang /_dang ba'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po dag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ni skyes bu dam par 
[\[366b\]]
[\[366b.1\]]'gyur te/_skyes bu dma' ba ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bu dam par 'gyur zhing skyes bu dma' ba ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[366b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po nam byang chub kyi sems mi 'khrug pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bu dam par 'gyur te/_skyes bu dma' ba ma yin no/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub 
[\[366b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub yid la bya ba dang ldan zhing /_bud med ze slong ba dang /_dbang du 'gyur ba'i sngags dang /_
[\[366b.4\]]tshig gang ci yang rung ste/_rtsi de dag thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad mi sbyor/_sbyor du mi 'jug ste/_ze slong ba'i bag gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang mi byed do/_/bud med dam skyes pa gang yang rung ste/_de dag la yongs su bstan pa'i cho 
[\[366b.5\]]'phrul mi byed do/_/bu 'am bu mo rigs kyi lha lta bu yod par 'gyur ro zhe'am/_tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhes yongs su ston pa'i cho 'phrul mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan 
[\[366b.6\]]nyid kyis stong ba'i chos rnams la/_mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_des mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas 'tshe ba yongs su dag pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[366b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa gang dang tshul gang dang /_mtshan ma gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir 
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]mi ldog par rig par bya ba'i rnam pa dang tshul dang /_mtshan ma de dag bstan gyis shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 
[\[367a.2\]]'das la phyir nyan to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral ba yin te/_phung po'i 
[\[367a.3\]]sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas/_skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des phung po stong pa nyid 
[\[367a.4\]]dang /_skye mched stong pa nyid dang /_khams stong pa nyid dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong pa nyid shin du yid la byas pa yin/_de 'du 'dzi'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[367a.5\]]chen po des sems can stong pa nyid shin du yid la byas pa yin/_de rgyal po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pas/_chos gang la yang bzang po'am/_ngan par yang 
[\[367a.6\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de rkun po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas/_chos gang la yang blang pa 'am/_dbrog pa yang dag par rjes su mi 
[\[367a.7\]]mthong ngo /_/de g.yul gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pas/_chos gang yang nyung ngu 'am mang por yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de dmag gi gtam gyi sbyor ba 
[\[367b\]]
[\[367b.1\]]la rjes su brtson par mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la gnas pas/_chos gang la yang byams pa'am zhe sdang pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de grong gi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas te 
[\[367b.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pas/_chos gang yang tshogs sam tshogs ma yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de grong khyer gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 
[\[367b.3\]]'di ltar de nam mkha' stong pa nyid la gnas pas/_chos gang yang gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de grong rdal gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de yang dag pa'i mtha' 
[\[367b.4\]]la gnas pas chos gang yang 'phel ba'am/_'bri bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bdag gis gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas/_sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can 
[\[367b.5\]]dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas te/_gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[367b.6\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas te/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_ser sna'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_tshul khrims ngan pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par 
[\[367b.7\]]mi gnas so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_'khrug pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_le lo'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du 
[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]phyin pa la spyod cing /_g.yeng ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_shes rab 'chal pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par mi gnas so/_/de chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing chos 'dod pa yin 
[\[368a.2\]]gyi/_chos mi 'dod pa ma yin/_de chos kyi dbyings la spyod cing /_chos tha dad pa'i legs pa brjod pa ma yin/_de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bshes gnyen du sems pa yin/_rigs kyi bu dang 
[\[368a.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul zhing 'god do/_/'dul lo/_/rab tu gzhog go/_/de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[368a.4\]]sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed cing blta ba'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams gang na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba der skyes te/_der skye bar 'dod cing 'di ltar sangs rgyas yid la bya bas nyin mtshan du rnam par spyod de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[368a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni phal cher 'dod pa'i khams dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba bskyed cing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas pas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan dang po bskyed/_bsam gtan gnyis pa 
[\[368a.6\]]dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa bskyed/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du bskyed cing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du gyur par bzhugs 
[\[368a.7\]]shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa der skye ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[368b\]]
[\[368b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/_nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_
[\[368b.2\]]dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[368b.3\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo la gnas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa 
[\[368b.4\]]bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la gnas pa de ni 'di snyam du bdag ni phyir ldog pa'am phyir mi ldog pa ma yin no snyam yang mi byed de/_the tshom mi skye zhing rang gi 
[\[368b.5\]]sa la yid gnyis med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des phyir ldog pa dang /_phyir ldog pa ma yin pa'i chos rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i skyes bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i sa la 
[\[368b.6\]]gnas pa ni/_rang gi sa la nem nur med cing the tshom mi za'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i sa la gnas pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba phyir mi 'ong ba'i sa la gnas pa dang /_dgra bcom pa dgra bcom pa'i sa la gnas pa ni/_rang gi 
[\[368b.7\]]sa la nem nur med cing the tshom mi za'o/_/rang sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ni/_rang gi sa la nem nur med cing the tshom mi za'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ni/_rang gi sa la nem nur med cing the tshom 
[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]]mi za'o/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ni/_rang gi sa la nem nur med cing the tshom mi za'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[369a.2\]]rang gi sa la gnas pa yang nem nur med cing the tshom mi za zhing /_de phyir mi ldog pa'i sa de la gnas te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong ngo /_/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/_/bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba dag kyang shes te/_bdud 
[\[369a.3\]]kyi las kyi dbang du yang mi 'gro/_/bdud kyi las de dag thams cad kyang rnam par 'joms zhing srab mor byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_mtshams med pa byed byed pa'i skyes bu ni 'chi ka'i bar du yang mtshams med pa'i sems dang mi 'bral zhing /_mtshams 
[\[369a.4\]]med pa'i sems de rjes su 'brang ngo /_/mtshams med pa'i sems de thabs mkhas pa thams cad kyis kyang rnam par gzhil bar mi nus te/_kun nas ldang ba de 'chi ka'i bar du yang rjes su 'brang ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[369a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ste/_sems de rnam par brtag tu med cing mi skul bas/_de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyir bzlog par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[369a.6\]]zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar sems des lha dang /_mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten las 'das te/_yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs pas de rang gi sa la gnas shing /_mngon par shes pa rnams la pha rol du phyin pa'i mchog thob pas/_sangs 
[\[369a.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang /_de dag la phyag bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang 
[\[369b\]]
[\[369b.1\]]'gro'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po yang bskyed cing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la kun 'dri zhing yongs su zhu ba byed/_bsnyen bkur byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[369b.2\]]chen po de de ltar gnas bas bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba rnams khong du chud de/_bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba dag gi dbang du'ang mi 'gro'o/_/bdud kyi las de dag kyang thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha' la sbyor bar byed cing de rang gi sa la nem nur med 
[\[369b.3\]]cing the tshom mi za'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de yang dag pa'i mtha' la nem nur med pas/_yang dag pa'i mtha' gcig gam/_gnyis su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_de ltar shes pas de tshe 'phos nas kyang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs 
[\[369b.4\]]rgyas kyi sar sems mi skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ba la/_chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_
[\[369b.5\]]rnam par byang ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de tshe 'phos nas kyang 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro 
[\[369b.6\]]snyam du mi byed de/_gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro snyam sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rang 
[\[369b.7\]]gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi sa la de ltar gnas pa ni rang gi sa la thub pa med pa yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[370a\]]
[\[370a.1\]]dpa' chen po de ltar gnas pa ni mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin te/_rab 'byor gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du nye bar 'ongs nas/_'di 
[\[370a.2\]]skad du khyod kyis 'di nyid du dgra bcom pa thob par gyis shig_/khyod ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis gang gis khyod bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[370a.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khyod kyis ma thob bo/_/rnam pa gang dag dang tshul gang dag dang mtshan ma gang dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[370a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag kyang khyod la med do zhes zer yang /_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra de thos nas mi 'jum mi 'god zhing /_de'i sems 
[\[370a.5\]]gzhan du mi 'gyur la yid skrag par mi 'gyur na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[370a.6\]]chub tu lung bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag bdag la yod do zhes bya bar 
[\[370a.7\]]rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gal te bdud sdig to can nam/_bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i skyes bu zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du nye bar 'ongs nas/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[370b\]]
[\[370b.1\]]sar lung bstan kyang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs 
[\[370b.2\]]rgyas kyi sa la yang yang dag par bskul ba mi mdzad de/_kye ma 'di ni bdud sdig to can nam/_bdud sdig to can gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i skyes bu zhig_/sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du nye bar 'ongs so snyam sems pa dang /_gal te rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[370b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin du rgyas pa'i mdo sde klog pa dang kha ton byed pa la bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du nye bar 'ongs nas/_de la 'di skad du gang la khyod spyod pa'i mdo sde 'di dag ni bdud kyis bshad pa yin te/_'di dag ni sangs 
[\[370b.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sa bshad pa ma yin no zhes zer na/_rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_kye ma gang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang 
[\[370b.5\]]'bral bar byed pa 'di ni bdud sdig to can nam/_bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i skyes bu'o zhes bya bar rig par byed na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[370b.6\]]rgyas rnams kyi sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub 
[\[370b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag ni de la yod do/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir 
[\[371a\]]
[\[371a.1\]]mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir bdag kyang yongs su gtong la/_srog 
[\[371a.2\]]yongs su chad par 'gyur yang sdod cing chos de yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir 'di ltar brtson par byed de/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[371a.3\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung zhing /_dam pa'i chos yongs su mi gtong ba de ltar brtson par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/_dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung na/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 
[\[371a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod par 'gyur/_de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de la chos gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag yongs su gtong zhing srog yongs su chad par 'gyur yang 
[\[371a.5\]]sdod pa'i chos de gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad stong ngo zhes chos ston te/_de la skyes bu blun po la la 'di ni chos ma yin/_'di ni 'dul ba ma yin 'di ni ston pas 
[\[371a.6\]]bstan pa ma yin no zhes phyir rgol zhing ngan du brjod de/_rab 'byor chos de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag yongs su gtong zhing srog yongs su chad par 'gyur yang mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen pos 'di 
[\[371a.7\]]ltar bslab par bya ste/_gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gi nang du bdag kyang grangs su gzhug go_/bdag kyang der lung bstan to/_/chos gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gtong ba dang /_srog yongs su chad par 'gyur yang 
[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]mi gtong ba de yang bdag gis chos so zhes bslab bo/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir bdag kyang yongs su gtong la srog yongs su chad par 'gyur yang sdod pa yin no/_/
[\[371b.2\]]rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin 
[\[371b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston pa la nem nur med/_the tshom mi za zhing gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gsungs pa de thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/_/de ltar bzung nas kyang chud za bar mi byed do/_/de 
[\[371b.4\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gzungs rab tu thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs gang thob pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de 
[\[371b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo rnams chab mi 'tshal ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs rab tu thob pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[371b.6\]]gsungs pa'i mdo rnams chud mi za'o/_/de bzhin du rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang /_pad mo rnam par bkod pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo 
[\[371b.7\]]rnams chud mi za'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'ba' zhig chab mi 'tshal du bas kyi nyan thos kyis bshad pa ma lags sam/_lhas bshad pa ma 
[\[372a\]]
[\[372a.1\]]lags sam/_klus bshad pa ma lags sam/_gnod sbyin gyis bshad pa ma lags sam/_dri zas bshad pa ma lags sam/_lha ma yin gyis bshad pa ma lags sam/_nam mkha' lding gis bshad pa ma lags sam/_lto 'phye 
[\[372a.2\]]chen pos bshad pa ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni skad dang /_brda dang /_sgra gang yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad la nem nur med cing the tshom med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar des 
[\[372a.3\]]gzungs rab tu thob pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_phyir mi 
[\[372a.4\]]ldog pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//_//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[372a.5\]]po ni yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[372a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bskyod du ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yon tan 
[\[372a.7\]]chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/_/rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bskyod du 
[\[372b\]]
[\[372b.1\]]med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes mtha' yas mu med pa rab tu thob ste/_ye shes de la gnas shing phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[372b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa mngon par bsgrubs pa/_gang gis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dris kyang lan zad par mi 'gyur ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa mngon par sgrub po/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol 
[\[372b.3\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par yang rnam pa gang dang /_tshul gang dang /_mtshan ma gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[372b.4\]]sems dpa' chen por brjod pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa dang /_tshul dang mtshan ma rnams ston pa'i mthu mnga' na/_bcom ldan 'das gang la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[372b.5\]]pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[372b.6\]]brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas 
[\[372b.7\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[373a\]]
[\[373a.1\]]pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[373a.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gnas zab mo zab mo rnams legs par bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor khyod de ltar khyod phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[373a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas zab mo rnams dri bar sems pa legs so/_/rab 'byor zab mo zhes bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/'di ni mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon 
[\[373a.4\]]par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste gang mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[373a.5\]]tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]de dag ni gnas zab mo zab mo zhes bya ba de dag go/_/gsol pa/_de mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su bas kyi/_chos thams cad kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor zab mo zhes 
[\[373a.6\]]bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]kyang de yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs zab bo/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa zab bo/_/rab 'byor mi ga zab bo/_/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid zab bo/_/rab 
[\[373a.7\]]'byor gzugs zab bo/_/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos zab bo/_/rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa zab bo/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo/_/rab 'byor rna ba dang /_sna dang lce dang lus dang 
[\[373b\]]
[\[373b.1\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab bo/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo/_/rab 'byor sa'i khams zab bo/_/chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams zab 
[\[373b.2\]]bo/_/rab 'byor ma rig pa zab bo/_/'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi zab bo/_/rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub 
[\[373b.3\]]kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zab bo/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang 
[\[373b.4\]]smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo zab bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[373b.5\]{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad zab bo/_/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab bo/_/byang chub zab po rab 'byor ji ltar na gzugs zab/_ji ltar na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zab/_ji ltar na skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 
[\[373b.6\]]'byung ba zab/_ji ltar na pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zab/_ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du zab/_ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 
[\[373b.7\]]zab/_ji ltar na byang chub zab ce na/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs zab bo/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa zab bo/_/skye mched dang /_
[\[374a\]]
[\[374a.1\]]khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab bo/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs 
[\[374a.2\]]kyi chos rnams zab bo/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes 
[\[374a.3\]]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[374a.4\]]'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab bo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab bo/_/byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du byang 
[\[374a.5\]]chub zab bo/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 
[\[374a.6\]]'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi de 
[\[374a.7\]]bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/_byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de la gzugs kyang med/_
[\[374b\]]
[\[374b.1\]]gzugs las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rnam par shes pa yang med/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[374b.2\]]ni de lta bu'o/_/rab 'byor skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang med/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/rab 'byor pha 
[\[374b.3\]]rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang med/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin 
[\[374b.4\]]nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang med gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de/_
[\[374b.5\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa 
[\[374b.6\]]yang med/_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de/_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 
[\[374b.7\]]mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang med/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de/_sangs 
[\[375a\]]
[\[375a.1\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid de la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de/_rnam pa thams 
[\[375a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni da lta bu'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid de la byang chub kyang med byang chub las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar thabs phra bas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[375a.3\]]dpa' chen po gzugs las kyang bzlog_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa las kyang bzlog_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan/_skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las kyang bzlog mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[375a.4\]]yang bstan/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang stong pa nyid rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las kyang bzlog_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar las kyang bzlog_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan/_'jig rten pa dang 
[\[375a.5\]]'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_thun mong dang thun mong ma lags pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa'i 'dzin pa thams cad las kyang bzlog_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan pa de ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[375a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bdag gis gnas par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las ji skad brjod pa bzhin du bdag gis bslab par bya'o zhes shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gnas 
[\[375a.7\]]zab mo 'di dag sems shing 'jal ba dang /_rtog pa byed na rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du sgrub pa dang /_de bzhin du sems pa dang /_de bzhin du yongs su rtog pa dang de bzhin du brtson par byed pa dang /_
[\[375b\]]
[\[375b.1\]]de bzhin du rtsol ba dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las ji skad du bstan pa de bzhin du 'bad pa de ni/_sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/_de bskal pa tshad med par 'khor ba spong bar 'gyur na/_shes rab 
[\[375b.2\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ma 'dres par spyod cing /_byang chub yid la bya ba dang ldan par gnas pa lta ci smos/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rtog pa dang ldan pa la la zhig gis bud med gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa lta na sdug pa zhig btus la/_bud 
[\[375b.3\]]med de gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba zhig ste/_khyim nas phyir 'byung bar yang ma nus na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de'i rtog pa ci dang ldan par 'gyur gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de'i rtog pa ni bud med dang ldan par 'gyur te/_bdag gi bud med ni 'di lta 
[\[375b.4\]]bu zhig go/_/de 'ongs nas de dang /_lhan cig tu gnas par bya'o/_/rtse bar bya'o snyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nyin mtshan 'das pas skyes bu de'i rtog pa ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[375b.5\]]ni mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni mang ste/_skyes bu de'i rnam par rtog pa de ni nyin mtshan 'das pas shin tu mang bar 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor skyes bu de'i rnam par rtog pa ni nyin mtshan 'das pas ji snyed cig 'byung ba de snyed kyi 
[\[375b.6\]]bskal par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba spong zhing rgyab kyis ltas bar 'gyur ro/_/gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la slob pa dang /_nye bar rtog pa dang /_sems pa dang /_nyes pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
